programme.title: Snowy Owl: Queen of the North
programme.desc: No other owls are capable of surviving the extreme conditions, whereas the snowy owl is able to hunt through six months of bright sunshine and six months of twilight. This film follows a pair of snowy owls as they breed on the tundra of the High Arctic, 300 miles inside the Arctic Circle. Lemming numbers are low this year. Five owlets hatch and they face a struggle if any are going to survive.

programme.title: Portugals Nature Parks
programme.desc: The highest mountain range in Portugal is the Serra da Estrela. The episode embarks on a voyage of discovery to adventurous rock formations and villages steeped in tradition. The nature park is the largest protected area on the Iberian peninsula. In the mountain range we accompany the young scientist Ana Matos, who wants to breathe new life into old traditions, and cheese maker Maria Natália Lopes. She watches over more than 350 sheeps.

programme.title: Portugals Nature Parks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 South West Portugal: Alentejano and Costa Vicentina
programme.desc: In the southwest of Portugal lies the little known Parque Natural do Sudoeste Alentejano e Costa Vicentina. It encompasses a narrow coastal strip that runs along the coast to the south of Portugal. Sparsely populated, this coastal region, which was placed under protection in 1988, is considered one of the last intact ecosystems in Europe. The steep cliffs, the almost constant wind and high waves have ensured that mass tourism has not gained a foothold here. There are still near-natural forests and a diverse bird life.

programme.title: Portugals Nature Parks
programme.desc: Madeira - Portugals autonomous island in the Atlantic Ocean, is closer to the African coast than to the mother country Portugal, from which it is separated by about 900 kilometers. The islands name comes from Portuguese sailors who claimed the uninhabited isle for themselves in 1419. Madeira means wood and that was available in abundance. Almost the entire surface was covered by dense forest. Since 1982, two-thirds of the landscape has been protected.

programme.title: Portugals Nature Parks
programme.desc: The "Parque Natural da Ria Formosa" is one of the largest lagoon conservation areas in Europe. Bordered by five natural islands. A mosaic of sandbanks, brackish and freshwater lagoons and salt marshes. In 2010, the "Ria Formosa" was chosen as one of the seven natural wonders of Portugal. It is a unique ecosystem: in the winter months, more than 20,000 birds gather here. In addition, the nature park has one of the largest seahorse populations internationally. More than half of all fish species in the Atlantic are said to spawn in the lagoon.

programme.title: Wild Baltic
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Wild Baltic - Life on the Amber Coast
programme.desc: The first episode of this two-part nature documentary presents the natural beauty of the shifting sand dunes of the Curonian Spit, the romantic beaches of the Latvian Baltic Sea and the island worlds of Estonia. Time and again, this deserted and almost untouched nature fascinates. In the winter, ringed seals give birth to their young on the pack ice. In the spring, Konik wild horse stallions fight fierce battles amongst themselves, while colourful European rollers fly through the dune forests. Lynxes wander through the coastal forests and in the orchid meadows turncoats and hoopoes find more than enough food. On the islands around Saaremaa in Estonia, grey seals hunt for fish. They share...

programme.title: Wild Baltic
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Wild Baltic - Enchanted Forests and Moors
programme.desc: The wide, often untouched wilderness of the Baltic hinterland is home to many animals. More than 35 brown bears live in the primeval forests of Alutaguse. In the spring, the Soomaa National Park transforms into a huge lake. Europes widest waterfall is located in Latvia. In the beginning of May, vimba bream follow the course of the River Venta. The hardly 5-centimetre-long fish have to overcome a 4-metre-long rock barrier in order to reach their spawning grounds.

programme.title: Wild Bavaria
programme.desc: The moon disappears behind the horizon and the stage is set for a new day in the Alps of Berchtesgaden.

programme.title: Wild Bavaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Wild Bavaria - In The Shadow of the Watzmann.
programme.desc: Mighty and mysterious, King Watzmann sits above Germanys only alpine national park.

programme.title: Wilderness in Europe: The Bohemian Forest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Psychogramm of a Spiritual Landscape
programme.desc: The Bohemian Forest is the source of the Vltava River, home to primeval forests, untouched high moors and bubbling torrents. This archaic stretch of land, which includes the Bavarian Forest, was long considered impenetrable and mysterious. Since the fall of the Iron Curtain, Bavarian border residents have rediscovered new references to this unusual forest landscape for themselves. This is also the case with photo artist Bastian Kalous, who has been documenting his homeland for years with nostalgic-looking Polaroid photographs and is dealing with its eventful history for an illustrated book. Or Elisa Belotti and Marco Heurich, who have dedicated their lives to the lynxes. In order for...

programme.title: Wilderness in Europe: The Bohemian Forest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Boundary Experiences in Muhlviertel
programme.desc: Pavel Hubeny, whose life would be unthinkable without the forest, is the head of the Šumava National Park. He is committed to ensuring that a primeval forest can grow for future generations, in which man does not interfere. This vision of a primeval forest is also shared by the forester Claus Bassler, who wants to counteract the extinction of species by having trees felled to create artificial deadwood and thus a new habitat for rare beetles and fungi. On the Vltava River lies the small town of Krumlov, the "Pearl of the Bohemian Forest" with its Baroque theater and fully preserved stage technology from the 17th century. Here the director Zuzana Vrbová enchants people from all over the...

programme.title: Wild River Rhine
programme.desc: Alluvial forests, roaring waterfalls, steep canyons and sunny slopes flank the river Rhine. The variety of habitats is the reason for the large biodiversity along the stream.There is hardly any other river in Germany that is surrounded by as many myths and legends as the river Rhine. No other river has been the topic of songs, has been painted and travelled equally frequently. Despite this it still seems to be true today what the French poet Victor Hugo once said about this river – the Rhine is a river everybody talks about, nobody explores, everybody visits but no one really knows. The film follows the water against the stream. It starts at the river’s delta in the Netherlands, flows...

programme.title: Bosnia Herzegovina
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bosnia and Herzegovina: The Abundant North
programme.desc: Wild and unknown lies the still undiscovered natural paradise of Bosnia and Herzegovina in the heart of Europe. Rough mountains, dense forests and wild waterfalls characterize the picture of the untouched landscapes. Lynx, wolves and bears roam mountains and valleys. One of the last primeval forests in Europe is a retreat for many endangered animal species. Bosnia and Herzegovina is actually an undiscovered natural paradise in the middle of Europe.

programme.title: Bosnia Herzegovina
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Bosnia and Herzegovina: The Karstic South
programme.desc: The barren, karstic south of the country, Herzegovina, also impresses with its natural landscapes. One of them is the Livno field. Not only is it the largest wetland in the country, it is also the largest regularly flooded karst field in the world. About 700 wild horses live in this unique landscape. Their ancestors were working horses that were abandoned here more than 50 years ago. Another special feature of the karst landscape are the rivers with their tufa barriers. The countless waterfalls that pour over it are a unique natural phenomenon.

programme.title: Portugals Nature Parks
programme.desc: The Parque Nacional Peneda-Geres is the only national park in Portugal. An area of almost 700 square kilometers, located in the extreme north of Portugal. Barren and rocky ridges in the plateaus, contrast with large forests and lush ground vegetation in deep valleys, crossed by lakes and rivers. The park is known for its oak forests, which are predominantly pedunculate and Pyrenean oaks. Among the typical animals of the park are the small Garrano ponies, a very old breed of horse and the only one in Europe that still lives in the wild.

programme.title: Portugals Nature Parks
programme.desc: The highest mountain range in Portugal is the Serra da Estrela. The episode embarks on a voyage of discovery to adventurous rock formations and villages steeped in tradition. The nature park is the largest protected area on the Iberian peninsula. programme.title: Elephants: Back to the Wild
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Elephants: Back to the Wild: The Return of the Elephants - Tsavo-East-Nationalpark
programme.desc: We accompany the first steps of a two-year-old elephant who is just starting his release program. We also observe the story of two young elephants in their first night in the wilderness on their own. Captivating film footage allows us to truly learn how elephants behave in the wild.

programme.title: The Cape of Wild Animals, Episode 5
programme.desc: The movie focuses on committed animal rights activists, who fight for the lives of their charges every day, in diverse protection projects and rescue centres along the South African Garden Route.

programme.title: White Lions: Born Wild
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 White Lions: Born Wild - Episode 1: Against all Odds
programme.desc: The two sisters are born as white as snow in May 2009 in South Africa’s Kruger Park. Growing up in this vast, wild wilderness they must not only overcome the same survival challenges that all young lion cubs face, they must also overcome the threats their high visibility brings. In the African bush, anything unusual stands out and is often eliminated by eagle-eyed predators. Will our cubs survive? The odds are stacked against them – 80 percent of all newborn lion cubs don’t make it to adulthood.

programme.title: White Lions: Born Wild
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 White Lions: Born Wild - Episode 2: Fight for Survival
programme.desc: ‘White Lions – Born Wild’ is a true wildlife story, with strong characters and closely studied behaviour. We follow the cubs’ progress as they embark on the pathway to adulthood, learning to hunt, learning to avoid danger, learning to live in their white coats. This is a strong behaviour-led film, a coming-of-age story of a very rare and unusual pair of lions. Through their eyes, we learn what it is really like to be a lion in Africa.

programme.title: Dust And Stripes
programme.desc: In a never-ending quest for grass and water, the striped herds undertake an annual epic trek across the vast lunar landscape of the Kalahari’s Makgadikgadi Pans. Most of the year, the Makgadikgadi is an inhospitable wasteland of windswept, salt-encrusted pans. For the area’s water-dependent zebra, the Boteti River on the western edge of the pans is a dry-season lifeline. However, it is also a death trap, with lions waiting in ambush and crocodiles lurking in dark riverside caves.

programme.title: Masai Mara: The Big Hunt
programme.desc: When food supply in the Serengeti dwindles, the Masai Mara is a paradise for predators. As the black wildebeests, gazelles, zebras and antelopes make their yearly trip from the south of the Serengeti to the north, nature’s best laid trap, the Mara River in Kenya is waiting ahead. Captivating shots filmed under water show how crocodiles prepare for the Big Hunt while other predators lurk on the banks awaiting their bounty. The biggest problems for the migratory animals are the Mara and the Tarek River, where they have to put their lives at risk to get to the other side. A great number of them die as they jump into the river and break their legs, while others are carried away by the drift...

programme.title: Close up with Hippos
programme.desc: This nature documentary shows the many different sides of the Hippo’s lives on one September day in two iconic African locations: the Masai Mara-Nationalpark in Kenya, also the setting for the largest annual animal migration on the planet – one and a half million wildebeests and zebras migrate from the Serengeti to Kenya during this time.

programme.title: Strandwolf
programme.desc: She moves through the seal colony on Namibia’s wild Skeleton Coast with purpose and focus, gingerly stepping around the adults who snap at her heels. She’s searching for smaller prey. Following her is a young German field scientist, Ingrid Wiesel, who has now spent 17 years with Tosca’s clan; tracking, observing, and learning everything she can about one of the world’s least understood and most unusual predators.

programme.title: The Dying King
programme.desc: In the open wilderness of Africa, there are only 20.000 lions living a free life. In the last decade, humans have killed hundreds of thousands– mostly for purely hunting purposes. In the last couple of years, a new industry has developed called the canned hunting, where animals are bred for 4-5 years then released into a confined area. This confined area is created for the sole purpose optimizing the odds of the hunter obtaining a kill. The corpse of the dead, often male, lion is thereby treated as a trophy. Tourists pay up to 40, 000 USD for this privilege.

programme.title: The Incredible Five - A Cheetahs Tale
programme.desc: Cheetahs are the high-speed hunters of the Savannah. Few attempt to take on larger prey than gazelles or smallish antelopes. But on occasion, the predatory cats reveal their surprisingly different side. In the Northern Serengeti, a group of male cheetahs emerges and turns all we know about them upside down. Males are usually loners or live in small groups, but here we have five tomcats hunting together as one. It is actually, the largest alliance of the animals ever seen! This film has many stories to tell about the sleek hunters.

programme.title: The Original Fight Club: Animal Fights Caught on Camera
programme.desc: There are many reasons for animals to fight and each have their own weapons and rules of combat. They rarely fight without good reason: usually to defend a patch, secure a meal or to attract a mate. With so many reasons for warfare, life can be a never ending battle – for all creatures no matter how great or small, life is a struggle – but they endure – perhaps because there is a fighter in us all …

programme.title: Lions On The Move
programme.desc: Kevin Richardson shares an extraordinary bond with Africa’s most fearsome predators. Together with them, he has experienced some real adventures. However, transporting 27 lions and 14 hyenas to a new home presents a different challenge.The lions new home will be a sanctuary on the edge of Dinokeng, a South African game reserve spanning 18,000 square metres. The huge task ahead includes planning and designing the new enclosures, and securing permits to move the animals.

programme.title: Lions On The Move
programme.desc: Not only are the animals regularly rotated into new enclosures to prevent repetitive behaviour developing out of boredom, but Kevin also has to practice loading them in and out of the van. Can the reluctant lions and hyenas eventually be persuaded to get on board with the move?

programme.title: Elephants: Back to the Wild
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Elephants: Back to the Wild: The Orphanage of Elephants - Nairobi Nationalpark
programme.desc: We follow the rescue of a baby elephant. Once rescued, it will be transported by plane to the breeding station and raised with love and commitment. In order to satisfy the little pachyderm’s urge to move while in the breeding station, there is sometimes an adorable football match between the animals.

programme.title: Elephants: Back to the Wild
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Elephants: Back to the Wild: The Return of the Elephants - Tsavo-East-Nationalpark
programme.desc: We accompany the first steps of a two-year-old elephant who is just starting his release program. We also observe the story of two young elephants in their first night in the wilderness on their own. Captivating film footage allows us to truly learn how elephants behave in the wild.

programme.title: The Cape of Wild Animals, Episode 5
programme.desc: The movie focuses on committed animal rights activists, who fight for the lives of their charges every day, in diverse protection projects and rescue centres along the South African Garden Route.

programme.title: White Lions: Born Wild
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 White Lions: Born Wild - Episode 1: Against all Odds
programme.desc: The two sisters are born as white as snow in May 2009 in South Africa’s Kruger Park. Growing up in this vast, wild wilderness they must not only overcome the same survival challenges that all young lion cubs face, they must also overcome the threats their high visibility brings. In the African bush, anything unusual stands out and is often eliminated by eagle-eyed predators. Will our cubs survive? The odds are stacked against them – 80 percent of all newborn lion cubs don’t make it to adulthood.

programme.title: White Lions: Born Wild
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 White Lions: Born Wild - Episode 2: Fight for Survival
programme.desc: ‘White Lions – Born Wild’ is a true wildlife story, with strong characters and closely studied behaviour. We follow the cubs’ progress as they embark on the pathway to adulthood, learning to hunt, learning to avoid danger, learning to live in their white coats. This is a strong behaviour-led film, a coming-of-age story of a very rare and unusual pair of lions. Through their eyes, we learn what it is really like to be a lion in Africa.

programme.title: Dust And Stripes
programme.desc: In a never-ending quest for grass and water, the striped herds undertake an annual epic trek across the vast lunar landscape of the Kalahari’s Makgadikgadi Pans. Most of the year, the Makgadikgadi is an inhospitable wasteland of windswept, salt-encrusted pans. For the area’s water-dependent zebra, the Boteti River on the western edge of the pans is a dry-season lifeline. However, it is also a death trap, with lions waiting in ambush and crocodiles lurking in dark riverside caves.

programme.title: Masai Mara: The Big Hunt
programme.desc: When food supply in the Serengeti dwindles, the Masai Mara is a paradise for predators. As the black wildebeests, gazelles, zebras and antelopes make their yearly trip from the south of the Serengeti to the north, nature’s best laid trap, the Mara River in Kenya is waiting ahead. Captivating shots filmed under water show how crocodiles prepare for the Big Hunt while other predators lurk on the banks awaiting their bounty. The biggest problems for the migratory animals are the Mara and the Tarek River, where they have to put their lives at risk to get to the other side. A great number of them die as they jump into the river and break their legs, while others are carried away by the drift...

programme.title: Close up with Hippos
programme.desc: This nature documentary shows the many different sides of the Hippo’s lives on one September day in two iconic African locations: the Masai Mara-Nationalpark in Kenya, also the setting for the largest annual animal migration on the planet – one and a half million wildebeests and zebras migrate from the Serengeti to Kenya during this time.

programme.title: Strandwolf
programme.desc: She moves through the seal colony on Namibia’s wild Skeleton Coast with purpose and focus, gingerly stepping around the adults who snap at her heels. She’s searching for smaller prey. Following her is a young German field scientist, Ingrid Wiesel, who has now spent 17 years with Tosca’s clan; tracking, observing, and learning everything she can about one of the world’s least understood and most unusual predators.

programme.title: The Dying King
programme.desc: In the open wilderness of Africa, there are only 20.000 lions living a free life. In the last decade, humans have killed hundreds of thousands– mostly for purely hunting purposes. In the last couple of years, a new industry has developed called the canned hunting, where animals are bred for 4-5 years then released into a confined area. This confined area is created for the sole purpose optimizing the odds of the hunter obtaining a kill. The corpse of the dead, often male, lion is thereby treated as a trophy. Tourists pay up to 40, 000 USD for this privilege.

programme.title: mareTV: Mexicos Caribbean Coast
programme.desc: The palm tree laden beaches on Mexicos Riviera Maya on the Yucatan peninsula are endless, and the turquoise sea with its gentle Caribbean surf is a warm 25 degrees during the mild winter in this part of the world. Between Cancún and Punta Allen, where once there was little more than bushland and a few sleepy fishing villages, vibrant life has evolved during the past three decades. Richard Sowa has lived on a floating island for the past 15 years: an island he built himself out of empty plastic bottles. The bon vivant him-self sees it as a "solution for our planets refuse problem". Off Punta Allen, a village in the bay of Sian Kaan, Mexican Mara Coral Ley and her cousin Kim, continue to...

programme.title: mareTV: The Caribbean for explorers: St. Vincent and the Grenadines
programme.desc: Much more Caribbean than on the islands of St. Vincent and the Grenadines is hardly possible. Deserted beaches, uninhabited islands, lush vegetation, the 33 islands in total are dreamlike with extremely hospitable inhabitants. Miranda Phillips runs a laundry and water boat on Bequia. Every morning, the 32-year-old navigates from yacht to yacht with her small bright green service vehicle and is already expected by most skippers. Miranda promises radiantly fresh laundry, which she delivers again the same day. And so there is always something going on in her tiny laundrette in the harbour. It turns into a karaoke bar in the evening, because that is Mirandas great passion. Eban Olliver has...

programme.title: Caribbean sisters: The Lesser Antilles St. Kitts and Nevis
programme.desc: In the centre of the Caribbean, volcanoes rise steeply from the sea, thus shaping the sister islands of St. Kitts and Nevis. Their slopes, covered in lush rainforests, snow-white, sandy beaches and the surrounding tur-quoise tinted waters provide the ultimate setting for this record-breaking, albeit tiny island paradise: Both islets are the smallest of the Caribbean dwarf states and also rank among the world’s ten smallest states. A hot pepper sauce, made of a creative mixture of ginger, garlic, thyme and extraordinarily hot chillies that thrive in the hot and humid climate of Nevis, is simmering on the stove of Violet and Llewellyn’s house. Lemmy Pemberton digs up abandoned turtle nests...

programme.title: I Got a Monster: Americas Most Corrupt Police Squad
programme.desc: Retells in highly dramatic fashion one of the USAs biggest police corruption scandals. In 2017, Baltimore was rocked by the Federal indictment of Wayne Jenkins, a highly decorated supercop and leader of the Baltimore Police Departments elite Gun Trace Task Force along with six other members on racketeering charges.

programme.title: OJ25
programme.desc: The Trials and Tribulations of Det. Lange: The defense goes after one of the lead detectives.

programme.title: OJ25
programme.desc: Racism in Uniform: The defense takes dead aim at Detective Mark Fuhrmans troubled history with African-Americans.

programme.title: Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.desc: No one knows why actress Lana Clarkson decided to go to music producer Phil Spectors home for a nightcap, but they do know that by the end of the night she was dead.

programme.title: Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.desc: People couldnt imagine what made Erik and Lyle Menendez brutally murder their parents. The prosecution said it was greed. The defense said something much darker.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: A single mother in Saskatchewan visits a hospital in the midst of a panic attack.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: An aging hippy is going through bad times. His wife left him for a lesbian lover, taking their kids. His cancer, once in remission, has seemingly returned.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: Bored at home, a retiree takes a job at a 24-hour convenience store.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime

programme.title: The Red Knights

programme.title: Coronado Del Soul, Part 1
programme.desc: The Baywatch lifeguards travel to San Diego for a week where Summer is haunted by a ghost.

programme.title: Coronado Del Soul, Part 2
programme.desc: Adrift in the ocean with his semi-conscious brother, Mitch struggles to keep them both alive.

programme.title: Mirror, Mirror
programme.desc: A beautiful woman and her plain sister compete for Mitchs affection with perilous results.

programme.title: The Falcon Manifesto
programme.desc: A reporter puts her life at risk to publish a story. Can the Baywatch team help her stay alive?

programme.title: Western Exposure
programme.desc: Country singer Jessie Lee Harris pays a visit to Baywatch in search of his estranged wife and son.

programme.title: The Life You Save
programme.desc: Matt and Summer volunteer their time when cutbacks put the Baywatch lifeguards’ jobs in jeopardy.

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: Stephanie spends a week with the Coast Guard to help them crack a dangerous arms smuggling ring.

programme.title: Guys and Dolls
programme.desc: Matt doesnt know whose story to believe when he tries to reunite a runaway teen and her father.

programme.title: Rescue Bay
programme.desc: A Hollywood producer desperate for a new TV series idea observes a Baywatch rescue.

programme.title: Livin on the Fault, Part 1
programme.desc: After a minor earthquake, a geological survey team arrives at Baywatch, but trouble strikes again.

programme.title: Livin on the Fault, Part 2
programme.desc: Stephanie and the geological team are trapped underwater by a massive earthquake!

programme.title: Aftershock
programme.desc: After the earthquake which almost took his life, Hobie leaves California to live with his mother.

programme.title: Baja Run
programme.desc: John Cort shows up at headquarters and convinces Mitch to compete in a dune buggy race.

programme.title: Air Buchannon
programme.desc: Mitch has to work a 24-hour shift with Stephanie and Hobie is pressured into throwing a house party.

programme.title: Shortsighted
programme.desc: Hobie befriends a boy who has moved to California to live with his father after his mothers death.

programme.title: Someone to Baywatch Over You
programme.desc: Mitch helps a woman he calls “The Mermaid” who turns out to be the wife of a crime boss.

programme.title: K-Gas The Grooveyard of Solid Gold
programme.desc: The Baywatch team is put on high alert when thousands of reckless treasure hunters storm the beach.

programme.title: Red Wind
programme.desc: When the hot Santa Ana winds move in from the desert, things start heating up on the Baywatch beach.

programme.title: I Spike
programme.desc: A lifeguard-turned-hovercraft expert introduces new technology to the Baywatch team.

programme.title: Silent Night Baywatch Night, Part 1
programme.desc: Matt and Hobie rescue a young boy who is being harassed by a thug and take care of him.

programme.title: Silent Night Baywatch Night, Part 2
programme.desc: Joey joins Mitch and Hobie in decorating for Christmas. Father Ryan falls in love with CJ.

programme.title: Rubber Ducky
programme.desc: Logans visa is soon to expire. Can he get his green card before he gets sent back to Australia?

programme.title: Homecoming
programme.desc: Stephanie is kidnapped by an eco-terrorist. The Baywatch team must rescue her and save the day.

programme.title: Seize the Day
programme.desc: Mitch proposes to Tracy, but the happy moment is short-lived as she reveals she is terminal ill.

programme.title: A Little Help From My Friends
programme.desc: Mitch is still mourning Tracy’s death, so Hobie seeks help from a radio show to help Mitch recover.

programme.title: Fathers Day
programme.desc: Mitch receives a mysterious package his father had put together before he died.

programme.title: Fire With Fire
programme.desc: Andy, an old friend of Mitch, visits Baywatch to complete four days of lifeguard service.

programme.title: Deep Trouble
programme.desc: Matt and CJ stumble upon a homeless man who shockingly turns out to be someone they know very well.

programme.title: Promised Land
programme.desc: When testing out a new flying machine, Mitch spots a makeshift raft with a stranded woman in it.

programme.title: The Runaways
programme.desc: Prominent British businessman Richard Branson visits Baywatch to perform several risky stunts.

programme.title: Wet and Wild
programme.desc: Hobie’s idol comes to the beach, but Mitch is furious he turns out to have some questionable morals.

programme.title: Trapped Beneath the Sea, Part 1
programme.desc: Mitch considers a new career working with Garner as a private eye. Logan cheats on Caroline again.

programme.title: Trapped Beneath the Sea, Part 2
programme.desc: When a crippled oil rig sinks and floods with water, the team begins a desperate rescue effort.

programme.title: Hot Stuff
programme.desc: Kaye asks Hobie to volunteer at a school for young blind children.

programme.title: Surfs Up
programme.desc: Cody and Neely rescue two surfers that fall ill due to a highly polluted beach.

programme.title: To Everything There is a Season
programme.desc: Mitchs mother arrives in town and, after some strange occurrences, he insists she see a doctor.

programme.title: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: Stephanie, CJ, and Caroline go on a girls-only junior lifeguard trip to Catalina.

programme.title: Face of Fear
programme.desc: Hobies new friend Isaac’s risky behavior causes problems for the lifeguards.

programme.title: Hit and Run
programme.desc: Logan borrows Codys car without permission and has an accident, then lies to the police.

programme.title: Home is Where the Heat is
programme.desc: Matt returns to Baywatch and ends up trapped on a yacht with Neely and a group of ruthless pirates.

programme.title: Sweet Dreams
programme.desc: Logan and Caroline’s relationship hits a new low when Caroline returns his engagement ring.

programme.title: The Incident
programme.desc: Caroline blames herself for a teens death in a fiery nighttime boating accident and gets PTSD.

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A mysterious creature begins attacking beachgoers, and it is up to the Baywatch team to find it.

programme.title: Desperate Encounter
programme.desc: Logan must help his friend raise $50,000 to keep her ranch, and Jessie Lee Harris is back to help.

programme.title: Baywatch Angels
programme.desc: Stephanie, Caroline and CJ become Charlie’s Angels in a fun fantasy romp through 70s television.

programme.title: Bash at the Beach
programme.desc: CJ rescues pro wrestler Hulk Hogan, who is in town with Randy Savage to help save a Youth Center.

programme.title: Freefall
programme.desc: Mitch is convinced by Stephanies boyfriend Tom to go sky-surfing but things go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Sail Away
programme.desc: Stephanie is recruiting lifeguards for the annual Sailing Regatta against South Bay.

programme.title: Lost and Found
programme.desc: Mitch and Caroline rescue a woman who gets amnesia while trying to find her father.

programme.title: Forbidden Paradise, Part 1
programme.desc: The team is invited to Hawaii for a week to oversee new lifeguard techniques and relax a bit.

programme.title: Forbidden Paradise, Part 2
programme.desc: After Matt is stung by a poisonous fish they find a village where a young woman offers to help.

programme.title: Last Wave
programme.desc: Kaye is reunited with old flame Wes Masters. Stephanie undergoes surgery for melanoma.

programme.title: Go for the Gold
programme.desc: While in search of underwater treasure, Stephanie and Cody are confronted by drug smugglers.

programme.title: Shark Fever
programme.desc: Logan decides to write and direct a low-budget action film at the beach using a real shark.

programme.title: The Contest
programme.desc: When Mitch Judges the Miss Malibu Beach Bikini Contest his willpower is tested.

programme.title: Liquid Assets
programme.desc: Max, a secretly rich homeless eccentric man, suddenly dies and leaves CJ his fortune.

programme.title: Windswept
programme.desc: At the annual Baywatch Bachelor Auction, Mitch is "bought" for $5,000 by a wealthy socialite.

programme.title: Scorcher
programme.desc: LA is in the throes of a severe heat wave! Hundreds of thousands of people head to the beach.

programme.title: Beachblast
programme.desc: Mitch hires MTV DJ Jenny McCarthy to throw "Beachblast" to raise money for the Special Olympics.

programme.title: Guess Whos Coming to Dinner
programme.desc: CJs mother, a former Las Vegas showgirl, arrives in town to get away from her mobster ex-boyfriend.

programme.title: Let the Games Begin
programme.desc: Australias Uncle Tobys International Ironman Competition sparks a battle of the sexes.

programme.title: Buried
programme.desc: Controversy generated by Donnas appearance in Playboy magazine divides the Baywatch lifeguards.

programme.title: The Way We Werent
programme.desc: A contemporary comedy about two people who meet just as their previous relationships have imploded in ugly fashion.

programme.title: Off the Menu
programme.desc: A just single, third generation of the big Tortilla Hut chain has to find a new dish for the chain. He meets a cute, superb chef in a New Mexican village restaurant.

programme.title: Someone I Used to Know
programme.desc: An overweight man meets a former classmate on their high school track. As the two grow close and inspire each other, their pasts creep back into their lives and begin to threaten all that they have developed.

programme.title: Bittersweet Monday
programme.desc: An emotional goodbye between longtime best friends begins an unexpected love affair, putting two marriages and many friendships at stake.

programme.title: Long-Distance Princess
programme.desc: A teen (Alicen Evans) faces a dilemma when the boy (Parker Harris) that she likes falls for her friend who lives overseas.

programme.title: Lake Effects
programme.desc: Sara and Lily grew up at Smith Mountain Lake. Sara became estranged from the family and without explanation moved to Los Angeles to study law.

programme.title: Of Dice and Men
programme.desc: The lives of six roleplaying gamer friends are thrown into upheaval when one of them enlists to go to Iraq. A geek movie without the self-loathing.

programme.title: Little Mermaid
programme.desc: A mermaid discovers harsh realities when she leaves the ocean to be with a human she barely knows.

programme.title: Aquarians
programme.desc: A wintertime drama about a seminary student who returns to his hometown and is compelled to reconnect with his estranged brother.

programme.title: Elle: A Modern Cinderella Tale
programme.desc: Elle (Ashlee Hewitt) is a girl who wants to be a singer and lives with her uncle, the owner of a small independent record label, after her parents died.

programme.title: Fighting Chance
programme.desc: An MMA fighter who has worked his entire life for a shot at the title must overcome extraordinary trials if he is ever to achieve his dreams and find his true purpose in life.

programme.title: First Responders
programme.desc: After her husband suffers a life-changing fire, trauma therapist Karen Williams discovers the limits of her expertise and must face her own fears while trying to save her marriage.

programme.title: Closer to God: Jessicas Journey
programme.desc: A mothers faith is tested as her daughter dies of cancer and her estranged father returns.

programme.title: Created Equal
programme.desc: An up-and-coming attorney takes on a case to sue the Catholic Church for discrimination against a young woman who desperately wants to become a priest.

programme.title: The Last Page
programme.desc: After being raised--and abused--in the foster-care system, twin brothers find refuge with a group of misfits who turn out to be a violent band of criminals.

programme.title: Rum Runners
programme.desc: Rum Runners is the epic story of two best friends, Vic Hanson and Don Calyer. They get caught running illegal booze across the Canadian border.

programme.title: Cursed
programme.desc: Three housemates, two dead brothers and a deliveryman are forced to live together or die trying.

programme.title: Bad People
programme.desc: A quirky and smart dark comedy, bursting with sex, violence, dirty politics and fame whores, BAD PEOPLE is a hilarious tale that reminds us that we all have a dark side!

programme.title: Texas Heart
programme.desc: A corrupt New York attorney fleeing the mob seeks refuge in a small Texas town where he stumbles upon a powerful reason to do good.

programme.title: Broken Ceiling
programme.desc: When Angela Walker is passed over for yet another promotion, she decides shes going to have to break through the invisible corporate barriers once and for all.

programme.title: Hope Dances
programme.desc: Hope Douglas has a dream but her parents have thrown her into battle between playing sports and dancing ballet.

programme.title: Mum Said
programme.desc: A widower takes his new girlfriend camping to bond with his children but the kids see this as an opportunity to get rid of her.

programme.title: Clarity
programme.desc: When 20-year-old Maggie collapses at a surprise celebration dinner, her family discover that she has a rare genetic kidney disorder.

programme.title: Betrayed
programme.desc: In an effort to control the city the Mayor opens the doors to the Russian Mob. It is not long until he realizes they arent going to follow his rules.

programme.title: Gold Fools
programme.desc: When a successful family man gets laid off, he leads his friends on a gold panning expedition in the mountains of Sonora, oblivious to what lurks where the water runs real deep.

programme.title: TangerineLAnd
programme.desc: Beth Harris is getting married. The only problem is, she already has a husband; pro-surfer, Sonny Baker.

programme.title: Friends, Foes and Fireworks
programme.desc: A group of female friends reunite for a New Year’s Eve celebration but old tensions resurface and past rivalries reignite, causing the night to descend into chaos and sparks and revelations to fly like fireworks.

programme.title: Comfort
programme.desc: A late night courier boy agrees to pick up the feisty daughter of an important client. The two youngsters form a close connection and spend two nights exploring LA’s local food scene while their romance blossoms.

programme.title: No Letting Go
programme.desc: What would you do to save your child? A young teenager struggles with a debilitating mental illness as his mom risks everything to save him without losing the rest of her family.

programme.title: The Day You Found Me
programme.desc: The passage of time does not diminish the childhood connection of two friends, a young boy and girl, bound by a promise.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation.

programme.desc: Officers pursue two brothers after an attempted bank robbery. A confused man with a shotgun calls police after hearing voices. A man asks deputies for a break after they find illegal items in his truck.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A fleeing suspect takes officers on a wild chase through oncoming traffic. Surveillance footage of a stabbing helps police find the vicious attacker. Cops track a subject into an uncooperative stranger’s apartment.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E12 The Car is Mine!
programme.desc: A man locks himself in a trunk after deputies respond to a restraining order call. Deputies respond to two women arguing over the ownership of a car. A driver comes clean to a deputy during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Suspects lead Officers on a reckless car chase on residential streets. Police tend to a woman assaulted by her inebriated friend. A DWI suspect is found relieving himself in a public port-a-potty.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers give chase to a suspect on a bike. The passenger of a vehicle is arrested for possession. Police are given a classic "Im holding it for a friend" excuse.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man is arrested for stealing a large amount of copper wire from a business owner. A bicyclist is charged with possession and public intoxication. A man is pulled over for expired tags.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E22 Barked Up The Wrong Tree
programme.desc: Following a brief slow-speed pursuit, the desperate driver flees on foot. An officer responds to an assault. A dog owner is informed of her dogs mayhem and given a citation.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers recover a small bag of drugs from a crying suspect. A drunk woman hides a second ID in her back pocket. Police stop a vehicle that hit a patrol car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A drug dealer swallows something suspicious as deputies move in to arrest him. Deputies pull over a father with his son in the car. A woman files a kidnapping report against her own boyfriend.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A foot pursuit ends in arrest after a suspected drug dealer attempts to discard his goods. Police are called to a warehouse after the security guard is held at gunpoint. Police assist a young girl after being struck by a car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E29 Who Wet the Dogs Out
programme.desc: Officers are assaulted by the brother of a suspect who is resisting arrest. A resident sprays water on his neighbor’s noisy dogs. Officers recover drugs and cash after pulling over a motorist.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man is captured after appearing on an episode of "Americas Most Wanted". An Officer detains a man for drug possession. Officers serve a search warrant and find four suspects with narcotics in their home.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police follow a car after it leaves a drug house. A police officer in Las Vegas goes undercover posing as a ‘john.’ Officers give chase when they observe a car making an illegal U-Turn.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E13 I’ll Raise My Voice Right Back

programme.title: Cops

programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Voyage of Darwins Beagle: On The Future of Species

programme.title: Part One

programme.title: Powered by Space: Reinventing Space Flight

programme.title: Wiseguy
programme.desc: When Vinnies young cousin, a boxer, is found dead of an apparent drug overdose, Vinnie jeopardizes his cover by going to "legals"-- the coroner, the homicide cops-- to get them moving on what he knows was a murder.

programme.title: Wiseguy

programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Dont Pet The Teacher

programme.title: 21 Jump Street

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: The search for a vengeful woman suspected of murdering two men involved in her sisters cocaine-related death.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall pursue a security guard turned thief as he searches for the money he stole and lost.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Hunter investigates the missing money from an old bust that implicates the police in criminal activity.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: A dispatcher is blackmailed into undermining Hunters and McCalls investigation of a gold robbery.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall find the murdered body of a call girl, and a toddler left unharmed in front of her tv set.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: McCall cant believe that a trauma specialist who once treated her, began drinking again and killed herself.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On May 17th 2005, a body is discovered in a forest of Sucy-en-Brie; Christophe Belle, 40 years old, a renowned pastry cook.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The disturbing missing case in Paris of a four year old.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On October 13th 1996, the body of young Angelique Dumetz, 18 years old, is recovered down a ditch in Oise forest. An important clue is found on the crime scene.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On February 23th 2017, policemen are alerted of the disapearrance of Brigitte Troadec, her husband Pascal, and their children Sebastien and Charlotte.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A Night of Horror at Devils Plateau (Marie-Jeanne Meyer Case) - On June 18, 2011, Marie-Jeanne Meyer, 17-years old, waved goodbye to her little sister before leaving for her daily jog on the heights of Tournon in Ardèche. She never came back. Three days later, her mutilated body was found in a freshly dug pit, near an area known to be cursed, "The Devils Plateau." Whats more, the crime scene looked like a mystical ritual ... Was it a ritual murder? Revenge? An unfortunate encounter? ...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A Mysterious Murder at the Farm (Valerie Bary Case)- On Friday, March 26, 2004, in the region of Dijon, Laurent Bary came home from his work to discover the lifeless body of his wife, Valerie, bathing in a pool of blood. According to the investigators initial findings, the 38-year-old nurses aid had been stabbed several times, seeming to validate the theory of a robbery gone wrong.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On July 13, 2011, two boaters retrieved a suitcase that was floating in the bay of Lorient. Inside, they discovered the tied up corpse of a man.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Bloody Christmas next to the Leman lake (CASE OF RUTH LÉGERET) - On January 4, 2006, Ruth Legeret was found dead in the middle of a pool of blood at her luxurious property in Vevey, Switzerland. Next to her was the lifeless body of her friend, Marina Studer. Who could have killed these two simple and wealthy widows? Clue after clue, the Swiss polices investigation would revolve around an environment of family jealousy and financial greed.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: September 16 2005. The lifeless body of Audrey Jouannet, 24, is found hidden under the bed in her small apartment in Soisy-sur-Seine. It soon becomes apparent that the young woman has been tortured at length before being strangled. But surprisingly, though the highly meticulous murderer has taken care to leave no sign of his passage, the autopsy reveals traces of sperm on the victim. It will take all of the investigators intuition to pierce the mystery of this heinous crime...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Sylvain Dromard finds the body of his wife Laurence lying in a pool of blood in the kitchen. The crime was particularly violent and the theory of a burglary that went wrong is soon excluded. But investigators dont understand who could want the adorable hairdresser of Saint-Martin-dAblois dead. During the investigation, the work of profilers will enable them to draw a very precise portrait of the murderer...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: After an ordinary dinner, Pierre and Gabrielle Labrell suffer severe abdominal pains.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Nelly Cremel, 39, leaves her home to go jogging... never to return. Eight days later, after a vast search campaign, her body is found. Theres no doubt that its murder. The case soon ignites public opinion, even inflaming passions at the highest level of the state. The clues lead investigators on a number of trails, from the shadows of the French secret service to a manhunt for a possible sex maniac, in a case of murder most foul.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Willy Pomonti, a retired architect, is found savagely murdered in his opulent villa in La Celle-Saint-Cloud, near Paris. It soon becomes clear that the man has been tortured prior to death. At several points during this extraordinary enquiry, police will feel theyre holding the culprit... It will take them ten years to finally shed light on this particularly violent crime.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The lifeless body of Christophe Lejard is found by his son just metres from their home. The man was shot in the head as he was getting into his car to go to work. A veritable execution, which at first glance doesnt square with the profile of the quiet family man. Yet behind the appearances, the investigation gradually reveals all the hate and resentment that revolved around the victim.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A man walks into a gendarmerie near Saint-Malo to report that his wife has been missing since the previous day. The couple are going through a divorce, but this mother would never have left her seven children alone! An extensive search is undertaken but the woman cannot be found. What has happened to Adeline Piet? The investigation spans several years and experiences many twists.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The corpse of Priscillia Ciatti, 14, is discovered by the side of a field, a few hundred metres from her family home. The teenager has been stabbed sixty times with a knife and -an extra sordid detail - a devil mask is found next to her body. Was Priscillia the victim of a prowler? A serial killer? A maniac inspired by a horror movie? Investigators soon find that the young girl felt she was being watched, and even threatened...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: In the early hours of the morning, Mathilde Croguennec, 18, attending "Teknival" in Brittany, is found at the foot of a tree with her throat cut. Investigators face the task of finding the killer from among the 43,000 participants of this huge open-air festival of electronic music, where drink and drugs are consumed in abundance. An unusual investigation that leads the police down a number of false avenues.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Arriving at her work, the secretary of a small firm in the suburbs of Geneva finds the body of Jean-Raymond Blatti, the companys new accountant. The man is lying in a pool of blood and, on his belly, the murderer has written "DIRTY RAPIST". Yet Jean-Raymond Blatti was never charged with sexual assault. Over the course of the investigation, this inscription will appear as one of the many mysteries of this case which is particularly rich in twists and turns.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On July 19th 2004, the naked and tied up body of a woman is recovered in the Ourcq canal in Fresnes-sur-Marne. The victim is impossible to identify.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On April 3th 2003, Chantal Ternik, a 48 year old housewife, is discovered hanged in her house of Sanary-sur-Mer, in Var.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On March 28th 2013, the burnt body of Anne Barbot, 38 years old, is discovered in a forest of Maine-et-Loire.

programme.title: Herculaneum Scrolls: Unraveling History
programme.desc: The eruption of Mount Vesuvius is renowned for its decimation of Pompeii, but nearby, an equally impressive Roman settlement known as Herculaneum was lost to history.

programme.title: Herculaneum Scrolls: Unraveling History
programme.desc: The eruption of Mount Vesuvius is renowned for its decimation of Pompeii, but nearby, an equally impressive Roman settlement known as Herculaneum was lost to history.

programme.title: Asteroid Belt Discovery
programme.desc: New evidence from NASAs Dawn mission to Ceres, a dwarf planet the size of Texas.

programme.title: Gravitational Waves
programme.desc: Einstein was correct about gravitational waves. Here is a short primer on these up-to-now only theoretical waves.

programme.title: What is CRISPR?
programme.desc: On July 5, 1996, scientists cloned a sheep, Dolly. Now genetics have advanced to gene editing. Promising to pave the way for curing genetically carried illnesses.

programme.title: The Mystery Of The Longest Living Vertebrate
programme.desc: New information from the eye of the Greenland Shark confirms it is the longest living vertebrate on Earth.

programme.title: Exoplanets
programme.desc: NASA may have just gotten one step closer to answering the question: are we alone? The Spitzer Telescope has made a groundbreaking discovery of exoplanets.

programme.title: Cassini: The Grand Finale
programme.desc: Twenty years after its launch, we bid farewell to the Cassini spacecraft as it plunges into Saturn’s atmosphere in a planned death spiral.

programme.title: Gravitational Waves: Rewinding Time
programme.desc: Gravitational waves from three billion light years away have reached Earth -- the latest discovery from a new branch of astronomy.

programme.title: The Eighth Continent: Zealandia
programme.desc: Geologists in New Zealand created a stir earlier this year when they declared their discovery of the eighth continent of the world. Learn how was it formed and how something so massive could remain undetected until now.

programme.title: Homo Naledi
programme.desc: Discovered in 2013, new and puzzling finding of small-skulled fossils of Homo naledi.

programme.title: The Earliest Americans
programme.desc: New evidence suggests humans arrived in North America far earlier than previously thought, and that they may have traveled along paths now buried deep beneath the sea.

programme.title: Reversing Alzheimers
programme.desc: As the number of people affected by Alzheimers Disease continues to grow at an unprecedented pace, researchers worldwide are racing to discover a cure.

programme.title: Asteroids, Comets, and Meteors
programme.desc: How do these objects differ from one another, if at all? Nick Moskovitz, an astronomer at the Lowell Observatory, compares these two space solar system bodies.

programme.title: Mars InSight: Seven Minutes to Touchdown
programme.desc: The fate of the Mars InSight lander will all come down to a fiery seven-minute freefall into the Red Planet. Will it survive?

programme.title: New Horizons: The Kuiper Belt Target
programme.desc: The New Horizons spacecraft revolutionized our understanding of the solar system as it rocketed past Pluto. Now, the craft approaches its next target…Ultima Thule.

programme.title: Direct From An Asteroid
programme.desc: The Hayabusa2 spacecraft has just completed one of the most intricate procedures in space exploration.

programme.title: Little Foot: Exploring Our Origins
programme.desc: One of the oldest known hominins in southern Africa. An almost complete skeleton dates back more than three million years.

programme.title: Recovering From Extinction
programme.desc: How long does it take for life to rebound after a major mass extinction? Scientists in Svalbard dig through fossil clues for surprising revelations about our Earths history.

programme.title: Shark Family Tree
programme.desc: Great white sharks are one of the most feared predators on Earth, and yet we know very little about them. Science is now revealing the mysteries.

programme.title: Fixing A Broken Heart
programme.desc: Heart disease is the number one cause of deaths worldwide, but there are researchers frantically working to change that. Meet the people inventing the future of cardia...

programme.desc: The way we fly is about to change, driven by a new breed of aviators not afraid to think differently. Could the days of the jet age be numbered?

programme.title: Fusion
programme.desc: It is the greatest technological challenge ever undertaken by humankind. The quest to produce the ultimate energy solution‚ Fusion.

programme.title: Tidal
programme.desc: The power of the oceans tides is the last great untapped energy source on Earth. Teams of engineers race to perfect the technology to harness the vast flows of water.

programme.title: Maritime
programme.desc: Shipping companies and engineers are creating new machines to make their industry greener using a resource that has moved man across oceans for thousands of years...Wind.

programme.title: The Bermondsey Horror
programme.desc: In 1849, a man suddenly disappeared in Bermondsey. The discovery that he had been brutally murdered enraptured the press and the public.

programme.title: In The Shadow Of Jack
programme.desc: At the time of Jack The Ripper, London was home to some of the most terrible individuals the city has ever seen. One of the very worst was the elusive Borough Poisoner.

programme.title: Finding Dr. Crippen
programme.desc: Having killed his wife and buried her in the basement, Dr. Crippen believed he had escaped on a ship to Canada. But the police managed to hunt him down.

programme.title: The Brides In The Bath Killer
programme.desc: George Smith had many aliases. He needed them for his many wives who he would soon murder in order to claim the inheritance.

programme.title: Terror In The Roaring Twenties
programme.desc: Edith Thompson and Frederick Bywaters were in love. But the young couple was convicted for murdering her husband in a case that shocked society and fascinated Hitchcock.

programme.title: Part 1: Rise of Civilization
programme.desc: In the region that includes the Mediterranean, the Aegean, Mesopotamia and Egypt, the Bronze Age arrived about 3000 BC and lasted nearly 2000 years. What singled out this period and the new societies and cities that emerged? The development of formal writing is one among several important factors.

programme.title: Part 2: Masters Of Trade
programme.desc: Trade, and in particular trade in luxury goods, drove the commerce economies of the Bronze Age. This is the time when the first super powers in history, Egypt and Mesopotamia, emerge and dominate the "world" stage of the Mediterranean and Aegean seas and surrounding areas.

programme.title: Part 3: Conquest And Collapse
programme.desc: The Bronze Age had the first large urban centers, powerful kingdoms and armies, writing, and trade routes across vast areas. What led to the collapse of the city-state entities and the end of the Bronze Age? Possibly a perfect storm of uncontrollable factors that are still being researched.

programme.title: Episode 1: The Rise Of Civilization
programme.desc: About 8,000 BC, in a few select places some people begin to experiment with a new way of harvesting energy. They’re growing their own crops.

programme.title: Episode 2: The Age Of Discovery
programme.desc: Columbus has no idea that because of Earth’s geology and geography he wont get to his destination…or how that failure made his voyage one of the most influential.

programme.title: Episode 3: The Industrial Revolution And Modern Warfare
programme.desc: How do prehistoric forests link to the development of steam engines, and the rise of modern industry?

programme.title: Black Coal, Thin Ice
programme.desc: Pohjois-Kiinassa vuonna 1999 eraassa pikkukaupungissa loydetaan useita ruumiita. Kaksi poliisivirkailijaa kuolee ja yksi loukkaantuu vakavasti verisessa yhteenotossa, kun epailtya murhaajaa yritetaan ottaa kiinni. Eloon jaanyt poliisi Zhang Zili joutuu luopumaan virastaan ja loytaa tyopaikan tehtaan vartijana. Viisi vuotta myohemmin tapahtuu jalleen useita mysteerisia murhia. Entinen kollega apunaan Zhang alkaa itse tutkia tapausta. Palkitun ohjaajan Diao Yinanin kolmas elokuva on film noir -trilleri, jonka paaosissa esiintyvat Fan Liao, Lun Mei Gwei ja Xuebing Wang. Elokuva voitti vuoden 2014 Berliinin elokuvajuhlien Kultaisen karhun ja Hopeisen karhun.

programme.title: Main Street
programme.desc: Pohjois-Carolinassa sijaitsevan pikkukaupungin kuviot menevat uusiksi, kun kaupunkiin muuttaa karismaattinen muukalainen. Han suunnittelee kuolevan kaupungin elvyttamista, mutta suunnitelmat eivat ole kaikkien asukkaiden mieleen. Ainakaan mikaan ei palaa enaa ennalleen...

programme.title: Jimmy P.
programme.desc: Huolestunut Amerikan alkuperaisasukas muodostaa poikkeuksellisen ystavyyden ranskalaisen psykoanalyytikon kanssa, kun he yrittavat loytaa parannuskeinon karsimykselleen.

programme.title: Beatrix Potter
programme.desc: Han on ihastuttanut monia sukupolvia, mutta hanen elamansa on ollut salaisuus. Tahan saakka. Beatrix Potter on 30-vuotias sinkkunainen aikana, jolloin naisen kunnioitettavin tehtava on menna hyviin naimisiin. Kukaan, ei edes Beatrixin oma perhe, ymmarra sita, etta Beatrix haluaa mieluummin piirtaa ja kertoa tarinoita elaimista. Kaikki menee pieleen, kun Beatrix tapaa kokemattoman kustantajan Norman Waynen, joka rakastuu korviaan myoten niin Beatrixin ainutlaatuisiin tarinoihin kuin itse Beatrixiinkin. Beatrix joutuu mahdottomaan tilanteeseen, jossa hanen pitaa irrottautua perheen tukahduttavasta otteesta.

programme.title: Laitakaupungin valot
programme.desc: Laitakaupungin valot kertoo yovartijana tyoskentelevasta Koistisesta, joka joutuu petoksen uhriksi. Laitakaupungin valot oli mukana vuoden 2006 Cannesin elokuvajuhlien kansainvalisessa kilpasarjassa. Elokuva palkittiin parhaan elokuvan Jussi-palkinnolla vuonna 2007. Lisaksi Timo Salminen voitti Jussin parhaasta kuvauksesta ja Markku Patila parhaasta lavastuksesta.

programme.title: Paamies
programme.desc: Eras poika nakee mafia-asianajajan murhan ja saa tietaa salaisuuden, jota suojatakseen roistot ovat valmiit tappamaan.

programme.title: Rules Dont Apply
programme.desc: Hollywoodissa vuonna 1958 nayttelijattaren (Lily Collins) ja hanen autonkuljettajansa (Alden Ehrenreich) valinen vetovoima koettelee heidan uskonnollista vakaumustaan ja uhmaa heidan pomonsa Howard Hughesin (Warren Beatty) saantoa, joka kieltaa heita tapailemasta. Beattyn ohjaaman (ja Beattyn ja Bo Goldmanin kasikirjoittaman) draamakomedian tahtia ovat myos Annette Bening ja Matthew Broderick.

programme.title: The Dresser
programme.desc: Eraana kohtalokkaana iltana pienessa englantilaisessa paikallisteatterissa toisen maailmansodan aikana joukko kiertavia nayttelijoita esittaa Shakespearen naytelman "Kuningas Lear".

programme.title: Equals
programme.desc: Utopistisessa maailmassa, missa vakivalta ja rikollisuus on kitketty poistamalla ihmisten tunteet geneettisesti, eletaan Nian ja Silasin tavoin rauhallista ja yksitoikkoista elamaa. Tyopaikallaan tiedotusmateriaalien tuotantolaitoksessa he vaihtavat tyotoverien kesken ainoastaan kohteliaisuuksia. Elama on yksinkertaista kunnes huhu tartunnasta, jonka seurauksena ihminen nayttaa tunteensa, leviaa. Sairastuneet lahetetaan pois, eika heita nahda enaa koskaan. Silas epailee kantavansa tartuntaa, ja asian vahvistuttua hanesta tulee hylkio. Silti han tuntee vetoa Niaan, joka on myos saanut tartunnan, mutta onnistuu salaamaan oireensa.

programme.title: Boys on the Side
programme.desc: Vauhdikkaassa komediassa kolme naista tekee vahingossa rikoksen ja joutuu lahtemaan karkuteille. Naiset lahtevat taipaleelle koko maan halki, ja matkan aikana he kokevat jotain heille ennalta tuntematonta: yhteenkuuluvuuden tunnetta ja ystavyytta.

programme.title: Palo Alto
programme.desc: April on lukioikainen tytto, jonka arkea rytmittaa koulun lisaksi jalkapallotreenit ja kavereiden jarjestamat bileet. Varautuneen ja hiljaisen ulkokuoren alle katkeytyy haaveilijasielu, jonka aani ei aina kantaudu hottoisan aidin tai eksentrisen isapuolen korviin. Romanssin ontuessa lukiokaveri Teddyyn kipina tuntuu kuitenkin loytyvan Aprilin ja taman jalkapallovalmentajan yhteisista hetkista.

programme.title: Kohtalokas Syrjahyppy (Unfaithful)
programme.desc: Edward ja Connie Sumner ovat keski-ikainen pariskunta, jotka elavat amerikkalaista unelmaa New Yorkin esikaupunkialueella. Naennaisesti onnellisesti naimisissa olevien Sumnerien, joilla on kahdeksanvuotias poika, koira ja taloudenhoitaja, hiljainen maailma murtuu, kun satunnainen kohtaaminen muukalaisen kanssa vetaa Connien suhteeseen, joka voisi merkita enemman kuin vain avioliiton paattymista. KOHTALOKAS SYRJÄHYPPY on eroottinen trilleri syyllisyydesta ja raivosta, joka kysyy vaikeimpia kysymyksia kaikista suhteista.

programme.title: On Aika Tappaa
programme.desc: Elokuvan ohjaaja on Joel Schumacher (Batman Forever, Paamies). Sandra Bullock, Samuel L. Jackson, Matchew McConaughey ja Kevin Spacey esittavat paaosia murhaoikeudenkaynnissa, joka nostaa pienen mississippilaiskaupungin rotujannitteet valokeilaan. Aktivistimarssien, Ku Kluz Klanin hirmuvallan, mediarummutuksen ja vakivaltaisten mellakoiden keskella kokematon, mutta idealistinen nuori asianajaja jarjestaa aj atuksia herattavan oikeussalitaistelun oikeuden puolesta. Loisteliaasseen nayttelijakaartiin kuuluvat myos Breda Fricker, Oliver Platt, CharlesS. Dutton, Ashley Judd, Patrick McGoohan, Chris Cooper ja seka Donald etta Kiefer Sutherland.

programme.title: Shattered Glass
programme.desc: Hayden Christensen nayttelee tassa kriitikoiden ylistamassa tarinassa hapaistysta toimittajasta, jonka on ohjannut ja kirjoittanut Billy Ray, CAPTAIN PHILLIPSISTÄ Oscar-ehdokkuuden saanut kirjoittaja. Kun kuuluisa toimittaja Stephen Glass (Christensen) joutuuu Forbes.com toimittajan (Steve Zahn) tutkinnan alle, paljastuu etta Glass on keksinyt monet hanen tunnetuimmista tarinoista, joka johtaa hanen tuhoonsa tassa mukaansatempaavassa, tositarinassa.

programme.title: Varg
programme.desc: Varg on elamaa suurempi tarina Ruotsin ja Norjan rajalla asuvasta Klemensista (Peter Stomare) ja taman sisarenpojasta, Nejlasta.
Nuoren kirjailijan on hyvaksyttava kuolevaisuutensa kun hanella todetaan harvinainen syopa.Parhaan ystavansa ja empaattisen nuoren terapeutin avulla han loytaa rohkeuden taistella sairautta vastaan.

programme.title: Kesahetket (Summer Hours)
programme.desc: Helène on suvun matriarkka, joka on omistanut elamansa taiteen ja antiikkiesineiden keraamiselle. Kun hanen elamansa lopulta paattyy, hanen kolme lastaan saavat suuren perinnon kauniin vanhan maalaistalon ja kaiken siihen kuuluvan muodossa, mutta lapset ovat kaikkea muuta kuin yhta mielta siita, miten perintokohteita tulisi hallita. Kesahetket on Kultainen palmu -voittaja Olivier Assayasin vakeva perhedraama, jonka rooleissa nahdaan Juliette Binoche, Charles Berling ja Jeremie Renier.

programme.title: The Greatest
programme.desc: Allen ja Grace Brewerin vanhin poika on kuollut auto-onnettomuudessa. Yhtakkiaovikello soi, ja oven takana on Rose. Han vaittaa tunteneensa pojan ja kantavansahanen lastaan. Tieto saa perheen etaantymaan toisistaan. Voiko kauheista onnettomuuksista seurata kuitenkin jotain hyvaa?

programme.title: Paluu Yorkshireen
programme.desc: Arthur Morrison (Jim Broadbent) saa tietaa, etta hanella on syopa ja vain muutama viikko aikaa elaa. Hanen vanhin poikansa Blake (Oscar-voittaja* Colin Firth) muuttaa Yorkshireen aitinsa luokse, kylaan jossa han syntyi. Kun Arthurin tila heikkenee, Blake puntaroi suhdettaan isaansa. Han muistaa yhteiset hetket, heidan laheisyytensa ja heidan erimielisyytensa. Kun isa kuolee, Blake alkaa muistella heidan valista sidetta – ristiriitoja, turhautumisia, rakkautta ja menetyksia, jotka kaikki kuuluvat monimutkaiseen suhteeseen isan ja pojan valilla.

programme.title: The Good Heart
programme.desc: Kohtalo ja viides sydankohtaus heittavat akaisen, mutta sydamellisen Jacquesin elamaan nuoren Lucasin, jolle mies paattaa luovuttaa baarinsa asiakkaineen. Naisia ei anniskelupaikassa kaivata, ja miesten ystavyys joutuukin koetukselle Lucasin rakastuessa kauniiseen Apriliin.

programme.title: White Oleander
programme.desc: Astrid on 15-vuotias tytto, jonka elama muuttuu peruuttamattomalla tavalla, kun poliisi saapuu pidattamaan hanen aitiaan. Ingrid-aiti paatyy telkien taakse murhattuaan poikaystavansa ja alaikainen Astrid aloittaa oman kujanjuoksunsa. Sijaiskoti toisensa jalkeen tulee tutuksi kapinalliselle teini-ikaiselle, joka yrittaa epatoivoisesti loytaa oman identiteettinsa ihmisten ja maisemien alati vaihtuessa hanen ymparillaan. Astridin tavatessa pojan nimelta Paul heraa toivo, etta myos ystavyydella ja rakkaudella voisi olla sijaa hanen elamassaan.

programme.title: The Conversation
programme.desc: Elokuva perustuu tositapahtumaan kahden vaikutusvaltaisen miehen tapaamisesta. Heidan filosofiansa ja nakemyksensa maansa tulevaisuudesta olivat hyvin erilaiset. Eletaan vaarallista aikaa, kun sota Balkanilla oli voitettu, natsit kukistettu ja puna-armeija oli lahella. Miesten valinen keskustelu muokkasi maailmaa.

programme.title: Amores Perros
programme.desc: Kauhea auto-onnettomuus yhdistaa kolme tarinaa, joista jokaisessa on mukana hahmoja, jotka kasittelevat menetysta, katumusta ja elaman ankaraa todellisuutta, kaikki rakkauden nimissa.

programme.title: Koston liekki
programme.desc: Rankasti ryyppaava, loppuunpalanut CIA:n agentti John Creasy (Denzel Washington) on luopunut toivosta elamansa suhteen – kunnes hanet palkataan yhdeksanvuotiaan Pita Ramosin (Dakota Fanning) henkivartijaksi. Pala palalta Creasyn sisin alkaa eheytya, mutta kun Pita kidnapataan, paasee Creasyn tukahdutettu raivo valloilleen eika han pysahdy ennen kuin teko on kostettu. Loppuun asti.

programme.title: Candy
programme.desc: Candy (Abbie Cornish) ja Dan (Heath Ledger) rakastavat toisiaan ja heroiinia, joka tuntuu vain lisaavan heidan keskinaista onneaan. Mikaan ei voi menna pieleen, kunhan heilla on toisensa. Avioliitto ja lapsi vain lujittavat sidetta. Mutta vahitellen harmiton tapa saa yliotteen ja uhkaa tuhota pienen paratiisin. Candyn vanhemmat ja Danin ystava Casper (Geoffrey Rush) alkavat menettaa toivonsa pariskunnan vajotessa yha syvemmalle omaan rakkauden ja heroiinin savyttamaan maailmaansa...

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: Dinner Rush
programme.desc: Elokuva sijoittuu Manhattanille, Louis Cropan omistamaan ravintola Gigino Trattoriaan. Louis Cropan poika Udo toimii ravintolan paakokkina, ja on onnistunut saavuttamaan ravintolalle mainetta kokkaustaidoillaan. Louis Cropa ei kuitenkaan ole iloinen aikaisemmin perinteista kotiruokaa tarjoilleen trattoriansa muuttumisesta yhdeksi New Yorkin trendikkaimmista ravintoloista. Omistajan elamantilannetta ei helpota sekaan, etta hanen liikekumppaninsa on vasta vahan aikaan sitten murhattu, ja hanen suojatikseen ottamansa ravintolan apukokki Duncan karsii pahasta peliriippuvuudesta.

programme.title: Going Si-ral
programme.desc: Si discovers Youtube, and, after watching a series of instructional videos, decides he can make something better.

programme.desc: The Robertsons host a Halloween event at Duck Commander.

programme.desc: The Robertsons perform a live nativity for their Church for Christmas.

programme.title: Boomerang Becca
programme.desc: Rebecca returns home from her internship in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Willies Number Two
programme.desc: Willie is looking to hire a new assistant. Korie insists he interview her cousin.

programme.title: Life of Si
programme.desc: Si decides he wants to use the camera to record a day in his life.

programme.title: From Duck til Dawn
programme.desc: When the duck guys have to pull an all-nighter to finish some work, Willie decides he wants to join them. But when a dying smoke detector distracts them from their work.

programme.title: Burger Commander
programme.desc: Willie and Jase get into a debate over which of them cooks the best burger.

programme.title: Termite Be A Problem
programme.desc: Because of a termite problem at Duck Commander, the guys are forced to find a different location to work from--Godwins House.

programme.title: John Luke After Dentist
programme.desc: John Luke and Sadie are getting some dental work done.

programme.title: Scoot Along Si
programme.desc: Si shows up to work on a mobility scooter.

programme.title: Jerky Boys
programme.desc: A decision to try and make some duck jerky leads the boys to Godwins garage and a minibike race.

programme.title: Mind Investigators
programme.desc: On September 2nd 2015, the body of 2 years-old Meline is found in her home. Her father confesses to the murder.

programme.title: The Case
programme.desc: Joël Vaillant, a retired Gendarmerie Colonel, reflects on one of the biggest judicial cases in French history: the Mourmelon disappearances.

programme.title: The Case
programme.desc: Commander Pierrick Guillaume always wanted to be an investigator, just like his father before him.

programme.title: Murder Maps
programme.desc: The 1966 murders of three police officers in Shepherds Bush lead to a huge manhunt and calls for the reinstatement of the death penalty.

programme.title: Murder Maps
programme.desc: The most famous serial killer in history, the man who murdered five women on the streets of Whitechapel - and got away with it.

programme.title: Crime Time Solvers
programme.desc: In Saint-Andeol-Le-Château, Rhône, the Lyon Research Brigade investigates a quadruple homicide where an entire family was killed with the same weapon.

programme.title: Crime Time Solvers
programme.desc: In the wake of a chilling abduction in Remoulins, Nîmes investigators, aided by critical witness testimonies, embarked on a relentless pursuit of a known Belgian offender.

programme.title: The Railway Murders
programme.desc: In 1910, the city of Newcastle was transfixed by a murder trial. A clerk had been killed on a train and his wages bag stolen with hundreds of pounds inside.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The welterweight superfight between former GLORY world champion Endy Semeleer (36-2, 18 KO) and current GLORY lightweight world champion Tyjani Beztati (26-4, 9 KO) will take center stage in the main event of the evening. After dominating the lightweight division, Beztati moves up to welterweight for the very first time in his GLORY career. GLORY featherweight world champion Petch (169-40-3, 27 KO) and RISE national champion Kento Haraguchi (25-3-1, 14 KO) made their trilogy fight official for the co-main event. Two former middleweight title challengers collide as the number one ranked Michael Boapeah (17-4-1, 7 KO) takes on the number three ranked Ulric Bokeme (32-5, 17 KO), both...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 98 features the highly anticipated return of Jamal Ben Saddik (36-9, 29 KO) against the Estonian powerhouse Uku Jurjendal (20-9, 16 KO). In the co-main event of the evening, GLORY Welterweight World Champion Chico Kwasi (43-5-1, 23 KO) is set to defend his title against number two ranked welterweight Teodor Hristov (18-3, 7 KO). Meanwhile, two of 2024’s best prospects will clash as Cem Caceres (18-1, 14 KO) faces Mory Kromah (31-2-1, 18 KO).

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 103: Last Heavyweight Standing main event features Levi Rigters (19-3, 9 KO) colliding with Jamal Ben Saddik (38-10, 29 KO) to see who moves on in the tournament. Among the other names taking part in Phase Two are Nabil Khachab (29-6-1, 4 KO), Iancu Ionut (31-11, 13 KO), Rade Opacic (21-7, 16 KO), Milos Cvjeticanin (13-4, 9 KO), Sofian Laidouni (39-5-1, 20 KO), and many more. In addition, Chico Kwasi (44-5-2, 23 KO) will defend his GLORY welterweight world title against Mehdi Ait El Hadj (35-4-2, 8 KO), Mory Kromah (34-3-1, 20 KO) returns and takes on Cristian Ristea (44-26, 13 KO) in a heavyweight match-up outside the tournament, and Tayfun Ozcan (88-11-3, 28 KO) clashes with rival...

programme.title: GLORY 104 SuperFights
programme.desc: The GLORY 104 SuperFights kick off the night with bouts between Last Featherweight Standing competitors Berjan Peposhi (31-5, 16 KO) and Aitor Ibanez (28-7-1, 13 KO), also Miguel Trindade (62-8, 26 KO) faces Bobo Sacko (79-6-1, 30 KO). The winners will advance on the GLORY side of the tournament bracket. The headliner is number one contender Levi Rigters (20-3, 10 KO) as he fights in the second round of the tournament against a skilled Asadulla Nasipov (12-2, 5 KO).

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 103: Last Heavyweight Standing main event features Levi Rigters (19-3, 9 KO) colliding with Jamal Ben Saddik (38-10, 29 KO) to see who moves on in the tournament. Among the other names taking part in Phase Two are Nabil Khachab (29-6-1, 4 KO), Iancu Ionut (31-11, 13 KO), Rade Opacic (21-7, 16 KO), Milos Cvjeticanin (13-4, 9 KO), Sofian Laidouni (39-5-1, 20 KO), and many more. programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E07 GLORY 102 Featherweight Grand Prix
programme.desc: Four more will punch their tickets into the next round as GLORY and RISE search for the baddest featherweight on the planet in this year long tournament. On the GLORY side, top ranked German Polish fighter Denis Wosik (40-9-1, 9 KO) takes on Thai veteran Suarek (107-40-11, 39 KO) and Italy’s Achraf Aasila (53-13, 13 KO) meets France’s Lounis Saing (19-4-1, 12 KO). Meanwhile on the RISE side of the bracket, Japan’s Yutaro Asahi (17-9, 4 KO) clashes with Spain’s Eduardo Catalin (17-3-1) and top Japanese prospect Yura Kono (15-1, 7 KO) goes up against China’s Dexiang Kong (35-10). In addition to the Last Featherweight Standing matchups, Shiro Matsumoto (53-17-4, 18 KO) defends his RISE...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A five-round heavyweight title eliminator between the number one ranked contender Levi Rigters (18-2, 8 KO) and ‘The Golden Wolf’ Bahram Rajabzadeh (69-3, 61 KO). The winner will face ‘The King of Kickboxing’ Rico Verhoeven (64-10, 21 KO) on December 7 in the main event of COLLISION 7. In the co-main event of the evening, Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (25-4-1, 13 KO) clashes with Nico ‘Big Sexy’ Horta (23-9, 3 KO) in a monster heavyweight clash with big implication for the rankings. Croatian kickboxing legend Mladen Brestovac (55-14-1, 37 KO) will make his final walk to the ring in his hometown of Zagreb. ‘The Scorpion Sting’ will take on newcomer Karim Dian (16-13, 3 KO) to cap off an illustrious...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A Champ vs. Champ superfight takes place in the main event as GLORY welterweight world champion Chico Kwasi (43-5, 23 KO) puts his title on the line against GLORY lightweight world champ Tyjani Beztati (27-4, 9 KO). In the co-main event, Donovan Wisse (21-1, 10 KO) aims to defend his GLORY middleweight world championship for a fifth time when he welcomes the challenge of top German Sergej Braun (44-13, 27 KO).
