programme.title: Great British Food Revival
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Michel Roux jr on Bread / Hairy Bikers on Cauliflower
programme.desc: Michel Roux Jr gets passionate about the lost art of baking bread. He sets out to discover the secrets behind artisan bread and shares his own recipes and The Hairy Bikers bang the drum for the revival of the British cauliflower.

programme.title: Great British Food Revival
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 James Martin on Apples / Matt Tebbutt on Mutton
programme.desc: Chef and proud Yorkshireman James Martin takes on the challenge of reviving the British apple and Matt Tebutt leads the charge on behalf of mutton.

programme.title: Great British Food Revival
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Ainsley Harriott on Honey / Glynn Purnell on Cheese
programme.desc: Ainsley Harriott shows off his sweet side as he starts a campaign for the revival of British honey and Michelin starred chef and Great British Menu favourite Glynn Purnell rides to the rescue of British cheese.

programme.title: Great British Food Revival
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Gary Rhodes on Tomatoes / Angela Hartnett on Crab
programme.desc: Gary Rhodes wants us all to appreciate the virtues of the British tomato and Michelin-starred chef Angela Hartnett attempts to find her sea legs when she delves into why crab is so unloved in Britain.

programme.title: Gentleman Killer
programme.desc: A quiet border town erupts into chaos as tensions rise between the US and Mexico. The cause? A ruthless Mexican bandit determined to kill as many US soldiers as possible. As political turmoil intensifies, the town becomes the center of a deadly conflict, where vengeance, power, and survival collide.

programme.title: Wyatt Earp S01E05-08
programme.desc: In one of televisions first adult Westerns, the famous marshal puts his life on the line to maintain order, first in Dodge City, Kan., then in Tombstone, Ariz.

programme.title: Billy the Kid Versus Dracula
programme.desc: Dracula arrives in the Old West, setting his sights on a young ranch owner. Her fiance, Billy the Kid, is warned of the vampire’s true nature but struggles to convince others. As Dracula tightens his grip, Billy must act fast to save his bride-to-be before it’s too late.

programme.title: And the Crows Will Dig Your Grave
programme.desc: After the Civil War, Wells Fargo hires pistoleros to protect against increasing banditry. Jeff Sullivan, driven by revenge for the brutal murder of his wife by Glenn Kovacks and his gang, joins the effort. Sullivan partners with Pancho Corrales and pursues Kovacks, using Kovacks stepbrother, Dan, as leverage. Their final confrontation leads to a deadly showdown.

programme.title: Bury Me Not
programme.desc: Two women hide the surprising truth as a sheriff investigates a murder.

programme.title: Wyatt Earp S01E09-12
programme.desc: In one of televisions first adult Westerns, the famous marshal puts his life on the line to maintain order, first in Dodge City, Kan., then in Tombstone, Ariz.

programme.title: To Hell and Gone
programme.desc: A crafty drifter crosses paths with a gang of murderous thieves in the middle of nowhere, AZ.

programme.title: Satans Cradle
programme.desc: Crooked lawyer Steve Gentry plans to take over Silver City, killing Jim Mason and framing it as an accident. He then uses a fake marriage certificate to seize Masons property. Preacher Henry Lane tries to rally the townspeople, but is attacked. The Cisco Kid and Pancho arrive to expose Gentrys plot and restore peace to Silver City.

programme.title: Twice a Judas
programme.desc: After waking up with amnesia in the desert next to a dead man, Luke Barrett begins piecing together his past. A stranger in black reveals that Luke was hired to kill his own brother, Victor Barrett, a wealthy landowner. As Luke seeks the truth, a deadly confrontation looms, and his memory recovery brings both clarity and danger.

programme.title: Incredible Rocky Mountain Race
programme.desc: An old man observes a boy bullying his playmates and treats him to a morality lesson. The man tells the story of the epic cross-country race between a young Mark Twain and his rival, Mike Fink.

programme.title: Rattler Kid
programme.desc: Falsely convicted for robbing an army treasury, Tony Garrett escapes prison and sets out to find the real criminals responsible. As he hunts for revenge, he faces dangers and uncovers dark truths, determined to clear his name and make the true culprits pay for their actions.

programme.title: Yellow Hair and the Fortress of Gold
programme.desc: Fiery blonde half-breed Yellow Hair and her easygoing sidekick the Pecos Kid are after a fortune in Mayan gold.

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: Brother is pitted against brother in this tale of feuding ranchers in the Old West.

programme.title: Buddy Goes West
programme.desc: Two outlaws, "The Doctor" and the Indian Girolamo, help a village fight a gang and a corrupt sheriff who has discovered gold beneath the town.

programme.title: Guns Of The Revolution
programme.desc: In Mexico, a mad general is leading his own war against the Church.

programme.title: Wyatt Earp S01E13-16
programme.desc: In one of televisions first adult Westerns, the famous marshal puts his life on the line to maintain order, first in Dodge City, Kan., then in Tombstone, Ariz.

programme.title: Murieta!
programme.desc: The story of Joaquin Murrieta, a real life Mexican bandit who terrorized California with his gang of raiders and cutthroats during the first half of the 19th century. Some saw him as a murderous outlaw, others as the Mexican Robin Hood.

programme.title: Companeros!
programme.desc: A Swedish arms dealer and a Mexican peon team up to rescue the intellectual leader of the Revolutionary cause, while taking part in numerous misadventures along the way.

programme.title: Stagecoach
programme.desc: A group of people traveling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process.

programme.title: Django the Bastard
programme.desc: A ghostlike stranger arrives to avenge a Civil War betrayal. Former Confederate officers who caused the massacre of their own unit begin to die one by one, as Django delivers chilling justice from beyond the grave.

programme.title: Gunsight Ridge
programme.desc: Stage line agent investigates a series of robberies by taking the job of a deputy sheriff in a border Arizona town.

programme.title: The Ugly Ones
programme.desc: An escapee Mexican outlaw returns to his hometown, where he is sheltered from a tenacious bounty killer by the townspeople - who discover too late that he is a changed man.

programme.title: Bad Mans River
programme.desc: Robber Roy King loses his wife, Alicia, to revolutionary Montero. Despite their rivalry they collaborate in an attempt to rob the Mexican government of one million dollars.

programme.title: Djurado
programme.desc: Djurado is a gun-slinging professional gambler who struts into the small town of Silver Mine and wins half of the local saloon, the other part of which belongs to Barbara, whilst battling notorious outlaw Tucan.

programme.title: The Gay Amigo
programme.desc: Mistaken for bandits, Cisco and Pancho are captured by the Captain, who releases them to track the real gang. Cisco discovers the true leaders are the editor and blacksmith. Using cunning, he sows distrust between them, gains the blacksmith’s trust, and joins the gang, setting up a trap to bring the criminals to justice.

programme.title: Dead are Countless
programme.desc: As a child, Johnny witnessed his father’s death at the hands of soldiers. Now an outlaw, he seeks revenge by killing soldiers whenever possible. Lieutenant Garringo is tasked with capturing Johnny and bringing him back alive. A dangerous game of cat and mouse ensues, with Garringo determined to fulfill his mission.

programme.title: The Girl from San Lorenzo
programme.desc: Two outlaws posing as Cisco and Pancho are wreaking havoc. When the real Cisco and Pancho are captured, the criminals plan a final heist, using the duo as alibis. After breaking them out of jail, the real heroes have a chance to escape and clear their names by capturing the imposters. Will they succeed or be caught again?

programme.title: Requiem for a Gringo
programme.desc: A unique Euro-western with the hero as an astrologist who wears a leopard suit.

programme.title: Return of Shanghai Joe
programme.desc: A sinister town boss called Pat Barnes has exploited almost everyone in the town.

programme.title: For a Book of Dollars
programme.desc: A bounty hunter named Amen is hired by a group of nuns to recover stolen money. However, the nuns turn out to be female desperadoes in disguise, plotting to retrieve the booty pillaged by the ruthless outlaw Catapult and his gang. Amen must navigate a world of deception, danger, and betrayal to complete the job.

programme.title: Apache Rose
programme.desc: Old Western Movie from 1947 starring Roy Rogers directed by William Witney: Apache Rose - Roy is an oil prospector. His efforts to get drilling rights on an old Spanish land grant are countered by gamblers from an off-shore gambling boat determined to control the land (and oil) themselves.

programme.title: Cut-Throats Nine
programme.desc: A cavalry troop is escorting a wagonload of convicts on their way to prison through the mountains when they are attacked by a bandit gang. Only a sergeant, his beautiful young daughter, and an assortment of seven sadistic, murderous prisoners survive, and they are left without horses or a wagon. The sergeant must find a way to get his prisoners to their destination while protecting his daughter, watching out for the still-pursuing bandits, and trying to determine which prisoner is the man who raped and murdered his wife.

programme.title: The Latin Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Traditional Mexican beans with breakfast, lunch and dinner
programme.desc: Chef Luis Valenzuela fries up classic Mexican bean recipes, proving that the side dish can also be the main attraction.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Robs backyard is going to the dogs thanks to his new canine friend, Freddy. He and his dog loving friends enjoy a grilled breakfast before the daily walk to the dog park. French toast, bacon, sausage potato hash browns and baked eggs in hams crisps have everyone panting and taking home doggie bags.

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Egg Episode with Chef Katie Ardington
programme.desc: Eggs are a perfect beginning for so many recipes and meals; Chef-host Katie Ardington is happy to "whisk" us along through a few of her favourites!

programme.title: Cook the Books
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 The World Central Kitchen Cookbook
programme.desc: Chef-host Shahir Massoud tries out recipes from another award-winning cookbook: The World Central Kitchen Cookbook by Jose Andres! Follow along as Shahir prepares dishes that World Central Kitchen makes as part of disaster relief efforts all over the world, including beef rendang from Indonesia, lahmajoun from Armenia, potatoes from the Canary Island, and much more!

programme.title: Maddie and Kikis BBQ Barn
programme.desc: Fun-loving sisters and expert grillmasters Maddie and Kiki welcome you into their country barn for craveable eats and spicy jokes! On this episode, they smoke bacon from scratch, whip up a melon ball salad, and share the secrets of French toast on the grill!

programme.title: Maddie and Kikis BBQ Barn
programme.desc: Fun-loving sisters and expert grillmasters Maddie and Kiki welcome you into their country barn for craveable eats and spicy jokes! On this episode, they smoke some craveable ribs, whip up a hearty salad, and grill Jamaican jerk wings!

programme.title: Zach Kinda Cooks
programme.desc: Lazy and curmudgeonly chef and ex-Gusto writer Zach cooks one of his all-time favorite meals – Roast Chicken Dinner! While cooking, he tells aimless stories, cracks bad jokes, and berates Sydney, the beleaguered camera person.

programme.title: Zach Kinda Cooks
programme.desc: Lazy and curmudgeonly chef and ex-Gusto writer Zach cooks one of his all-time favorite dishes – Chicken Parmesan! While cooking, he tells aimless stories, cracks bad jokes, and berates Sydney, the beleaguered camera person.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Endearing host Tyrone Edwards surprises South African-born Shameen Miller with the results of her DNA test. Shameen cooks a meal that combines her two cultures and shares it with her family.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Host Tyrone Edwards shocks Andrea Titus with her DNA results. Blending her two cultures onto one plate, Andrea then cooks up a delicious and revealing meal for her family.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Host Tyrone Edwards reveals to Laird Hercules that his DNA includes other ancestry besides Guyanese. In the DNA Dinners kitchen, he cooks up a delicious meal that combines his known and newfound cultures.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Mary Bosco is Italian, but Host Tyrone Edwards surprises her by revealing that her DNA test includes roots from other places. Mary cooks a special meal for her family that combines her two cultures.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Meet Iafa Almeida Cac
programme.desc: Host Tyrone Edwards reveals to Brazil-born Iafa Almeida Cac that she has roots from other places. Alongside an expert chef, Iafa cooks a recipe that blends fresh ingredients from her Brazilian and newfound culture.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Host Tyrone Edwards takes PJ Kerr on a journey to discover his ancestry and meets with an expert chef to learn more about his newfound roots.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Bianca Osbourne is shocked by host Tyrone Edwards who reveals a whole new side of her family history.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: After revealing his DNA results, host Tyrone Edwards accompanies Jacob Ahee on a journey of self-discovery as he explores his newfound roots through food.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Jesse Magallanes was raised in an Argentinian household, but he knows theres more to his ancestry. Host Tyrone Edwards reveals the results of his DNA test and Jesse begins his journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Chelsea Richards comes from a Jamaican family but suspects there is more to her ancestry. Host Tyrone Edwards gives her the shock of her life when he reveals the results of her DNA test.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Host Tyrone Edwards reveals the exciting results of Carmen Araizas DNA test. She embarks on a journey of self-discovery, learning about her newfound culture through cooking.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Adopted Tara Broadbent is shocked by the results of her DNA test and learns more about her biological ancestry through food.

programme.title: Holiday Eatz
programme.desc: Get your Gobble Gobble on with this special episode of Holiday Eatz, featuring fun and charming host Kimberly Lallouz! She starts her terrific Turkey Day menu with a harvest happy Kale Salad heaped with beets, candied pecans, toasted lentils, and goat cheese. Thanksgiving dinner needs Hot Rolls, Chef Lallouz packs hers with cranberries and corn, then serves them as a standalone course with a cheesy, creamy Mushroom Fondue! Next, its time to talk turkey with a trick that cuts your poultry cooking time in half! Her Spatchcock Turkey is not just faster than old school, its yummier too, with a garlic-herb marinade and a unique side of mixed beans and rice! Candied sweet potatoes and...

programme.title: Spencers Holiday BBQ
programme.desc: Join charismatic chef Spencer Watts at his glorious rooftop patio for a one-hour special featuring a full holiday spread, all made on the BBQ. Spencer’s festive menu is all about creative BBQ twists with his delectable, mouth-watering recipes including Burnt Orange Cranberry Marmalade, Maple Rye Pumpkin Pie, and Asparagus with Smoked Salmon Dip. Save room for the piece de Q-sistance: Smoked Turkey Two Ways. This year, take your holiday feast outside and serve up something deliciously different.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Kelly Harvey-Mycula is shocked by the results of her DNA test and learns more about her ancestry with the help of host Tyrone Edwards.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Whether for a small family dinner or a big backyard barbeque, host Spencer Watts shows us the best ways to grill up tasty duck, turkey, capon, and quail.

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on wine sauces! First up, a classic veal marsala! Next, a white wine chicken gravy and a port sabayon with grapes!

programme.title: Feed My Soul, V!
programme.desc: Vanessa plans an autumn-themed menu with a table to match! Theres blood orange and broccolini salad, butternut squash mac ‘n’ cheese, cranberry-rosemary chicken thighs, sheet pan curried cauliflower, and so much more!

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: In this bacon loving episode, Chef Spencer delivers a tasty Bacon Weave Turkey Breast, which gets injected with beer and spices before being wrapped up in its cozy bacon blanket and sent off to the grill! Next up? A Peameal Bacon Roast with Rosti. This heavy hunk of back bacon gets smoked to flavourful perfection while Chef Watts makes the crispiest golden-fried-to-perfection potato pancake. Then, Spencer whips up a charry, grilled, super decadent, bacon-wrapped and bacon stuffed cheeseburger. Spencer isnt finished with bacon yet! For his final recipe, Spencer stuffs an apple with decadent crispy morsels stuffed along with savoury caramelized onions and melty cheddar cheese.

programme.title: Spencers Big 30
programme.desc: Host Spencer Watts makes Zucchini Noodles with Jumbo Turkey Meatballs for a healthy take on spaghetti night in around 30 minutes.

programme.title: Feed My Soul, V!
programme.desc: Vanessa plans a springtime menu with a table to match! Theres fava beans and asparagus salad, lamb shoulder with artichokes and mint, sumac-lime green beans, deviled eggs, and so much more!

programme.title: VegHeadz
programme.desc: Fall favourites are on display as chef Pino Di Cerbo shares magic autumn dishes. Beginning with Brussels sprouts, Pino serves them both roasted and fresh over creamy labneh with a funky black garlic dressing. Then, for a twist on regular risotto, Pino combines barley and celery to create a dish that is creamy and comforting. Autumn keeps falling in the next dish, a salad of butternuts, kale and a vibrant vinaigrette bursting with apple and ginger. For his fall finale, Pino creates mushrooms on toast with roasted mixed mushrooms in a rich sauce paired with gremolata and served hot on toasted focaccia!

programme.title: Spencers Big 30
programme.desc: Host Spencer Watts shows how you can make a delicious family-style roast beef dinner in about 30 minutes, for under 30 dollars.

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.desc: Host Jessica McGovern gives us a sweet taste of chocolate heaven with an overload of chocolatey desserts including a decadent Bombe au Chocolat.

programme.title: Spencers Big 30
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Night at the Pub
programme.desc: Its pub night in Spencer Watts kitchen! Forget going out - Spencers pub recipes are bold in flavour and mild on the wallet!

programme.title: What We Did On Our Holiday
programme.desc: Doug (David Tennant) ja Abi (Rosamund Pike) ovat aivan normaalit vanhemmat, joilla on kolme hurmaavaa, mutta omalaatuista lasta. Kun vanhemmuuden raskaus uhkaa niin avioliittoa kuin mielenterveyttakin, he paattavat vieda lapset Skotlantiin. Dougin eksentrinen isa Gordie (Billy Connolly) nimittain tayttaa 75. Sovinnon ja anteeksiannon viikonloppu muuttuu pian ratkiriemukkaaksi sosiaaliseksi miinakentaksi, kun vanhat kaunat, vaarinymmarrykset ja runnellut egot vaativat saada puheenvuoron.

programme.title: Time Out of Mind
programme.desc: George on epatoivoinen mies. Hanen terveytensa horjuu ja hanella ei ole mitaan minka puoleen kaantya, ja pian han loytaa itsensa New York Cityn anteeksiantamattomilta kaduilta. Kaytettyaan loppuun kaikki valiaikaisen majoituksen vaihtoehdot han hakee turvapaikkaa Bellevuen sairaalasta, Mahattanin suurimmasta kodittomien miesten vastaanottokeskuksesta. Sekin osoittautuu raaaksi ja vaikeakulkuiseksi ymparistoksi taynna samalla tavalla syrjaytyneita sieluja. Mutta Georgen ystavystyttya kokeneeseen yomaja-asukkiin Dixoniin han alkaa kypsytella mielessaan toivoa siita, etta saisi korjattua suhteen tyttareensa, josta on vieraantunut.

Kirjailija luuli kirjoittavansa tulevaisuudesta, mutta kirjoittikin menneisyydesta. Hanen romaanissaan juna ajaa silloin talloin vuoteen 2046. Jokaisella matkustajalla oli sama aikomus: elaa kadotetut muistonsa uudestaan. Sanottiin, etta vuonna 2046 mikaan ei ollut muuttunut. Kukaan ei tarkkaan tiennyt, oliko se totta, koska matkustajat eivat koskaan palanneet - paitsi yksi. Han oli siella mutta halusi lahtea pois.

programme.title: Love and Other Drugs
programme.desc: Vapaamielinen Maggie (Anne Hathaway) kohtaa Viagraa kauppaavan Jamien (Jake Gyllenhaal). Heidan kemiansa petihommissa toimii, joten he paattavat aloittaa suhteen – ilman sitoumuksia. Mutta Maggien ja Jamien ottaa valtaansa huumeista vaarallisin – rakkaus!

programme.title: What Maisie Knew
programme.desc: Isan lyottaytyessa sopimattomasti yhteen Maisien lastenhoitajan kanssa ja aidin loytaessa vierelleen nuoren baarimikon Lincolnin, kasvavat eroriidan panokset entisestaan, ja viattoman Maisie-paran sukkulointi kotien valilla saa yha sydamettomampia piirteita. Maisie pitaa kuitenkin silmansa valppaasti apposen auki ja nakee tarkasti sokean itsekkyyden lavitse. Maisie tietaa, etta hanen on itse raivattava tiensa kotiin aikuisten lapsellisuuden suosta.

programme.title: Im Not There
programme.desc: MIES. MUSIIKKI. LEGENDA. Nae Heath Ledgerin ja muiden tahtien loistavat roolisuoritukset. Im Not There on epatavallinen matka halki Bob Dylanin elaman. Kuusi eri nayttelijaa esittaa Dylania eri aikakausilla ja eri rooleissa julkisuuden henkilosta yksityiseen. Lopputuloksena on varikas muotokuva tasta julkisuutta karttelevasta amerikkalaisikonista. Runoilija, profeetta, lainsuojaton, teeskentelija, valovoimainen tahti, rocknroll -marttyyri, uskovainen - seitseman identiteettia, yksi elama, yhta lavea ja hurja kuin ajanjakso, jonka moottori se oli.

programme.title: Herakles New Yorkissa
programme.desc: Olympos-vuorelta karkotettu Herakles (Arnold Schwarzenegger) lahetetaan Maahan, missa han loytaa todellisen rakkauden ja aloittaa lupaavan uran kehonrakennusbisneksessa.

programme.title: Vieraampi kuin fiktio
programme.desc: Verohallinnon tarkastaja huomaa yhtakkia olevansa vain hanen kuulemansa kerronnan kohteena: kertomus, joka alkaa vaikuttaa hanen koko elamaansa; hanen tyostaan; hanen rakkautensa; hanen kuolemaansa.

programme.title: Arlington Road
programme.desc: Michael Faraday on katkera FBI:n agenttina toimineen vaimonsa kuolemasta. Han asuu poikansa Grantin kanssa rauhallisella esikaaupunkialueella, jossa he tutustuvat miellyttaviin naapureihinsa Oliver ja Cheryl Langiin. Ystavyyden syventyessa Michael alkaa epailemaan naapureidensa todellista taustaa ja uskoo loytaneensa yhteyksia terrorismiin.

programme.title: Childs Play (2019)
programme.desc: ”SE”-elokuvan tuottajien CHILD’S PLAY on taysin uusi versio pahasta Chucky-nukesta kertovasta kauhuklassikosta. Chuckyn aanena kuullaan Mark Hamill. Kun Karen ostaa huippukehittyneen Buddi-nuken syntymapaivalahjaksi pojalleen Andylle, han kutsuu tietamattaan pahuuden kotiinsa. Andyn taytyy saada aikuiset kuuntelemaan, jotta nukke saadaan pysaytettya ennen kuin on liian myohaista.

programme.title: Halloween (Directors Cut)
programme.desc: Michael Meyers etsii raivoisasti nuorempaa siskoaan vapauduttuaan psykiatrisesta sairaalasta, jonne hanet maarattiin 17 vuodeksi – eika kukaan ole turvassa. Vuoden 1978 elokuvan uuden version on ohjannut John Carpenter.

programme.title: Viides Valta
programme.desc: He perustivat vallanpitajia hatyyttavan nettisivun ja heista tuli maailman jahdatuimpia ihmisia. WikiLeaksin perustajat Julian Assange ja Daniel Domscheit-Berg saivat haltuunsa kaikkien aikojen suurimman maaran luottamuksellisia ja vuodettuja tietoja Yhdysvaltain puolustusministeriosta. Silloin kaynnistyi sisainen taistelu. Paljonko kannattaa maksaa vapaan maailman suurimmista salaisuuksista? Mita niiden paljastaminen maksaa?Daniel Domscheit-Bergin oma kirja WikiLeaksista on pohjana aidolle trillerille, joka kertoo aikamme keskustelluimmasta ja ristiriitaisimmasta organisaatiosta WikiLeaksista ja sen perustajasta Julian Assangesta.

programme.title: Kauas pilvet karkaavat
programme.desc: Kauas pilvet karkaavat kertoo helsinkilaispariskunnasta. Raitiovaununkuljettaja ja perinteikkaan ravintola Dubrovnikin hovimestari menettavat tyonsa, mutta eivat toivoaan Aki Kaurismaen (Le Havre) Suomi-trilogian ensimmaisessa osassa.

programme.title: Hakutulokset (Birdman)
programme.desc: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance) on musta komedia paluuta tekevasta nayttelijasta (Michael Keaton), joka on jaanyt kuuluisan supersankarihahmonsa vangiksi. Kiinnityksen saaminen uskottavaksi Broadway-nayttelijaksi ei ole helppoa, ja nayttelija paatyy ryhtymaan ohjaajaksi.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Vuonna 1961 Neuvostoliiton ensimmainen ydinsukellusvene lahtee ensimmaiselle matkalleen Pohjois-Atlantille. Mutta sukellusvene ei toimi optimaalisesti, ja koska ydinreaktorissa ilmenee ongelmia, silla on katastrofaaliset seuraukset miehistoon. Miehiston on taisteltava yhdessa ydinkatastrofin valttamiseksi, joka on seka hengenvaarallinen etta voi aloittaa uuden maailmansodan suurvaltojen valilla.

programme.title: The Birdcage - Lainahoyhenissa
programme.desc: Tassa hysteerisessa komediassa Armand ja Albert ovat rakentaneet taydellisen elaman hoitaessaan Miami-yokerhoaan. Mutta heidan pastellinsa rauha jarkkyy, kun Armandin poika ilmoittaa menevansa naimisiin ultra-konservatiivisen senaattori Keeleyn tyttaren kanssa... ja he kaikki kokoontuvat illalliselle! Pystyvatko Armand ja Albert muuttumaan Herra ja Rouva Perhearvoiksi ajoissa?

programme.title: Promised Land
programme.desc: Intensiivisessa draamassa seurataan kahta high school -opiskelijaa, Hancockia ja Dannya, heidan valmistumisensa jalkeen. Hancock tyytyy cheerleader-tyttoystavansa kanssa keskiluokkaiseen keskinkertaisuuteen ja etaantyy Dannysta ja taman psykoottisesta vaimosta, Bevista.

programme.title: What Maisie Knew
programme.desc: Isan lyottaytyessa sopimattomasti yhteen Maisien lastenhoitajan kanssa ja aidin loytaessa vierelleen nuoren baarimikon Lincolnin, kasvavat eroriidan panokset entisestaan, ja viattoman Maisie-paran sukkulointi kotien valilla saa yha sydamettomampia piirteita. Maisie pitaa kuitenkin silmansa valppaasti apposen auki ja nakee tarkasti sokean itsekkyyden lavitse. Maisie tietaa, etta hanen on itse raivattava tiensa kotiin aikuisten lapsellisuuden suosta.

programme.title: A Late Quartet
programme.desc: Kun maailmankuulun jousikvartetin rakastettu sellisti saa kuulla laakariltaan mullistavan diagnoosin, on koko ryhman tulevaisuus vaakalaudalla. Tukahdutetut tunteet, kilpailevat egot ja hallitsemattomat intohimot uhkaavat suistaa vuosien ystavyyden ja yhteistyon raiteiltaan. Valmistautuessaan 25. vuosipaivan juhlakonserttiinsa, joka saattaa hyvinkin jaada myos viimeiseksi, on toivo heidan maineensa sailymisesta kiinni yhteisista siteista ja musiikin voimasta. Beethovenin Jousikvartetto nro 14 cis-molli opus 131:n ymparille rakennettu A LATE QUARTET on koskettava kunnianosoitus kamarimusiikille ja New Yorkin kulttuurimaailmalle.

programme.title: Tulitikkutehtaan tytto
programme.desc: Äitinsa ja isapuolensa kanssa asuva ja tulitikkutehtaan liukuhihnalla tyoskenteleva Iiris (Kati Outinen, Mies vailla menneisyytta ja Le Havre) erehtyy luulemaan tanssiravintolassa kohtaamansa miehen kanssa viettamaansa yota rakkaudeksi. Vaarinkasityksella on kohtalokkaat seuraukset.

programme.title: Legacy of lies
programme.desc: Kovaotteinen ovimies Martin Baxter tienaa lisatuloja osallistumalla laillisuuden rajamailla pyoriviin taistelulajikisoihin. Takana on ura MI6:n agenttina, jonka han jatti Kiovassa sattuneen katastrofin takia. Mutta menneisyydellahan on taipumusta loytya edesta hanen ammatissaan. Kun Baxter saa tilaisuuden selvittaa, mita Kiovassa tuona kohtalokkaana iltana tapahtui, han tarttuu siihen.

programme.title: Arlington Road
programme.desc: Michael Faraday on katkera FBI:n agenttina toimineen vaimonsa kuolemasta. Han asuu poikansa Grantin kanssa rauhallisella esikaaupunkialueella, jossa he tutustuvat miellyttaviin naapureihinsa Oliver ja Cheryl Langiin. Ystavyyden syventyessa Michael alkaa epailemaan naapureidensa todellista taustaa ja uskoo loytaneensa yhteyksia terrorismiin.

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: DAREDEVIL (Ben Affleck), katujen armoton oikeudenpuolustaja, rakastuu kauniiseen taistelulajitaituri Elektraan (Jennifer Garner). Elektra perheineen joutuu haijyn palkkamurhaajan maalitauluksi ja DAREDEVILin on kohdattava tosiasia: han saattaa menettaa ainoan rakkautensa.

programme.title: 10 Items or Less
programme.desc: Oscar ja Golden Globe palkittu Morgan Freeman esittaa elokuvatahtea, joka suunnittelee valkokankaalle paluuta neljan vuoden poissaolon jalkeen. Harkitessaan roolia supermarketin paallikkona, han kay pienessa latino-marketissa Los Angelesin laitamilla. Siella han tapaa kipakan kassaneidin, Scarletin (Paz Vega, Spanglish – kaannoskukkasia, Puhu hanelle). Huomatessaan olevansa kaukana kotoaan, ilman puhelinta taikka ajoneuvoa, elokuvatahti hyvaksyy Scarletin tarjouksen kyydista takaisin ”sivilisaatioon”. Matkan varrella tama ulkoisesti niin erilainen pari loytaa yhteisen savelen, joka pysyvasti muuttaa heidan suhtautumistaan elamaan.

programme.title: A Little Bit Of Heaven
programme.desc: Kate Hudson on taydellinen roolissaan sateilevan kauniina Marleyna, nuorena uranaisena, joka sairastuu yllattaen syopaan. Marley on oikea flirttailija, joka ei ole koskaan ollut rakastunut, mutta kun laakarin roolissa on vastustamaton Gael García Bernal, olisiko rakkaus kuitenkin laakkeista paras?

programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Alfred, Jan and Jerry / Ebony
programme.desc: Three survivors from the ill-fated UA Flight 232 relive the terrifying moments.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot David faces a remote Arctic airstrip with sketchy landing gear. Mikey drafts a Buffalo hockey team to face off against an NHL squad in a charity shootout. Chuck gets a chance to shine on the ice.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe races a quirky antique snowmobile - with an airplane engine and no brakes. The water bomber crew struggles to get two planes out of Turkey. Cocky rampie Chris Staples tries to prove himself in the C-46.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A cold snap triggers massive challenges. Devan runs into gear problems while he ferries a mothballed DC-3 across the country. And Justin has to make a snap decision with his newborn son aboard his plane.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Facing Joes wrath, Rod and Cory head to the UK to make urgent water bomber repairs. David tries to prove himself to Devan in the C-46 but ends up infuriating Devan. Will makes an ultimatum in Hay River.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey trains for High Arctic survival with the Canadian Rangers. The Air Force invades Chucks hangar. Joe faces tough competition at a California plane auction.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: AJ and James battle a DC-4 engine fire. Its Joes 69th birthday - and hes never flown a helicopter before, so Mikey plans a special gift of chopper flight lessons.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Cory, Chuck and Brian watch as a 5,000-pound power unit smash to the ground, denting the Electra and putting it out of commission. Mikey scrambles to manage the crisis while Joe races to England to try and purchase a backup Electra.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey head to England to bring home a new plane. Devan does target-practice in the DC-4.James builds a Buffalo-style soapbox racer.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe flies with the Snowbirds during the Hamilton air show and later teaches Mikey to fly. A surprise departure shakes up Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Ice Pilots NWT celebrates a milestone with a look back at the last five years, a peek behind the camera and reflections from the Buffalo crew.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalos Electra aircraft is hammered by rough winds up the Mackenzie Valley. In Hay River, a rookie crew faces the worst ice storm in years and one rampie has a tough go trying to fit in at Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine trouble plagues Buffalos newest Electra, ZFE, and a standoff between Joe and Transport Canada threatens to close the airline. At the same time, Joe faces a tough decision about his old dog Sophie.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe leaves to undergo medical tests at the Mayo Clinic in Phoenix, Arizona. Jeff and Sam stress over their DC-3 checkflights and Joe celebrates turning 70-his way.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie pilot Jeff nearly runs off the runway. Prefkar learns to play hockey but drops the ball at Buffalo and Joe goes on a date with a real dog.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalos top guns, rookies and vets, go to California for aerial dogfights in real fighter planes. Cory and Mikey race to get ready for the D-Day jump.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikeys much-planned D-Day tribute parachute jump with 20 paratroopers hits a wall when Joe refuses to fly his DC-3 to the drop zone.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot Scott faces his worst nightmare when a faltering Curtiss C-46 Commando engine and low fog force a scary landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Christmas is just around the corner, but Buffalos crucial food and mail runs come to a halt.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mechanic Cory races against the clock to turn two short-haul waterbombers into transatlantic aircraft for the epic journey to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mechanic Cory races against the clock to turn two short-haul waterbombers into transatlantic aircraft for the epic journey to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A charter flight falls through the cracks after the McBryans attend a wild family wedding, and an irate Joe pulls captain Justin from the Turkey test flights to do the job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A furious Joe fights against a federal suspension that will prevent him from carrying passengers for the first time in 20 years.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Turkey crew makes the critical jump over the North Atlantic. But en route to Portugal, one crew is forced to turn back.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: C-46 and DC-4 crews race against the spring melt to fly mining equipment to an airstrip on a frozen lake.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After thousands of hours of painstaking preparation and dangerous flying, a terrible accident devastates the waterbomber crew in Turkey - and everyone at Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When her husband quits after a blowout with Joe, Kelly is put in a terrible position. Will she stay at Buffalo - or will she go?

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After her husbands acrimonious departure from Buffalo, Kelly has a confrontation that decides whether she, too, will quit.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: As Joe fights a Transport Canada claim against the airline, star pilot Justin is tasked with shipping an 8,000lb generator to a remote town.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When a deadly fire destroys a northern outpost a week before Christmas, Buffalo puts everything aside to come to the rescue.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The curse of -40 hits Buffalo pilots Devan and Scott on a food mail flight up the Mackenzie Valley when a mysterious rise in oil pressure threatens to destroy one of the C-46s engines.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A vital ferry link is down, so Buffalo mounts an all-out campaign to airlift 100,000lbs of essential goods across the Mackenzie River.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Crusty mechanic Chuck leads the scramble to ready the Electra for a disaster relief mission in Haiti, but fates curveball sends them to the High Arctic instead.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A multi-stop mission to the Far North has Devan, Scott and Adam facing a series of white- knuckle obstacles.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Young pilots AJ and Andrew get the chance of a lifetime to fly the magnificent DC-3 specially equipped with skis to land on frozen strips.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Chief pilot Arnie lands the DC-3 on a homemade sand strip at a remote lodge; Electra expert Chuck faces off with a stubborn power unit; Rods wife Sasha goes into labor.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When thunderstorms and a shaking engine threaten a DC-3 charter to Whitehorse, Joe pulls out all the stops to get the passengers to their destination.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: While training waterbomber captains for the upcoming fire-fighting season, Chief Pilot Arnie makes a surprising decision.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe hires Duane Hicks to help Buffalo navigate the future and coach Mikey; a DC-3 delivery mission goes awry when blizzard conditions and a broken oil cooler force an emergency landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Critical of the many stops and starts in the Electra program, and frustrated with the constant drama at Buffalo, Chuck quits.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Frustrated with her lack of flying and stuck in a rut as a courier driver, Audrey decides her time at Buffalo is over.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When a ferry breakdown causes a gasoline shortage in Yellowknife, new manager Duane begs Chuck to return and prepare the Electra for a fuel haul.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duane lands a huge contract for the Electra and puts enormous pressure on mechanic Adam to prep the plane without the help of his mentor Chuck.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Electra flies to Alert, the northernmost settlement on Earth, forcing Adam and new senior manager Duane to work things out.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Trying to make his mark at Buffalo, Duane lands two more Electra contracts.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duanes decision to leave the Electra crew unsupervised while he spends time at home jeopardizes the completion of a major contract, and could cost him his job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When Yellowknife and the northern aviation community are rocked by three crashes in the space of a month, Joe places an extra emphasis on safety.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe receives a negative visit from Transport Canada when inspectors threaten to shut down the airline.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Weighed down by the responsibility of training a new rampie, and struggling to get out of Joes doghouse, DC-3 co-pilot Tyler gets a once in a lifetime opportunity to stunt fly in his Cessna 150 for a visiting film crew.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After taking command of an intense airlift, and dealing with the ugliest Electra load hes ever seen, Scott takes a scary fall on the icy tarmac.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Just months from retiring, Electra captain Ray Weber leads his crew on a multi-trip mission that requires landing on a rough ice strip on a remote lake.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT

programme.title: Time to Hunt
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 No Time To Lose S1 - "Time to Hunt"
programme.desc: This week the contestants will race right across Johannesburg. They have to fly over the famous Table mountain and need to climb the colorful Soweto Towers.

programme.title: Morgan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Morgan"
programme.desc: Mat’s demanding client Gordon is in search of a Morgan, but will he be able to find the ideal car for the right price?

programme.title: Citroen DS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Citroen DS"
programme.desc: Mat goes in search of a perfect Citroen DS for Leon, a man who has strong connections to the DS, and to France.

programme.title: Miami
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Car Crews with Supercar Blondie S1 - "Miami"
programme.desc: Supercar Blondie is given the keys to a five million dollar Pagani Huayra L’Ultimo as she explores the sub-culture of lowriders with the seal of approval from Horacio Pagani himself. Will she be accepted into this tribe?

programme.title: Detroit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Car Crews with Supercar Blondie S1 - "Detroit"
programme.desc: Supercar Blondie arrives in ‘Motor City’ in the dead of winter but given access to a half million dollar new Ford GT raises her spirits. Her goal is to learn more about muscle cars, born in Detroit, and her journey takes her in different directions.

programme.title: The 3.5
programme.desc: A rare 1971 Mercedes Benz 280 SE 3.5 Coupe gets restored to its original specifications.

programme.title: Pinky
programme.desc: A pink, air-cooled, 1973 Porsche 911 RS is upgraded with a custom built engine, new paint, and new wheels and tires.

programme.title: FMX Nomads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 FMX Nomads S1 - "FMX Nomads"
programme.desc: Join Dan Whitby, Samson Eaton and Arran Powley for a day in the life of globetrotting freestyle motocross team, Bolddog.

programme.title: Brazil
programme.desc: The World’s best Brazilian rider opens the doors to his house to show how it all started and brings us to Mexico for the most famous urban race in the world.

programme.title: Argentina
programme.desc: Two talented Canadian brothers and pro MTB riders decide to go on a freeride trip together and choose to explore the remote desert of Argentina.

programme.title: South Africa
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 MTB Heroes S3 - "South Africa"
programme.desc: We follow the fastest and most stylish female MTB pro rider in the world during a trip to South Africa where she will ride the best trails around Cape Town.

programme.title: Episode Three
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Our Auto Expert S1 - "Episode Three"
programme.desc: Nik unveils the bold Cadillac Escalade, while Mike praises the redesigned Nissan Rogue. Nik shares Alfa Romeos rich 110-year legacy, then cruises in the Lexus LC500 with the top down.

programme.title: Episode Four
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Our Auto Expert S1 - "Episode Four"
programme.desc: Nik tests the 2021 Toyota Land Cruiser. Mike explores the 2021 Kia Telluride. Nik showcases the 2021 Hyundai N Line. Witness Mercedes Benz AMGs pinnacle creation. Niks blown away by the new Kia K5.

programme.title: Episode Five
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Our Auto Expert S1 - "Episode Five"
programme.desc: Nik showcases Mercedes-Benzs screen innovation. Mike loves the 2021 Kia Seltos. They both enjoy driving cool cars like the 2021 Corvette Stingray. Nik praises the 2021 Toyota Venza Hybrid.

programme.title: Parking In-Violetion
programme.sub-title: S11 : E12 Graveyard Carz S11 - "Parking In-Violetion"
programme.desc: In our second to last episode of the season, the ghouls shift into high gear to make progress on our In-Violet 1971 Cuda Convertible. And work begins on our SEMA 2019 build!

programme.title: The Reel Life of GYC
programme.sub-title: S11 : E13 Graveyard Carz S11 - "The Reel Life of GYC"
programme.desc: Since 2012, Graveyard Carz has become synonymous with high-quality Mopar Restoration. And the show continues to grow with new fans and new builds each and every year. We pull the curtain back to reveal some of the cast and crews favorite moments.

programme.title: Fake ID
programme.sub-title: S16 : E01 Graveyard Carz S16 - "Fake ID"
programme.desc: The black 1971 Hemi ‘Cuda tribute build is almost a roller!

programme.title: Long Beach California
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Close Proximity S1 - "Long Beach California"
programme.desc: Matt Field and his and his solid team of experts head down to Long Beach, California to begin the Formula Drift Championship series.

programme.title: Atlanta
programme.desc: Coming off a good start to the Formula Drift Tour, Matt Field and his crew prep, pack, and fly to Atlanta for next stop of the Formula Drift championship.

programme.title: Morgan Hill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Close Proximity S1 - "Morgan Hill"
programme.desc: After a loss against Formula Drift newcomer Faruk Kugay in Atlanta, Matt is back in Morgan Hill, cleaning up the Drift Cave before heading to Orlando.

programme.title: Hanging by a Thread
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S2 - "Hanging by a Thread"
programme.desc: Tanalian Aviation bush pilots Joel and Josiah earn their keep slinging a stranded snow machine.

programme.title: Into the Deep
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S2 - "Into the Deep"
programme.desc: The bush pilots have to use all their skills - scuba diving, underwater rigging and expert flying - to try and salvage a de Havilland Beaver wing at the bottom of the 6 Mile Lake.

programme.title: Flying High
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S2 - "Flying High"
programme.desc: The Tanalian bush pilots transport extreme paragliders to Moose Creek, in the Talkeetna Range, for a once-in-a-lifetime airbone experience.

programme.title: Craig Hutto
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Fight to Survive S1 - "Craig Hutto"
programme.desc: A family fishing trip turns into a bloody nightmare and leaves Craig Hutto fighting for his life.

programme.title: Ron Smith Story
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Fight to Survive S1 - "Ron Smith Story"
programme.desc: This week, its the true story of Ron Smiths encounter with a fearless deer that attacked both him and his nephew, Arik, while out fishing.

programme.title: Jackson Jordon
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Fight to Survive S1 - "Jackson Jordon"
programme.desc: This week, well visit with Jackson Jordan and his narrow escape from death in the woods of Georgia after an attack from a pack of coyotes when he was only 16.

programme.title: Edge of the Earth
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Edge of the Earth"
programme.desc: The first episode sets the stage for Chris and Caseys journey, detailing the terrain, weather, and hunting style theyll encounter. It also delves into the projects backstory and its initiation.

programme.title: On Top of the World
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "On Top of the World"
programme.desc: Chris and Casey traverse waterways, muskeg, and mountains hunting a huge caribou bull. Chris hurts his knee, questioning his endurance.

programme.title: The River Migration
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "The River Migration"
programme.desc: The duo journeys downriver hunting Yukon Bull Moose, covering nearly 20 miles in two days. They establish moose camp despite an unsettling encounter with a nearby grizzly.

programme.title: Episode 7
programme.desc: A young snowmobilers first ride into the backcountry spins out of control.

programme.title: Episode 8
programme.desc: Tim demands a lot of everyone around him, especially during a cave rescue - what he describes as "the worst kind of rescue possible".

programme.title: Into The High Lonesome
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Trail S1 - "Into The High Lonesome"
programme.desc: Modern day Mountain Man Laramy Miller sets out on the trail to experience life in the high lonesome.

programme.title: Camp Otis
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Trail S1 - "Camp Otis"
programme.desc: Life at Camp Otis. Laramy finds success fishing and foraging, and spends his time taking care of 7 and doing camp chores.

programme.title: Relocation
programme.desc: Laramy realizes that game is scarce because of the wolves and he decides to put some distance between himself and the pack. Time to break down camp and move to a new location.

programme.title: Mexico City
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Running the World S1 - "Mexico City"
programme.desc: Brothers Max and Benj Cave race through an 18th century monastery on the outskirts of Mexico City and whoever rings the bell in the tower first wins.

programme.title: Gran Canaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Running the World S1 - "Gran Canaria"
programme.desc: Brothers Max and Benj Cave are challenged to create a run through an abandoned water park on the island of Gran Canaria.

programme.title: Jamaica
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Running the World S1 - "Jamaica"
programme.desc: Brothers Max and Benj Cave are challenged to create a unique run in an unusal setting on the Island of Jamaica.

programme.title: Failure To Tag
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 Wardens S5 - "Failure To Tag"
programme.desc: Birds, bucks and missing licenses. This week the Wardens watch a clear violation take place in Region 5. Property lines are crossed in pursuit of upland game and a license check comes up empty.

programme.title: Wardens Instinct
programme.desc: There is often a fine line between false information and the truth. Veteran Region 5 wardens use their sixth to bring game violators to justice.

programme.title: Fourth Dimension
programme.desc: Fourth of July in Montana – Flathead Lake is where the party is at. But with the heat tempers flare and the free flowing alcohol combines to make a dangerous situation.

programme.title: ATV Accidents
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Survival Science S1 - "ATV Accidents"
programme.desc: ATVs have allowed us to penetrate the wilderness like never before. But they’ve also made the backcountry a bit more dangerous. Laura and Nick rig up some dramatic, high-speed tests to see how accidents happen and what you can do to protect yourself.

programme.title: Gran Canaria - Part One
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Hunting Fish S1 - "Gran Canaria - Part One"
programme.desc: Thom hunt challenges himself to locate a rare Mirror Carp in stunning Gran Canaria.

programme.title: Gran Canaria - Part Two
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Hunting Fish S1 - "Gran Canaria - Part Two"
programme.desc: Thom hunt challenges himself to fish wild Tuna in stunning Gran Canaria.

programme.title: Edge of the Earth
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Man Eats Wild S3 - "Edge of the Earth"
programme.desc: Go as far north as you can and once youre there go a little further. Mario finds himself in one of the most remote parts of the world exploring an unknown landscape. Theres Reindeer, arctic char but will he come home with the food his looking for?

programme.title: Silver Kings
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Buccaneers and Bones S1 - "Silver Kings"
programme.desc: The group of iconic anglers reunite for a week of fishing and camaraderie in Belize. Bill Klyn and Tom McGuane fish for snook, Lori-Ann Murphy and Zach Gilford go after bonefish and Michael Keaton and Tom Brokaw pursue permit and tarpon.

programme.title: Grey Ghosts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Buccaneers and Bones S1 - "Grey Ghosts"
programme.desc: The team of anglers cast into the flats off the coast of Belize in pursuit of bonefish. Tom Brokaw and Bill Klyn casts from a boat, McGuane and Yvon Chouninard try their luck wading and Michael Keaton and Lori-Ann Murphy use both methods.

programme.title: Hardcore Hapuka
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Hardcore Hapuka"
programme.desc: We return to Fiordland in the hope of going one step better in slotting a hapuka on a spear, but the presence of Bluefin Tuna off the coast, and Wapiti Bulls on the slip faces proves a tempting distraction from the task at hand!

programme.title: Scoreless
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S1 - "Scoreless"
programme.desc: Using a unique method to crack a safe, Nick Wells (Robert De Niro) uses a blowtorch to cut through a safe, fill it with water, and blow the door off using a small explosive device.

programme.title: Ready to race
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 The Flying Kestrel S2 - "Ready to race"
programme.desc: The Flying Kestrel team heads back to the 2 mile long runway at Elvington, where last year Jon Webster crashed the car. He drives it in anger for the first time since that fateful day but have they done enough?

programme.title: Mini
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Mini"
programme.desc: Mat Watson travels Europe on the trail of a very special 1960s Mini.

programme.title: Mercedes SL
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Mercedes SL"
programme.desc: Mat Watson tracks down one of the most desirable convertibles on the planet. The Mercedes SL Pagoda.

programme.title: American Car
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Find Me A Classic S1 - "American Car"
programme.desc: Mat Watson sets off to seek out a slice of Americana. A classic car from the USA.

programme.title: Monster Bass in Shallow Grass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Hunt for Monster Bass S1 - "Monster Bass in Shallow Grass"
programme.desc: Host Ott DeFoe hunts down double-digit Largemouth Bass in this shallow lake full of grass.

programme.title: The Lodge At Palisades Creek (Idaho)
programme.sub-title: S16 : E10 The New Fly Fisher S16 - "The Lodge At Palisades Creek (Idaho)"
programme.desc: This region of Idaho has become famed for the trout fishing and variety of locations to do it. Mark Melnyk explores this area with one of the top guides.

programme.title: Scott Lake Lodge (Saskatchewan)
programme.sub-title: S16 : E11 The New Fly Fisher S16 - "Scott Lake Lodge (Saskatchewan)"
programme.desc: Phil Rowley takes a floatplane to the far north of Saskatchewan to catch massive Northern Pike on a fly. He is the guest of Scott Lake Lodge.

programme.title: Tuckamore Lodge (Newfoundland)
programme.sub-title: S16 : E12 The New Fly Fisher S16 - "Tuckamore Lodge (Newfoundland)"
programme.desc: Colin McKeown visits one of the prettiest parts of Newfoundland to salmon fish and also view whales, caribou and other wildlife.

programme.title: Antarctica
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 Road Less Traveled S3 - "Antarctica"
programme.desc: Jonathan caps off the season with an expedition into the spirit of isolation; a journey that takes him from Arunchal pradesh, India, to Dolomites in Italy, to all the way down in Antarctica

programme.title: Andy Soucek - Bentley Continental
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S1 - "Andy Soucek - Bentley Continental"
programme.desc: In this profile, we get to know Andy Soucek competing in the Bentley Continental at the 2018 Total 24 Hours of Spa race held at the Spa-Francorchamps circuit.

programme.title: Ahmad Al Harthy - Aston Martin Vantage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S1 - "Ahmad Al Harthy - Aston Martin Vantage"
programme.desc: In this profile, we get to know Ahmad Al Harthy competing in the Aston Martin Vantage at the 2018 Total 24 Hours of Spa race at the Spa-Francorchamps circuit.

programme.title: Albert Costa - Lexus RC F
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S1 - "Albert Costa - Lexus RC F"
programme.desc: In this profile, we get to know Alberto Costa competing in the Lexus RC F at the 2018 Total 24 Hours of Spa race held at the Spa-Francorchamps circuit.

programme.title: Germany / England
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Epic Exploring S1 - "Germany / England"
programme.desc: Josh and Cody are diving into the underworld. This time, Josh explores the abandoned German mining industry, including an encounter with a Police squad, and in England, Cody explores an old Soviet submarine in the English Medway river.

programme.title: U.S.A. / Cyprus
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Epic Exploring S1 - "U.S.A. / Cyprus"
programme.desc: Cody encounters wild animals and thrilling attractions in abandoned Six Flags, New Orleans. Meanwhile, Josh is in Cyprus where the UN peace keeping force allows him to explore the abandoned Nicosia International Airport and the UN bufferzone.

programme.title: Armenia / Greece
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Epic Exploring S1 - "Armenia / Greece"
programme.desc: Together with rooftopper Elaina Hammeken, Josh explores an incredible radio telescope from the Soviet era in Armenia while Cody experiences an astonishing trip through the Greek mining industry of Ptolemaida with his travel companion, Elvis Brauer.

programme.title: Morocco
programme.desc: A German MTB legend decides to build a van and travel all the way down to Morocco to explore and ride the great Atlas mountains.

programme.title: Spain
programme.desc: We meet with a Spanish MTB pro rider who decided to create his own company in order to build the most exclusive and unique carbon bikes.

programme.title: Bali
programme.desc: We travel to Bali - Indonesia to meet an MTB pro rider who decided to start a new life dividing his time between surfing and riding active volcanos.

programme.title: On Thin Ice
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S2 - "On Thin Ice"
programme.desc: On a rare day off, Josiah and his friends white water raft where few have gone before - on top of the massive Knik Glacier.

programme.title: Mischelle Hileman
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Fight to Survive S1 - "Mischelle Hileman"
programme.desc: This week, Mischelle Hileman finds herself deep in the Oregon wilderness on an elk hunt when she gets lost, injured, and on the brink of death.

programme.title: The Rick Collins Story
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Fight to Survive S1 - "The Rick Collins Story"
programme.desc: This week on Trip Gone Bad, a father and son set out on a cliff side sheep hunt, but one slip could mean life or death in this remote and unforgiving area.

programme.title: Leming Bear Attack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Fight to Survive S1 - "Leming Bear Attack"
programme.desc: This week, well learn the harrowing tale of a fathers desperate attempt to save his sons life from a grizzly bear attack while out hunting together.

programme.title: Scott Lake Lodge (Saskatchewan)
programme.sub-title: S16 : E11 The New Fly Fisher S16 - "Scott Lake Lodge (Saskatchewan)"
programme.desc: Phil Rowley takes a floatplane to the far north of Saskatchewan to catch massive Northern Pike on a fly. He is the guest of Scott Lake Lodge.

programme.title: Tuckamore Lodge (Newfoundland)
programme.sub-title: S16 : E12 The New Fly Fisher S16 - "Tuckamore Lodge (Newfoundland)"
programme.desc: Colin McKeown visits one of the prettiest parts of Newfoundland to salmon fish and also view whales, caribou and other wildlife.

programme.title: Antarctica
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 Road Less Traveled S3 - "Antarctica"
programme.desc: Jonathan caps off the season with an expedition into the spirit of isolation; a journey that takes him from Arunchal pradesh, India, to Dolomites in Italy, to all the way down in Antarctica

programme.title: Prayer Point
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Prayer Point"
programme.desc: On day three at "Prayer Point", Casey faces another opportunity, inconveniently timed. While answering natures call, a bull respondes to cow calls from camp, appearing across the river.

programme.title: Night Stalkers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Night Stalkers"
programme.desc: Exhausted and famished, the brothers persist downstream, barely mustering energy to set camp. They find abundant signs of moose and favorable terrain for their habitat.

programme.title: Exploration Camp
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Exploration Camp"
programme.desc: Days pass, moose elusive since Day 11. Restless nights with lurking creatures. They find an abandoned trappers cabin, home to a huge grizzly.

programme.title: Day 1
programme.desc: Kevin travels to Switzerland and has 24 hours to go from Zurich to the Swiss mountains, while Jalou finds an exciting way to go from Cannes to Corsica.

programme.title: Day 2
programme.desc: Jalou has 24 hours to get from Barcelona to Tarragona where she conquers the Catalonian mountains with her mountain bike. Kevin tries to beat her in Slovenia.

programme.title: NEW BEGINNINGS IN AUTUMN
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Bottom Feeders S1 - "NEW BEGINNINGS IN AUTUMN"
programme.desc: As the season changes from summer to fall, change is also in store for our commercial fishermen. One man is just starting out, one is barely getting by, and one is looking to start over.

programme.title: WORLDS COLLIDE
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Bottom Feeders S1 - "WORLDS COLLIDE"
programme.desc: The rough season is starting to wear on commercial fishermen. For some, hard feelings are boiling to the surface and others turn imagination into money.

programme.title: Street Artist
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Breaking the Day S1 - "Street Artist"
programme.desc: Alex Yanes uses resin, acrylic, wood, and enamel to create 3D works that redefine pop art.

programme.title: Behind The Shed
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 Wardens S5 - "Behind The Shed"
programme.desc: When the game ranges are opened up for Antler Shed Hunting its all hands on deck for the Montana Game Wardens. Reports of Bears, Mountain Lions and lost hunters keep the wardens busy.

programme.title: Sifr Aromatics
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Must Eat! Must See! Must Do! - Singapore S2 - "Sifr Aromatics"
programme.desc: If you are sick of smelling like everyone else, try your hand at concocting your own scent at independent perfumery, Sifr Aromatics. Later, pamper your palette with a plate of freshly cooked fried kway teow and fried oyster omelette.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Expedias Super Supper Club - Jordan S1 - "Part 1"
programme.desc: Join Chef Sara Aqel as she explores Jordan’s northern produce, landscapes, and historical sights before hosting an idyllic dinner at Amman’s Citadel.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Expedias Super Supper Club - Jordan S1 - "Part 2"
programme.desc: Join Chef Ali Ghzawi as he takes us on a journey through Jordans southern sights of Petra, Aqaba, and Wadi Rum, using the best local produce, for a dinner at the Dead Sea.

programme.title: Big Wave World Tour
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Big Wave World Tour"
programme.desc: Trevor Carlson puts everything on the line to chase monster waves from Maui, Hawaii to Ensenada, Mexico.

programme.title: Skimboarding Jaws
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Skimboarding Jaws"
programme.desc: Brad Domke aims for the big wave surfing history books by skimming the big waves of Pe’ahi.

programme.title: NYC, USA
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Breaking Beyond S1 - "NYC, USA"
programme.desc: Four BC One World Final legends from our series, Ronnie, Neguin, Junior and Shigekix, are coming to NYC. These legends will meet some of the future legends taking part in this year’s world final and take them on a journey through hip hop history.

programme.title: Paris
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Running the World S1 - "Paris"
programme.desc: Max and Benj Cave travel to France where they are challenged to create a run in historic Lisses.

programme.title: Croatia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Running the World S1 - "Croatia"
programme.desc: Max and Benj Cave travel to Croatia to meet up with local parkour experts and undertake an epic run in an abandoned aluminium factory.

programme.title: Potato
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - "Potato"
programme.desc: Lauren explores the culinary possibilities of the humble potato. She demonstrates how to make perfect crispy potato wedges, a hearty potato and vegetable curry, and homemade gnocchi recipe that is hard to beat.

programme.title: Tofu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - "Tofu"
programme.desc: Discover the delicious and nutritious world of tofu with Lauren as she experiments with various textures and flavors, pushing the soybean to its limits to create amazing dishes like Scramble tofu and the sweet-spicy delight of Tahu Gejrot.

programme.title: Changa Safari Camp
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Changa Safari Camp"
programme.desc: Guided by Sean, Kristina explores the Matusadona National Park where they have incredible on-foot encounters with elephants and lions. Will she keep her cool as she comes face-to-face with one of Africa’s apex predators?

programme.title: Pamuzinda Safari Lodge
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Pamuzinda Safari Lodge"
programme.desc: Pamuzinda Safari Lodge is only one and a half hours from the capital - Harare. With Lawrence as her guide, Kristina embarks on an entertaining horse-back safari, interacts with Jasmine the giraffe and meets the clever resident elephant herd.

programme.title: Nyanga and Thetford Estate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Nyanga and Thetford Estate"
programme.desc: The adventure continues as Kristina journeys to Far and Wide in mountainous Nyanga, Eastern Zimbabwe. Her guide Bernie begins the trip with some extreme adventure sports including braving the tallest zip line on the planet.

programme.title: The Berg River
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Berg River"
programme.desc: While Xander gets an up-close look at the tranquil and isolated Kersefontein Farm, Adam becomes a true armchair adventurer, wishing he was experiencing anything besides snowy Canadian weather.

programme.title: The Majestic Cederberg
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Majestic Cederberg"
programme.desc: When Adam’s power goes out in Winnipeg, he decides to spend the day building a snow fort. Meanwhile, Xander and his crew take a trip through Cederberg.

programme.title: From Elands to Lamberts Bay
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "From Elands to Lamberts Bay"
programme.desc: Up next, Xander and his team stop to surf the legendary left break at Elands Bay. After experiencing the peace and tranquility of the ocean with South African locals, Xander and his team hit a snag in their journey.

programme.title: Blueprints
programme.desc: Mark and Amanda show Lyndal and Bruce around the new building site and they explain their plans for the lodge. Building on the lodge site has started and seems to be progressing smoothly.

programme.title: Furnishings
programme.desc: Lyndal and Bruce discuss the Lodge’s dishes and menu. Lyndal and Amanda meet some baboons and their babies alongside the road on the way to see the famous Baobab tree. Bruce visits the local butcher to see what meats are on offer for the lodge.

programme.title: From On High
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Zambezi Crescent S1 - "From On High"
programme.desc: Bruce is still working on the cow’s head meat, making biltong from pieces and hanging it up and the rest gets put into the stew. Ant picks up a problem with the leadwood tree; it has been cemented in the wrong place and needs to be moved.

programme.title: Volcan Madera, Nicaragua
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Volcan Madera, Nicaragua"
programme.desc: The brothers attain their goal of riding motorcycles to the heart of Nicaragua, through the jungle to the isolated beaches of the Pacific coast and back inland: through Spanish-colonial towns, local villages and the huge volcanic island of Ometepe.

programme.title: Yorkshire Dales, England
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Yorkshire Dales, England"
programme.desc: Imagine a 26-pub, 7-day, 60-mile pub-crawl! Doing a traditional ‘ramble’ through the stunning Yorkshire Dales region of northern England, the brother’s stride through the moors and dales and peaks and valleys - legs and livers intact.

programme.title: Erg Chigagga, Sahara, Morocco
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Erg Chigagga, Sahara, Morocco"
programme.desc: From Marrakesh, the brothers take a series of local Berber taxis over the High Atlas Mountains and down into the Draa Valley until the road ends at the edge of the great sand sea of the Sahara where they bury some treasure.

programme.title: Berlin
programme.desc: Historical Berlin offers Josh two days of adventures and hidden treasures including a former U.S. Spy Station used during the Cold War and an abandoned garage.

programme.title: Tbilisi
programme.desc: Cody discovers the unknown beauty of Tbilisi exploring abandoned Cold War bomb shelters, a derelict weather station and an abandoned cable car station.

programme.title: Nantes
programme.desc: Josh and ultimate traveler Lexie Limitless explore Nantes on a mechanical elephant and inline skates, and discover a deserted mine and a noble house.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Expedias Super Supper Club - Jordan S1 - "Part 1"
programme.desc: Join Chef Sara Aqel as she explores Jordan’s northern produce, landscapes, and historical sights before hosting an idyllic dinner at Amman’s Citadel.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Expedias Super Supper Club - Jordan S1 - "Part 2"
programme.desc: Join Chef Ali Ghzawi as he takes us on a journey through Jordans southern sights of Petra, Aqaba, and Wadi Rum, using the best local produce, for a dinner at the Dead Sea.

programme.title: 6000 km
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Roads End S1 - "6000 km"
programme.desc: In this episode Rob and Dave make a toast to their recently finished trip rough riding across Argentina.

programme.title: Melbourne
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Travels with the Bondi Vet S2 - "Melbourne"
programme.desc: Chris visits Melbourne for a series of challenges that celebrate the city’s food, football and street art culture.

programme.title: Darwin Beer Can Regatta
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Travels with the Bondi Vet S2 - "Darwin Beer Can Regatta"
programme.desc: Chris meets crocodiles, flies in a float planes and takes part in the famous Darwin Beer Can Regatta, all in Australia’s iconic Top End.

programme.title: Bond, James Bond
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Travels with the Bondi Vet S3 - "Bond, James Bond"
programme.desc: Chris goes on the celebrity trail in LA , explores a mysterious ocean outcrop in his quest to become James Bond, visits a wildlife forest in the heart of Dublin, and has a close encounter with beautiful Fijian.

programme.title: Fiji
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Travels with the Bondi Vet S3 - "Fiji"
programme.desc: Chris joins a rugby game in Fiji where kids are the stars, tests himself against the fittest men and women in the land of the body beautiful, has his heart stolen by a giant steer, and meets some cute Australian natives.

programme.title: Wild Paternoster
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Wild Paternoster"
programme.desc: Adam and Xander go on fishing trips on opposite sides of the globe; one in a winter wonderland and the other in Paternoster, an old South African fishing village.

programme.title: Kraalbaai Caribbean
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Kraalbaai Caribbean"
programme.desc: While Xander and his team experience the joys of wakeboarding in the beautiful Kraalbaai Caribbean, Adam attempts to replicate this experience.

programme.desc: Freddie leads an exclusive Ferrari tour, as they explore Ferrari’s design centre, visit its museum, and honour F1 champions. A friendly race in the Ferrari simulator and a scenic drive in new Ferraris close their Italian adventure beautifully.

programme.title: Detroit
programme.desc: Punk rocker Jon-Mikal formed his band The Idiot Kids as a way to deal with his sexuality. After coming out to his family at 21, he uses writing and his stage performance as a form of therapy.

programme.title: Paris and Barcelona
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Around the World in 80 Tricks S1 - "Paris and Barcelona"
programme.desc: Bones introduce his trademark trickery to people in Paris and Barcelona, performing mind reading and an attempt to escape a straitjacket while breakdancing.

programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Travels with the Bondi Vet S2 - "Melbourne"
programme.desc: Chris visits Melbourne for a series of challenges that celebrate the city’s food, football and street art culture.
