programme.desc: Chris joins a rugby game in Fiji where kids are the stars, tests himself against the fittest men and women in the land of the body beautiful, has his heart stolen by a giant steer, and meets some cute Australian natives.

programme.title: Arviat, Nunavut, Canada
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Arviat, Nunavut, Canada"
programme.desc: Heading to the far north into the Arctic to learn about the Inuit’s traditional culture and incredible way of life, the brothers accompany an elder and young hunter on a 200-mile skidoo hunt across the barren land and frozen sea ice.

programme.title: Inside Ferrari
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Car and Country Quest - 30 Min Version S1 - "Inside Ferrari"
programme.desc: The trio are joined by Mathias Lauda, son of F1 Legend Niki Lauda, at Ferrari’s Maranello HQ. From factory tours showcasing Ferrari’s craftsmanship to dining in Ferrari’s historic restaurant, the team immerses in Ferrari’s legacy.

programme.title: Inside Ferrari 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Car and Country Quest - 30 Min Version S1 - "Inside Ferrari 2"
programme.desc: Freddie leads an exclusive Ferrari tour, as they explore Ferrari’s design centre, visit its museum, and honour F1 champions. A friendly race in the Ferrari simulator and a scenic drive in new Ferraris close their Italian adventure beautifully.

programme.title: Seychelles
programme.desc: Not just one glorious tropical island paradise, but 2! Sashi heads to the best resort in Maldives, Soneva Jani to get a taste of their brand new culinary experience. Then he heads to East Africa to experience the best of Seychelles! This is a Max Foodie adventure unlike any other!

programme.title: Maldives / Soneva Jani
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 Maximum Foodie S4 - "Maldives / Soneva Jani"
programme.desc: Not just one glorious tropical island paradise, but 2! Sashi heads to the best resort in Maldives, Soneva Jani to get a taste of their brand new culinary experience. Then he heads to East Africa to experience the best of Seychelles! This is a Max Foodie adventure unlike any other!

programme.title: Astypalia and Pserimos
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 My Greek Odyssey S3 - "Astypalia and Pserimos"
programme.desc: First stop in series three is Astypalia, which is a couple of hours cruising to the west of Kos. I It’s the western-most island of the group and is shaped like a butterfly, and beautiful like one too!

programme.title: Kalymnos
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 My Greek Odyssey S3 - "Kalymnos"
programme.desc: In this episode, I’ve arrived on the island of Kalymnos. It’s one of the biggest islands in the Dodecanese, famed for its rock climbing.

programme.title: Quantum Leaps in Rishikesh
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Road to Dharma S1 - "Quantum Leaps in Rishikesh"
programme.desc: The team, led by Anand, prepare for their motorcycle adventure to the four sacred peaks. The first practice ride is in the birthplace of yoga, but monsoons are destroying the environment, Fred seems a liability and Ryans seizures could be an issue.

programme.title: Santorini
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Running the World S1 - "Santorini"
programme.desc: A challenge to race each other and a labyrinth of narrow streets and hidden passages to navigate will make this one of the trickiest challenges.

programme.title: Best of ep. 1 to 5
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Running the World S1 - "Best of ep. 1 to 5"
programme.desc: Parkour athletes Max and Benj Cave look back over their travels so far and discuss the best places for practising parkour.

programme.title: Lisbon
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Running the World S1 - "Lisbon"
programme.desc: Brothers Max and Benj Cave undertake a run where they attempt to escape from Lisbon castle without using any conventional exit routes.

programme.title: Pe’ahi
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Pe’ahi"
programme.desc: Will Skudin and Keali’i Mamala deal with the trials and tribulations of life as traveling big wave surfers.

programme.title: Mavericks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Mavericks"
programme.desc: Big wave surfing’s elite break routines and converge to ride an unforgettable swell at Mavericks.

programme.title: The Eddie
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "The Eddie"
programme.desc: The world’s elite big wave surfers revel in the biggest most powerful Waimea Bay surf conditions to ever grace the Eddie Aikau Contest.

programme.title: Karabezi Houseboat Cruiser
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Karabezi Houseboat Cruiser"
programme.desc: Kristina travels back to Zimbabwe’s stunning lake Kariba. This time she’s touring the area on the luxurious Karabezi Houseboat Cruiser. Joined by fishing experts, Craig and Mark, she attempts to catch the notorious tiger fish.

programme.title: Rhino Safari Camp
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Rhino Safari Camp"
programme.desc: Hosted by Rhino Safari Camp, the epic safari continues in the Matusadona National Park where Kristina is guided by Steve. They explore the lakeshore, encounter the local hungry pride and Marula, the resident elephant, makes a lunchtime appearance.

programme.title: Chilo Gorge Safari Lodge
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Chilo Gorge Safari Lodge"
programme.desc: Kristina travels to Gonarezhou National Park in the South-East of Zimbabwe. Thomas, her guide, takes her to the breath-taking Chilojo cliffs, tracks an impressive buffalo herd and keeps his cool as they experience heart-stopping elephant charges.

programme.title: Texas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 My Van Life S1 - "Texas"
programme.desc: A colourful graffiti artist in Austin shares her story of loss with Lisa and gives her a tarot reading. We travel to rural Texas to overnight with Jupiter: an outspoken, non-binary person of colour, living in their vintage RV while studying law.

programme.title: Arizona
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 My Van Life S1 - "Arizona"
programme.desc: Lisa spontaneously joins a sober dance party on a mountain top in Sedona, and meets spiritual Van Lifers who have dramatically changed their entire existence, including former NFL player Joe Hawley, and a transformative breathwork practitioner.

programme.title: Utah
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 My Van Life S1 - "Utah"
programme.desc: Lisa heads to Utah, the ultimate playground for Van Life adrenaline junkies: aka Dirt Bags. Base jumper Derrick shows that by confronting death, it helps us appreciate life. We meet a solo female traveler who challenges Lisa by taking her bouldering.

programme.title: Swakopmund
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 A Simple Path S1 - "Swakopmund"
programme.desc: Amidst the vast desert, we discover handmade leather shoes, the yellow bus on the beach, Kalahari truffles, the power of gemstones, keepers of the desert elephants and a skate ramp in the middle of the dunes.

programme.title: Nairobi
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 A Simple Path S1 - "Nairobi"
programme.desc: Uhuru Park is the nucleus for skateboarders in Gaborone. We meet street Keedz turning their lives around, a local animator, the producer of Sighkick Mag and learn how to make homemade trucks and sign language at Pallet Cafe.

programme.title: Jakarta
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 A Simple Path S2 - "Jakarta"
programme.desc: Jakarta, urban meets jungle. The yellow brick road, shiny shoes at Survive Skate shop, 24/7 under the bridge. Road trip to Bandung, a mosque session, Nasi Padang Every Day, Bhang records, live with Sigit, motion graphics and self-expression.

programme.title: A Newly-Wed Recipe for Disaster
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Love On The Rocks S1 - "A Newly-Wed Recipe for Disaster"
programme.desc: Jason loves mountain biking. Tayler prefers to read a book. Jason is up for any adventure tossed at him. Tayler likes to be a bit more prepared. Will the adventures that await in Arkansas leave the couple questioning if they have anything in common?

programme.title: Theodoras Room
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Love On The Rocks S1 - "Theodoras Room"
programme.desc: Tayler and Jason travel to Eureka Springs, AR, a town with a rich history and home to one of the most haunted hotels in America, The Crescent. Jason convinces Tayler to stay one night, but will that stay lead to a night they dont want to remember?

programme.title: Detroit
programme.desc: Punk rocker Jon-Mikal formed his band The Idiot Kids as a way to deal with his sexuality. After coming out to his family at 21, he uses writing and his stage performance as a form of therapy.

programme.title: Moldova
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 Road Less Traveled S3 - "Moldova"
programme.desc: Jonathan enters Europe’s poorest country with a purpose: Enter the little know breakaway Soviet Republic of Transnistria with a “package.” for a friend. It’s a journey that will begin with urban exploration in the decay of Bucharest and end with close calls with secret police in Tiraspol.

programme.title: Calcutta: City of Living History
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Journeys in India S2 - "Calcutta: City of Living History"
programme.desc: There is no city in India that is more British than Calcutta. The former capital of British India, Calcutta has gardens, buildings and museums to prove it. Throw away any ideas you have of this giant city and discover the treasures it holds.

programme.title: South India: Land of Superlatives
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Journeys in India S2 - "South India: Land of Superlatives"
programme.desc: Two of the greatest ancient monuments in the world are in South India—Hampi and Konark. These two wonders of the world were lost to the west, but now are at the top of many bucket lists.

programme.title: Chef Anthony Lamas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Back Home S1 - "Chef Anthony Lamas"
programme.desc: Chef Anthony Lamas returns home to Mexico to explore the thriving culinary scene in Oaxaca and rediscover his family roots. Join Anthony as he tastes the finest foods, meets his most talented peers, and gets a little drunk on mezca.

programme.title: Robert Rodriguez
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Back Home S1 - "Robert Rodriguez"
programme.desc: Award-winning film director Robert Rodriguez travels to Morelia to reconnect with the country that gave birth to his first film ever, "El Mariachi".

programme.title: Alisa Valdes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Back Home S1 - "Alisa Valdes"
programme.desc: Author Alisa Valdes travels to Havana, Cuba to visit the place where her father was born and raised. Join her on her journey as she discovers the challenges of living as an author and artist in Communist Cuba.

programme.title: The Langeberg Mountains
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Langeberg Mountains"
programme.desc: The South African crew travels to the Langeberg Mountains for a luxurious day of relaxation and exploration while Adam searches for wildlife on his makeshift Canadian safari.

programme.title: Royalty in Robertson
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Royalty in Robertson"
programme.desc: While Xander and his team experience the lush, green valleys and incredible vineyards in Robertson, Adam learns a tough lesson about not only surviving, but thriving.

programme.title: Historical Swellendam
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Historical Swellendam"
programme.desc: While Xavier works with a professional South African stunt performer to go mountain biking and kayaking, Adam endeavors to complete a stunt of his own.

programme.title: End of Stories - A Trechorous Night
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Road to Dharma S1 - "End of Stories - A Trechorous Night"
programme.desc: Jen and Jeff’s dream is to save their marriage on this journey, but it’s clear they are in different mindsets from the beginning. We are reminded that Anand had a prophecy of death and his teachers and life adventures helped guide him to freedom.

programme.title: New York
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Streets S1 - "New York"
programme.desc: Rapper Shiniqua, aka Pretty Little Monster, juggles motherhood while trying to avoid the trappings of Instagram fame. Her passion is writing rap lyrics and always tries to keep it real.

programme.title: Moldova
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 Road Less Traveled S3 - "Moldova"

programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Journeys in India S2 - "South India: Land of Superlatives"
programme.desc: Two of the greatest ancient monuments in the world are in South India—Hampi and Konark. These two wonders of the world were lost to the west, but now are at the top of many bucket lists.

programme.title: Wilmington, Delaware
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Travels with Darley S1 - "Wilmington, Delaware"
programme.desc: From Delaware’s first settler to the du Pont mansions and a historic fort, Darley discovers American history in and around Wilmington. She shares where to get great local beer and dine at a James Beard Award-nominated restaurant.

programme.title: Day 2
programme.desc: Jalou has 24 hours to get from Barcelona to Tarragona where she conquers the Catalonian mountains with her mountain bike. Kevin tries to beat her in Slovenia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Tiimi loytaa kauden parhaan jadelohkareen, mutta on vaarassa heikentaa sen arvoa, kun he yrittavat leikata kaikki halkeamat pois.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian poika Justin osoittaa, etta han osaa loytaa jadea, kun taas Scrappy Larry, Robin ja Josh kamppailevat hinaamaan rikkinaisen autonsa Wolverinelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Huonot tulokset pakottavat Robinin ja Justinin viimeiseen yritykseen etsia jadekivia pelastaakseen kauden, kun taas Scrappy Larry kiirehtii muuntamaan dieselilla toimivan sailion.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian hanke majoittaa tyoryhma Jade Cityyn vaarantuu, kun saostussailio vuotaa juomaveteen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kylman saan saapuessa aikaisin ja velkojen kasaantuessa miehisto tyontaa, vetaa ja raahaa mammuttimaisen ja mahdollisesti kauden pelastavan lohkareen leirille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun vuoden lupaavinta lohkaretta tyostetaan Wolverinella, Josh ja R2 kolaroivat rekka-autonsa, ja Claudia tiimineen jaavat ymmalleen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kaikki innostuvat, kun he vihdoin alkavat kaivaa esiin lupaavia vihreita lohkareita, joiden miehisto uskoo olevan miljoonien arvoisia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitteet nousevat pintaan, kun ulkomaiset sijoittajat piipahtavat yllattaen tarkistamaan Wolverinen kaivosalueen toita, ja Alan yrittaa rauhoittaa tilannetta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun Wolverinen kaivoksella vihdoin loydetaan lupaavia lohkareita, miehisto huomaa, etta he ovat saattaneet menna tonttinsa rajojen ulkopuolelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitys kasvaa, kun kaivoskauden loppu lahestyy, ja Jade Cityn miehisto haluaa loytaa kallisarvoisen lohkareen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jade Cityn kaivostyolaiset yrittavat loytaa rikkauksia - tarpeeksi suuren jadelohkareen, joka tekee vaikutuksen sijoittajiin - ennen kauden paattymista.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian ja Robinin testaamattomat koneet alkavat hajota raaalla matkalla Wolverinen kaivosalueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto yrittaa ylittaa tulvivia jokia matkalla kaivokselle koneet mukanaan, mutta Josh jaa jalkeen ongelmallisen kaivinkoneen takia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh jaa jumiin pitkalla matkalla Wolverinen kaivokselle, kun pultit irtoavat kaivinkoneesta eika han voi kutsua apua.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kaivoskausi alkaa, ja vaikka jadea ei nay, rekkaonnettomuus tuo Jade Citylle onnea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Guysta tulee Wolverinen johtaja, ja uuden tyontekijan palkkaaminen uhkaa suistaa hanen tehtavansa loytaa kauden ensimmainen jadelohkare.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Juuri kun Wolverinen miehisto tehostaa turvallisuusmenetelmiaan, uusi tyontekija Jay romahtaa, mika paljastaa heidan hatavalmiutensa sarot.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh kayttaa uutta kaivinkonetta, kun taas arvottomien kivien kasa saa Claudian harkitsemaan uutta strategiaa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Alan tuo Jade Cityyn ostajaryhman, mika saa Claudian tiimin paniikkiin ja etsimaan kauden ensimmaiset myytavat jadelohkareet.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun miehisto rampii mudassa etsiessaan miljoonan dollarin arvoista lohkaretta, Josh riskeeraa puolen miljoonan dollarin arvoisen kaluston yrittaessaan vetaa rekkaansa pois vajoamasta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Tiimi loytaa kauden parhaan jadelohkareen, mutta on vaarassa heikentaa sen arvoa, kun he yrittavat leikata kaikki halkeamat pois.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian poika Justin osoittaa, etta han osaa loytaa jadea, kun taas Scrappy Larry, Robin ja Josh kamppailevat hinaamaan rikkinaisen autonsa Wolverinelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Huonot tulokset pakottavat Robinin ja Justinin viimeiseen yritykseen etsia jadekivia pelastaakseen kauden, kun taas Scrappy Larry kiirehtii muuntamaan dieselilla toimivan sailion.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian hanke majoittaa tyoryhma Jade Cityyn vaarantuu, kun saostussailio vuotaa juomaveteen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun vuoden lupaavinta lohkaretta tyostetaan Wolverinella, Josh ja R2 kolaroivat rekka-autonsa, ja Claudia tiimineen jaavat ymmalleen.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate claims to be the victim of an internet scam which led to his arrest. Officers take it easy on a rowdy inmate struggling through a spiritual crisis. Years of prison time can’t sway a young gang affiliate from changing his ways. Prisoners cause plumbing problems to send a message. A mother and daughter bond over being locked up together.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Code Blue alarms sound as inmates start fighting inside the men’s jail. An irate man with a huge beard refuses to remove bands inside his facial hair. A man with deep stab wounds stumbles into jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 Old Habits Die Hard
programme.desc: An inmate demands that officers follow her instructions while in jail. A man insists that he has been kidnapped by the police and is being held illegally. An elderly man discovers that domestic violence does not have an age limit. A young woman makes the hard decision to turn herself in to change her life around.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated inmate escapes his restraints. A young woman denies she abused her mother, and a guard removes an inmate who is causing a disturbance.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Las Vegas Motor Mouth
programme.desc: A belligerent man with a grudge is placed in a restraint chair. An intoxicated woman receives a love note from an inmate on worker status.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An angry man refuses to cooperate during the booking process. A man claims to be part of the “international police”.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers fear a man may attempt to hang himself and decide to intervene. A heavily injured man ends up in jail after taking cocaine and acid. Irascibility shadows a man with low blood sugar.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A high-priced escort is accused of skipping out on her limo tab. A ladies man directs foul language at the jail nurse, and a seasoned prostitute considers getting into the sex-toy business.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated woman clashes with officers but later shows that good behavior pays off. An experienced prostitute gives solid advice to a younger woman and begs her to get out of the “game.” An angry woman smashes her cheating boyfriend’s windshield.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate goes on a rampage when he suspects police of losing his money. Officers have a tough time with a drunk man. An alleged prostitute is stabbed. A drunk trapeze artist takes a drive on his moped.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After refusing a breathalyzer test, an irate man bangs his head against plexiglass. A man transforms into a “cell warrior” within his holding pen. Soon to be released, an inmate considers the future.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Two agitated inmates are put in restraints to cool down. A suspected burglar expresses concern over a milk allergy, and an inmate becomes upset about the care given to her belongings.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Uncooperative and agitated, a man complains officers are violating his rights. A “443” call is issued, and a deputy desperately needs help. Outside the cell block, there’s knockouts and bloody noses.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man outfitted in just his underwear is taken into custody. A dad gets busted for DUI while on his way to pick up a pizza for his kids. Officers recover drugs from a suspect’s pocket who is puzzled as to how they got there. A woman learns the hard way “what happens in Vegas stays in Vegas”.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL a man is busted for an open container of beer. In Salt Lake City, UT a woman is stunned as to how drug paraphernalia wound up on her person. In Las Vegas, NV a former bus driver relays sad details about his past. In Portland, OR a shoplifter receives some sage of wisdom from one of the officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Three inmates start brawling inside the drunk tank. One man must wear a mask so that officers can avoid his rain of spit. A young woman fails to take jail seriously and behaves provocatively.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman booked for domestic violence begins screaming and can’t calm down. Two friends arrested for public intoxication embrace in a tearful reunion. Later, a woman is brought in with a stolen car.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In his holding cell, a man fights officers after taking Xanax. An officer discovers a suspect may be facing criminal charges for his son. K-9 units are needed during a search for improvised weapons.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Deputies corral a suspect into a cell after serious turmoil. A man becomes suicidal after being brought in on burglary charges. Facing the gavel, a prisoner berates a Judge during court proceedings.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An uncooperative woman fights arrest resulting in a trip to the isolation chamber. One inmate calls 911 within jail walls causing confusion. Later, officers run to the rescue when a man passes out.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Inmates are subdued after exhibiting unruly behavior. Anger drives emotions as a man accuses officers of racial profiling. An officer uses “verbal judo” to gain the upper hand with combative inmates.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Two sisters go on a mini-crime spree, get caught and find no one will bail them out. A domestic argument about night fishing lands a husband in jail for breaking into his own car. An irate inmate blows off steam by doing laps in her jail cell. A woman finds out it’s hard to stop selling drugs when the neighborhood knows her business.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E19 A Night of Fights
programme.desc: A man tries to swallow his ring. A heroin addict wants help when he realizes his habit has cost him everything he loves. One man fights with his girlfriend in a bathroom, another fights with his girlfriend at home, both are surprised they are arrested for domestic violence. A habitual criminal is worried that other inmates will fight over him.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Inmates are subdued after exhibiting unruly behavior. Anger drives emotions as a man accuses officers of racial profiling. An officer uses “verbal judo” to gain the upper hand with combative inmates.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A strip search reveals a male inmate in womens lingerie. A couple of puppy thieves get amorous in the bathroom, and a pregnant woman is arrested for solicitation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A dominatrix is arrested for playing rough. A father is accused of assaulting his daughters boyfriend, and an inmates negative attitude leads to trouble.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a combative inmate provokes the use of pepper spray. In Sarasota, FL a drunk woman is uncooperative during processing. In Spokane, WA a man attempts to flip off the camera while taking his mug-shot.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Two men are found fighting on security cameras. Meanwhile, an impromptu tattoo jail parlor is discovered and shut down. Later, a Russian man and his mysterious friend are excited to be in a U.S. jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: To avoid self-harm, an intoxicated man is handcuffed to a booking bench. After fighting at a bar, a combative prisoner is arrested. Also, an unmarried couple squabbles during the booking process.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Angry over her arrest, a woman becomes combative with officers. Busted once again for drugs, a smart young woman knows she is making dumb choices but can’t stop using. programme.title: Nimeni on Trinity - paholaisen oikea kasi
programme.desc: Villia lantta ilman tarkempaa paamaaraa kiertava Trinity paatyy polyiseen pikkukaupunkiin, jossa hanta odottaa todellinen yllatys. Hanen lainsuojaton velipuolensa Bambino on kaupungin sheriffi! Tosin Bambino on ottanut pestin vastaan vain, koska on jalleen lakia paossa ja tarvitsee valehenkilollisyytta piiloutuakseen... Kaupungin mahtavimmalla miehella, majuri Harrimanilla on saalimattomia suunnitelmia valtansa ja maa-alueittensa kasvattamiseksi, mutta laheisessa laaksossa asuva mormoniyhdyskunta on suunnitelmien tiella. Harriman miehineen aikoo vaikka vakipakolla ajaa mormonit alueelta... Mutta yhdyskunnan kanssa ystavystynyt Trinity sotkee mielellaan Harrimanin kuviot.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian

programme.title: Balls Out: Gary the Tennis Coach

programme.title: Wagons East
programme.desc: He tulivat hakemaan kultaa, mutta he tyytyivat mielellaan hyvaan viemarijarjestelmaan.John Candy ja Richard Lewis tahdittavat epatyypillista lankkaria.

programme.title: Epic Movie
programme.desc: Tarina keskittyy neljaan ei-niin-nuoreen orpoon: yhden heista on kasvattanut Louvren kuraattori; toinen on pakolainen meksikolaisesta vapaapainista; kolmas askettainen hanen lentokoneessaan olleiden kaarmeiden uhri; ja neljas "normaali" asukas mutantti "X" -yhteisosta. Onneton kvartetti vierailee suklaatehtaalla, jossa he tormaavat lumottuun vaatekaappiin, joka kuljettaa heidat Gnarnian maahan (hiljaisella ”G”: lla). Siella he kohtaavat prameilevan merirosvokapteenin ja vilpittomat taikuuden opiskelijat – ja yhdistavat voimansa muun muassa viisaan, mutta kiimaisen leijonan kanssa voittaakseen Gnarnian ”Pahan Valkoisen Nartun”.

programme.title: Joe - jokapaikan hoyla
programme.desc: Tim Allenin esittama Joe on mies, jonka elama on muuttunut vakaasti aina vain surkeammaksi. Kun toimiston kiusaaja menee liian pitkalle, Joe paattaa vihdoin muuttua mitattomyydesta joksikin paremmaksi.

programme.title: Pete Smalls Is Dead
programme.desc: Hollywoodin taakseen jattanyt kasikirjoittaja joutuu palaamaan unelmien kaupunkiin ohjaajaystavansa kuoltua.

programme.title: Hamekytta - Pojasta Polvi Paranee
programme.desc: Todistettuaan murhan FBI-agentti Malcolm Turner (Martin Lawrence) ja hanen poikapuolensa (Brandon T. Jackson) joutuvat vetamaan valeasut niskaansa ja ryhtymaan tutkimuksiin – ainoastaan tytoille tarkoitetussa taidekoulussa. Entistakin enemman hauskuutta!

programme.title: Henrys Crime
programme.desc: Rikollisen hauskassa komediassa tahaton ryostoapuri Henry (Keanu Reeves) paatyy vankilaan suojellessaan todellisia syyllisia. Ulos paastyaan Henry paattaa tarttua toimeen ja tehda rikoksen, josta hanet on jo kertaalleen tuomittu. Apurikseen teatraaliseen pankkikeikkaan mies palkkaa entisen sellitoverinsa Maxin (James Caan). Mutta paasy pankin ja pienen teatterin yhdistavaan tunneliin vaatii kaivamisen lisaksi myos nayttelijanlahjoja.

programme.title: Peace, Love and Misunderstanding
programme.desc: Komedia menestyksekkaasta newyorkilaisesta asianajajasta (Catherine Keener), joka tuo mukanaan kaksi vilkasta teini-ikaista lastaan hippiaitinsa (Jane Fonda) luo maalle perhelomalle. Rentouttava viikonloppu muuttuu kuitenkin pian seikkailun, romantiikan, musiikin, perhesalaisuuk sien ja itsensa loytamisen kesaksi.

programme.title: Big Mommas House
programme.desc: Karannutta vankia jahtaava agentti Malcolm Turner (Martin Lawrence) lahtee suorittamaan peitetehtavaa ja pukeutuu maarailevaksi ja isokokoiseksi mummoksi, joka mottaa yhta kovaa kuin komentaakin.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Of Black
programme.desc: Tassa paattomassa spoofkomediassa, joka ottaa elokuvan "Fifty Shades of Grey" lempeaan kasittelyynsa, tapaamme mystisen miljonaarin Christian Blackin, joka, huolimatta puutteellisista kyvyistaan sangyssa, paattaa vietella ujon collegeopiskelijan Hannah Steelen ja johdattaa hanet "romantiikan" maailmaan.

programme.title: Fat Kid Rules The World
programme.desc: Troy Billings on seitsemantoista, ylipainoinen ja itsetuhoinen. Juuri kun han aikoo hypata bussin eteen, hanet pelastaakin Marcus, lukion kesken jattanyt hurmaava katumuusikko. Kaksikon valille syntyy orastava ystavyyssuhde kun Marcus ottaa musiikillisilta taidoiltaan vajavaisen Troyn rumpaliksi uuteen punkbandiin. Troy ei aavista, etta hanen pienena hupina pitamassaan asiassa onkin kyse Marcusin halusta paasta punkrockin huipulle, keinolla milla hyvansa..

programme.title: Thanks for Sharing
programme.desc: Paallepain ymparistokonsultti Adamilla, yksityisyrittaja Mikella ja ensiapulaakari Neililla ei ole mitaan yhteista, mutta he kaikki ovat mukana 12 askeleen ohjelmassa kohti vapautta riippuvuuksistaan. Adam ei uskalla heittaytya uuteen rakkauteen, Mike yrittaa raivokkaasti kontrolloida perhettaan eika Danny suostu myontamaan ongelmiaan, mutta haasteet ja pienet askeleet yhdistaa miehet perheeksi, joka kannustaa, raivostuttaa ja kiittaa toisiaan matkalla uuteen elamaan.

programme.title: Kuuhullut (Moonstruck)
programme.desc: Tassa klassisessa romanttisessa komediassa Brooklynin leski (Cher) on valmis menemaan uudelleen naimisiin. Talla kertaa han aikoo tehda sen oikein, vaikka joutuisikin sanomaan ”kylla” miehelle, jota han ei oikeasti rakasta. Mutta kun han rakastuu sulhasensa veljeen (Nicolas Cage), seuraa romanttinen mutka, joka on arvoinen suurimpia koomisia oopperoita! Olympia Dukakis on myos mukana.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Ice Cube, Anthony Anderson, Sean Patrick Thomas, Eve ja Cedric the Entertainer tahdittavat tata hervotonta komediaa Chicagon parturiliikkeesta, jossa terava huumori ei koskaan mene pois muodista! Calvin (Ice Cube) on yrittajaksi pyrkiva nuori mies suurilla suunnitelmilla... eika perheen parturiliikkeen pyorittaminen kuulu niihin. Mutta kun han myy impulsiivisesti liikkeen epailyttavalle lainanantajalle, han tajuaa pian, kuinka tarkea naapuruston parturi on hanelle... ja kuinka pitkalle han on valmis menemaan saadakseen sen takaisin!

programme.title: Off the Rails
programme.desc: Kolme viisikymppista naista haluaa toistaa nuoruutensa Interrail-seikkailut Euroopassa sen jalkeen kun heidan laheinen ystavansa kuolee ja jattaa heille junaliput seka viimeisen toivomuksen: heidan pitaa ottaa naisen tytar mukaan. Talla kertaa matkustelu ympari Eurooppaa osoittautuu vaikeaksi heille, kun kadonneet passit, junalakot ja odottamattomat romanttiset suhteet sekoittavat heidan ystavyyssuhteensa. Kysymys kuuluukin: ehtivatko he ajoissa kunnioittamaan ystavansa muistoa?

programme.title: Trinity ratsastaa jalleen
programme.desc: Villia lantta ilman tarkempaa paamaaraa kierteleva Trinity on palannut! Talla kertaa lannen nopein Trinity ja hanen velipuolensa, rautanyrkkinen Bambino lyottaytyvat yhteen kunnioittaakseen isansa viimeista toivetta. Kuolinvuoteellaan isa oli toivonut pojistaan tulevan kunniallisia, tyonsa vakavasti ottavia lainsuojattomia, joiden paista virkavalta voisi kitsastelematta luvata muhkean palkkion. Veljekset kuitenkin huomaavat, etta isan toiveen toteuttaminen on helpommin sanottu kuin tehty. Hakeutumalla innokkaasti vaikeuksiin ja tappeluihin kaikkialla minne paatyvatkaan, Trinity ja Bambino toivovat nostavansa summaa etsintakuulutuksissaan...

programme.title: Peace, Love and Misunderstanding
programme.desc: Komedia menestyksekkaasta newyorkilaisesta asianajajasta (Catherine Keener), joka tuo mukanaan kaksi vilkasta teini-ikaista lastaan hippiaitinsa (Jane Fonda) luo maalle perhelomalle. Rentouttava viikonloppu muuttuu kuitenkin pian seikkailun, romantiikan, musiikin, perhesalaisuuk sien ja itsensa loytamisen kesaksi.

programme.title: Majava
programme.desc: Majavasta voi olla apua sinullekin! Walter Blackin huumori on yhta mustaa kuin hanen sukunimensa. Toissa menee huonosti, vaimo on saanut tarpeekseen ja poika vihaa isaansa. Masennuksen syovereissa - ja kesken itsetuhoisen ryyppyputken - Walter loytaa roskasailiosta nuhruisen kasinuken. Majavan. Kangasnukke kadessaan Walter voi jalleen puhua vapaasti. Ja vielapa brittiaksentilla! Mutta samalla kun Walter loytaa itsensa uudelleen, uusi majavapersoona saa hanesta yliotteen! Kaksinkertaiset Oscar-voittajat Mel Gibson ja Jodie Foster ovat tehneet palkitun kasikirjoituksen avulla yhden vuoden omaperaisimmista elokuvahelmista.

programme.title: Big Mommas House
programme.desc: Karannutta vankia jahtaava agentti Malcolm Turner (Martin Lawrence) lahtee suorittamaan peitetehtavaa ja pukeutuu maarailevaksi ja isokokoiseksi mummoksi, joka mottaa yhta kovaa kuin komentaakin.

programme.title: Wagons East
programme.desc: He tulivat hakemaan kultaa, mutta he tyytyivat mielellaan hyvaan viemarijarjestelmaan.John Candy ja Richard Lewis tahdittavat epatyypillista lankkaria.

programme.title: 36 Husbands
programme.desc: 36 Husbands on mystinen, musikaalinen Kung Fu -vakoojakomedia, jonka paaosissa on 3 vahvaa naista - ja joukko aviomiehia. Kristalla, huippuvakoojalla ja Kung Fu -mestarilla, on poikkeuksellisia voimia, ja han ottaa ne kayttoon pyrkiessaan hidastamaan tasaista kulkua kohti kolmatta maailmansotaa.

programme.title: Monte Carlo
programme.desc: Grace (Selena Gomez) on tavallinen tytto, josta tulee vahingossa prinsessa, kun perheen kesamatka Pariisiin muuttuu elaman laajuiseksi fantasiaksi. Grace, joka elaa kuin kuninkaallinen kahden parhaan ystavansa kanssa, huomaa, kuka han todella on – omaksumalla toisen henkilon identiteetin.

programme.title: Wheres The Money
programme.desc: South Los Angelesista kotoisin oleva nuori ja terava Del saa tietaa, etta hanen vankilassa istuva isansa ja juuri telkien takaa vapautunut setansa ovat varastaneet miljoona dollaria, jotka ovat katkettyina eraan vanhan rakennuksen kellarissa. On vain yksi pieni ongelma: arvostettu yliopisto on levittaytynyt naapurustoon, ja vanha yomaja on askettain keskiluokkaistunut valkoisten opiskelijoiden veljeskuntatalo.

programme.title: Unelmien Naapuri
programme.desc: Teravapiirtokuvalla ja bonusmateriaaleilla varustettu Emile Hirschin, Elisha Cuthbertin ja Timothy Olyphantin tahdittama riehakas komedia on kuumempi kuin koskaan! High Schoolista juuri valmistuva luokan priimus, Matthew Kidman haluaa saada koulun paatokseen ilman teinihorhoilyjen aiheuttamia ongelmia. Valitettavasti, ongelma muuttaa naapuriin, eika Matthew pysty vastustamaan kiusausta.

programme.title: Shriek If You Know What I Did Last Friday the 13th
programme.desc: Toimittaja tutkii murhasarjaa, joka tunnetaan nimella Spring break massacre ja se vie sekasorron viela pidemmalle tassa slasher-elokuvien parodiassa.

programme.title: Come to Daddy
programme.desc: Kun Norval saa odottamatta kirjeen vieraantuneelta isaltaan, han matkustaa isan syrjaiselle rantatalolle. Mutta hyvin pian han huomaa omituisen tunnelman, ja kaivatusta jalleentapaamisesta muodostuu helvetillinen painajainen.

programme.title: The King of Comedy
programme.desc: Uransa kanssa kamppaileva koomikko uhkapelaa epavarman tulevaisuutensa tehdessaan hullun suunnitelman saada lunnaiden avulla tiensa televisioon kidnappaamalla suositun keskusteluohjelman isannan.

programme.title: Winds of the Wasteland
programme.desc: John Wayne stars in this Republic Pictures western about the final days of the Pony Express. Former rider John Blair (Wayne) enters a coach race to win a $25,000 government mail contract, but there are dozens of obstacles in his path. The rest of the cast includes Lane Chandler and Phyllis Fraser, plus Lew Kelly (Lady of Burlesque) doing a great comic turn as Rocky OBrien, the eccentric, self-proclaimed mayor of a deserted mining town.

programme.title: Painted Desert
programme.desc: A mightly melodrama of red-blooded action, William Boyd stars in the Pre-Code western talkie - The Painted Desert (1931). The first sound film for Hollywood heavyweight Clark Gable, The Painted Desert finds Boyd and Gable at odds over the affections of a cowboys beautiful daughter (Helen Twelvetrees).

programme.title: Buffalo Stampede
programme.desc: A big time cast, including Randolph Scott, Buster Crabbe, Barton MacLane, and Harry Carey star in this feature about stampedes, Indian attacks, and plundering thieves! Directed by the esteemed Henry Hathaway (True Grit, Niagara).

programme.title: Adventures of Gallant Bess
programme.desc: Rather than a gorgeous Hollywood starlet, actor Cameron Mitchell (Carousel), playing cowboy Ted Daniels, shares the screen in this film with a magnificent wild horse named Gallant Bess, who he tames, trains and keeps for himself. But after Ted is gravely injured in a fixed rodeo, Bess is stolen away from him and forced to join a cruel traveling carnival in this fast-paced western from director Lew Landers (The Adventures of Rin Tin Tin).

programme.title: Gunsmoke Ranch
programme.desc: Flagg is relocating flood victims to Gunsmoke Ranch. The Three Mesquiteers know Flagg to be a crook and try to warn them. They ignore the warning and improve the land only to find that it has been condemned for a new dam.

programme.title: Law of the Pampas
programme.desc: Murder below the Equator...and Hopalong Cassidy races to action in the heart of the wild Pampas country !Hoppy (William Boyd) and his pal Lucky (Russell Hayden) head to South America to look after a herd of cattle sold by Cassidys boss to an Argentine rancher. Unfortunately, the scoundrel Ralph Merritt (Sidney Blackmer) wants the cattle, and hes not above hiring some dangerous characters to do his dirty work. Its a test of blazing guns...under a blazing sun! Can the boys of Bar 20 lay down the law in a lawless place like the Pampas? Can Hoppy and his gang succeed in what is truly a last frontier? Watch and see!

programme.title: A Lust to Kill
programme.desc: An imprisoned outlaw escapes and goes on the hunt for his brothers murderers, who just happen to be members of the outlaws own gang. He and his beloved hit the trail, but are pursued by local law enforcement, who have their own plans for justice. Starring Don Megowan, Jim Davis, and Allison Hayes.

programme.title: The Fighting Redhead
programme.desc: When a rustler named Faro kills one of his own henchmen and blames it on Sheila OConner, Red and Little Beaver set out to clear Sheila and to find evidence against Faro and his gang.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The Cartwrights try to invalidate a Spanish land grant to stop the De La Cuesta family from taking part of the Ponderosa and all of the Carson Valley settlers land.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Blood on the Land
programme.desc: Adam Cartwright finds himself hostage to Jeb, a dangerous sheep herder who wants Ben to sign over a large plot of land.Starring Michael Landon as Little Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben helps three deserters, escaped from an Army stockade. Learning what they had to deal with, Ben promises to share the truth with his friend who is in charge of the fort.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben and Adam are in jail, about to be hung for a crime they didnt commit. Joe and Hoss must find out why the witnesses to the alleged crime have lied about what happened before the execution takes place. They receive help from a vagrant named Lassiter who is looking for the men who committed a lynching in Kansas years ago.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The son of a neighboring rancher intends to sell their land for a mining operation that will ruin the water rights agreement that Andy and Ben made years ago. Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The Cartwrights take a young boy to the Ponderosa after the death of his mother. Hoss is the only one that is able to get through the boys hostility and bitterness, but, as the two begin to get close, the boys father breaks out of prison and comes to retrieve the boy.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Bobbie Jo and the Beatnik
programme.desc: Bobbie Jo falls head over heals for an edgy young poet from New York. He likes her, too, but hes not fond of Hooterville. Of coure, Kate has to show Bobby Jo what this pompous fool is all about. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963. Look for Dennis Hopper as the beatnik.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 My Daughter the Doctor
programme.desc: The family wants Billie Jo to become a doctor, but she wants to go to Hollywood to become an actress. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. And be sure to look for Adam West in a pre-Batman role as Doctor Clayton Harris. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in January, 1964.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Billie Jo recieves an endowment, but instead of using it for medical school, she wishes to go to Hollywood.Kate meets with Judge Drucker to see if she can legally prevent the girl from goinng. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Visit from a Big Star
programme.desc: A famous movie star (John Vivyan) stays at the Shady Rest Hotel. He wants to get away from the spotlight for a while, but it appears that Uncle Joe has told the entire valley that the hotel has a special guest. .Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Ralph Levy. Episode first aired January 28, 1964

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe tries to convince two rich women that Shady Rest is a farm. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Guy Scarpitta..Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aried in February of 1964.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 The Very Old Antique
programme.desc: Homer Bedloe (Charles Lane) tries to sell the Cannonball to a rich man as an antique.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1964.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Spur Line to Shady Rest
programme.desc: The Shady Rest hotel is threatened when a railroad detective comes to investigate a forgotten spur line on the property. Creator Paul Henning followed up the success of The Beverly Hillbillies with this charming CBS comedy that ran for 222 episodes. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Quick Hide the Railroad
programme.desc: Kate uses her charms to keep Homer Bedloe from catching the train to Pixley. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Bedloe: Charles Lane. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The President Who Came to Dinner
programme.desc: President of the railroad comes to visit the Shady Rest hotel with the intention to terminate the Cannonballs service. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Is There a Doctor in the Roundhouse
programme.desc: Railroad CEO Norman Curtis breaks the Cannonballs throttle lever, threatening the success of the Shady Rest Hotels annual jamboree. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Norman Curtis: Roy Roberts. Directed by David Alexander.Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Custers Last Stand
programme.desc: The survivor of an Indian attack acquires a rare medicine arrow, and a menacing character named Blade (Reed Howes) will stop at nothing to take it from him. Elmer Clifton (Assassin of Youth, Seven Doors to Death) directs a memorable cast that includes Rex Lease (The Sign of the Wolf, The Monster Walks), Lona Andre (Slaves in Bondage, Death in the Air), and William Farnum (Samson and Delilah). Meanwhile, Frank McGlynn Jr is in the title role of General George A. Custer.

programme.title: Cowboy And The Prizefighter
programme.desc: Red Ryder takes Steve Stevenson, who has saved his life, to his ranch and gives him a job. Reds aunt, the Duchess, knew Steves father, who supposedly committed suicide after losing his ranch betting on a prizefight. Steve refuses to believe that his father took his own life, suspecting he was murdered. Red and Little Beaver aid Steve in finding his father killer.

programme.title: Riders of Destiny
programme.desc: John Wayne sings! Well, not really. His voice was dubbed here, but as Singin Sandy Saunders hes still able to write the code of justice with a blazing sixgun! Hes a government agent out to help a group of ranchers in their battle with a villain who is tying up local water rights. Also starring Gabby Hayes, Al St. John, Yakima Canutt, and Cecilia Parker, Riders of Destiny was filmed early in Waynes career it was his first for Lone Star but the unmistakable swagger is already in place!

programme.title: Santa Fe Trail
programme.desc: Oscar winner Michael Curtiz (Casablanca, Mildred Pierce) directed this exciting drama about Army officer Jeb Stuart and the days leading up to the Civil War. Errol Flynn (The Adventures of Robin Hood) stars as Stuart, with Olivia de Havilland as his romantic interest (the seventh of nine times they were paired together by Warner Bros.) The cast includes Ronald Reagan as General George Custer, and Raymond Massey as John Brown, with such familiar faces as Alan Hale and Van Hefflin in supporting roles. Filmed partly in Santa Fe!

programme.title: Ghost Town Gold [The Three Mesquiteers]
programme.desc: CAVALIERS OF THE CACTUS COUNTRY--ALWAYS READY FOR A FIGHT OR A FROLICK! The second entry in what would grow into a wildly popular series of Western Three Mesquiteers B-Movies produced by Republic Pictures, Ghost Town Gold tracks the titular trio as they attempt to recover the gold stolen by a gang in its effort to ruin the bank/mayor who ordered them to leave town. Frequent John Wayne collaborator Joseph Kane adds his signature directorial panache to this rousing shoot-em-up, setting the tone for a film series that was so rampantly successful, it spawned 50 sequels and a host of imitators from rival studios.

programme.title: Idaho
programme.desc: Western icon Roy Rogers, along with his trusty companion Trigger, are back for another adventure. This time, a respected judge is being framed for murder by a crooked saloon owner. Always the valiant champion, Rogers vows to clear the name of the judge and find the truth all while courting a lovely beau. Cellist turned editor turned Republic Pictures workhorse Joseph Kane takes the reins of this rousing, musical adventure, which features a number of original songs performed by Rogers himself, with the help of singer-songwriter Bob Nolan and character actor Smiley Burnette (TVs Petticoat Junction).

programme.title: Neath Canadian Skies
programme.desc: Its the mounties versus claim jumpers in this drama from Golden Gate Pictures. Based on an action-packed novel by James Oliver Curwood and directed by B. Reeves Maynard (Undersea Kingdom, The Phantom Empire), the film features an outstanding cast of Poverty Row regulars, including Russell Hayden, Inez Cooper, Cliff Nazarro, I. Stanford Jolley, and Kermit Maynard. For movie buffs: Cinematographer Marcel Le Picard began his career in the silent era and finished with exactly 200 credits!

programme.title: The Dude Ranger
programme.desc: Its nothing but action and thrills when an Easterner inherits a cattle ranch and discovers that thousands of cattle have been stolen. Secretly, he signs on as a hired hand at his own ranch to uncover the thief. Once he realizes whats going on, the city boy becomes a hard-riding, avenging son of a six- shooter! Directed by Edward F. Cline from a story by Zane Grey, the film stars George OBrien, Irene Hervey, and LeRoy Mason.

programme.title: The Gunman from Bodie
programme.desc: The Rough Riders, a popular group that thrilled audiences in the early 1940s, are after a gang of rustlers in this B-western from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Starring Buck Jones, Tim McCoy, and Raymond Hatton, this movie features everything from lawmen going undercover to the Rough Riders looking after an orphaned baby! Also, be on the lookout for the beautiful Christine McIntyre, who would go on to appear in several of the Three Stooges shorts for Colombia Pictures.

programme.title: Young Bill Hickock
programme.desc: Roy Rogers stars as the title character in this actionpacked feature from Republic Pictures. Starring Sally Payne as Calamity Jane, and Rogerss ongoing sidekick George Gabby Hayes, this twofisted saga relives some of Americas most colorful days, and also has time for a few musical numbers, including Up and Down the Prairie, and When the Shadows Fall Across the Rockies.

programme.title: Broadway to Cheyenne
programme.desc: A gang of big-city thugs trying to set up a protection racket out west meet their match in this B-Western from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Rex Bell, billed on the old print ads as The heroic idol of young America! stars as Breezy Kildare, a New York detective who happens to be in Wyoming. When Breezy leads a group of cattleman against the well-armed city boys, the bad guys will wish theyd stayed in New York! The rest of the cast includes such favorites from the period as George Gabby Hayes, Roy DArcy, and Marceline Day. (Day worked opposite everyone from John Wayne to Buster Keaton, but retired from acting shortly after this movie at age 25.) Directed by Harry L. Fraser.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Tagg Oakley finds himself in trouble after being tricked into driving a wagon full of gunpowder to Fort Yuma, unaware that Geronimo and his Apache braves are waiting for the wagon to pass. Realizing Tagg is in danger, Annie and Lofty race to the rescue. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie writes to the son of an old female pedlar, unaware that he is a member of an outlaw gang, now on their way to Diablo. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Also starring Slim Pickens. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E23 The Saga of Clement O Toole
programme.desc: Mistaken for a notorious outlaw, a young man struggles to convince the townspeople that he didnt commit a stagecoach robbery. Initially, Annie and Susan Meriwether believe him, but his innocence comes into question when he is present during a bank robbery in which the outlaws seem to recognize him. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: With the sheriff off looking for an outlaw, a fake sheriff takes his place, leading to a senseless murder. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This enetertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Waiting to hear whether or not gold has been struck in the mine, Annie discovers a beloved stagecoach is being driven by the daughter of the owner, whos threatening to sell the stage so he can pocket the money. When word comes back that there is no gold in the money, Annie becomes suspicious and begins investigating. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Annie Calls Her Shots
programme.desc: After a jailed Dobie escapes from jail, Dobie and Tagg find themselves kidnapped, forcing a desperate Annie to rescue her brother. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Valley of the Shadows
programme.desc: Annie tries to help a blind girl find her fathers killer. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Directed by Robert G. Walker. Also starring Judy Nugent, Forrest Taylor, and Denver Pyle. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Annie and the Lily Maid
programme.desc: Choctaw looks to inherit the ranch of the murdered Sam Forbes, but Elaine, a previously unknown niece, appears, making Annie suspicious as the men fall for her seemingly delicate nature. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Recently released from prison, Vic Carver, and his brother Johnny, searches for Annies Uncle Luke to enact revenge. Annie successfully gets her uncle out of town, but an angry Vic kidnaps Tagg. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: With the help of Annie and Lofty, Clay Griffin, a lawman whose eyesight is deteriorating, confronts Johnny Storm and the Murdocks after they are involved in a robbery. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: After raising money for charity with a circus sideshow, Annie and Tagg are robbed of their money by a man named the Welshman. Annie and Lofty set up a trap with one last performance. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Annie Makes a Marriage
programme.desc: Annie tries to help an ex-convict prove his innocence so that he can be with the woman he loves. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho protect a man being chased by outlaws who believe he is responsible for a gold robbery. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho break a woman out of prison before she is hanged for murder.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. programme.title: Colorado
programme.desc: Theres trouble out west! Its the Civil War and the Union needs troops back east to defend itself. Roy Rogers stars as Lieutenant Jerry Burke, who is sent to investigate why the returning troops are being stalled in Colorado. Also starring Gabby Hayes, Pauline Moore, and Milburn Stone, this film is action packed with a turn you wont see coming!

programme.title: Hurricane Horseman
programme.desc: Pancho Gomez kidnaps Don Roberto and his daughter, Tonita for ransom. Can an undercover lawman named Gun Smith save the pair, or will he be caught himself?! Smith gets a job in Gomezs camp supposedly to repair their guns. Instead he fixes the guns so they will misfire. When Gomez refuses to let him go, he sends his horse for the Sheriff! This campy western from 1931 stars Lane Chandler and is sure to keep you enthralled from beginning to end. Directed by Armand Schaefer; starring Marie Quillan and Walter Miller.

programme.title: Way of the West
programme.desc: Government agent Gordon (Hal Taliaferro) goes undercover to investigate an ongoing war between cattlemen and sheepmen. But he soon finds himself framed for murder! This low budget western from the short-lived Empire Pictures is from the golden era of shoot em ups, when audiences knew who the bad guys were, and couldnt wait for the good guys to serve up some just punishment!

programme.title: Sagebrush Trail
programme.desc: John Wayne plays a man wrongly convicted of murder in this exciting western drama from Lone Star Pictures. Youll enjoy plenty of gun action and thundering hoofbeats as he escapes from jail and then joins a gang, hoping to find the real killer! Director Armand Schaefer (The Miracle Rider, The Lost Jungle) whips up some fine performances from a cast of B-movie favorites, including Lane Chandler (Samson and Delilah) and the great stunt rider, Yakima Canutt. And of course, the film features plenty of fight scenes, made memorable by John Waynes big swinging right fist! For film buffs: This was one of 11 films Wayne starred in that year, making 1933 one of the busiest years of Waynes...

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: Brother battles brother in this gritty tale of feuding ranchers in the old west. This story of the Texas panhandle stars such familiar faces as Robert Preston, Chill Wills, and Jack Elam, and was a rare film for its time in that it was filmed almost entirely in Texas with no studio interiors. If for no other reason, watch this one for Prestons performance. If you only know him from The Music Man or Victor Victoria, youre sure to be surprised here! (also, look for John Drew Barrymore as Jef Cloud. He was part of the famous Barrymore family, and father of Drew Barrymore.) Jim Strake: Frank Cordell. The Whip: Dave Kashner. Directed by George Templeton

programme.title: Hoppy Serves a Writ
programme.desc: Sheriff Hopalong Cassidy triumphs again in this lighthearted western romp from Harry Sherman Productions. Good ol Hoppy (William Boyd) has to leave his beloved Texas to track down some bad guys in Oklahoma. You can bet that the action and suspense will follow Hopalong wherever he goes. Also, look for a number of familiar faces in the ast, including TVs future Superman George Reeves, notorious Hollywood heavy Victor Jory, and in his first credited role, Robert Mitchum! In fact, Mitchum would appear in more of Hoppys adventures before branching out on his own and becoming one of Hollywoods greatest stars. Also featuring Jan Christy, Forbes Murray, Byron Foulger, Earle Hodgins, and Roy...

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: GT, those two letters stand for vehicles that combine sportiness with long-distance comfort. One of the most beautiful models of this category is the Maserati Gran Turismo S. With the 570GT, English sports car manufacturer McLaren introduced its first grand tourer. It was supposed to be the most comfortable and most suitable McLaren for long distances, while still retaining its sports car genes.

programme.title: Supercars

programme.title: Super Cars

programme.title: Supercars

programme.title: Super Cars
programme.desc: Exploring the luxury, speed, and high-tech power of the fastest and finest cars in the world; the workmanship, the highest level of engineering, and the most expensive price are the deciding factors for the winner of the Supercar Title.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: These days theres hardly a car manufacturer who doesnt build any kind of SUV. Three of the sportiest SUVs on the market are the Porsche Macan Turbo, Mercedes GLA 45 AMG and Audi RSQ3. Each of them comes with more than 300 HP.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The Porsche Panamera Turbo S is the most dynamic sedan in the world. No other car finds the perfect balance between calm gliding on the one hand and extreme performance on the other hand.

programme.title: Supercars

programme.title: Supercars

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Most people associate Aston Martin with James Bond, luxury, style, and elegance. The Vantage N430 is a sports car that makes you feel the heritage of British race cars. It is elegant, fast, comes with a marvelous sound.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Mercedes presents its first plug-in hybrid car with the S500. With an electric range of 33 kilometers, a declared average consumption of 2.8 liters, and a system output of 442 horses the S500 is the most efficient luxury car on the market.

programme.title: Taxi Bean
programme.desc: When one of the toy cars of his racing track set becomes broken, Mr. Bean decides to buy a new one.

programme.title: Scrapper Cleans Up
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesn’t. It’s too expensive.

programme.title: Missing Teddy
programme.desc: Bean discovers that, in the world of organised crime, a teddy isn’t always a teddy. Sometimes it’s a rabbit.

programme.title: Artful Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean gets a real bug for painting. Then several bugs… and flies and slugs and mice.

programme.title: Home Movie
programme.desc: Mr. Bean attempts to make his own home movie – a horror thriller with Mrs. Wicket as the star!

programme.title: Bean Bug
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas, and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person.

programme.title: Birthday Bother
programme.desc: It’s Irma’s birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two –one nice, one silly.

programme.title: In The Wild
programme.desc: Mr. Bean decides to become a wildlife photographer.

programme.title: Missing Teddy
programme.desc: Bean discovers that, in the world of organised crime, a teddy isn’t always a teddy. Sometimes it’s a rabbit.

programme.title: No Parking
programme.desc: Mr Bean cant find a parking space. So he makes one of his own.

programme.title: Beans Bounty
programme.desc: Whilst digging for buried treasure, Mr Bean digs himself a hole too deep to get out of.

programme.title: Artful Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean gets a real bug for painting. Then several bugs… and flies and slugs and mice.

programme.title: The Fly
programme.desc: Bean fights a loosing battle with a winged beast from Hell.

programme.title: Spring Clean
programme.desc: Mr Bean finds that cleanliness can be a filthy business.

programme.title: No Pets
programme.desc: His landlady smells a fish when Mr Bean gets a bird.

programme.title: A Ray of Sunshine
programme.desc: Sunbathing proves a more strenuous pursuit for Mr Bean.

programme.title: Birthday Bear
programme.desc: Mr Bean forgets his teddy’s Birthday - then gives him a treat to remember.

programme.title: Game Over
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wicket’s nephew.

programme.title: Special Delivery
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair.

programme.title: A Dogs Life
programme.desc: Mr Bean dog-sits for Irma and while in the park comes across a professional dog-walker.

programme.title: The Big Stink
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up in a farm slurry pit after racing a tractor.

programme.title: Birthday Bother
programme.desc: It’s Irma’s birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two –one nice, one silly.

programme.title: Bed Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he can’t.

programme.title: Spa Day
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat.

programme.title: Charity Bean
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan.

programme.title: Bean Encore
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert.

programme.title: Mobile Home
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind.

programme.title: Haunted House
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills.

programme.title: Eau De Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wicket’s new, expensive perfume on the floor.

programme.title: Running On Empty
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol.

programme.title: Bean Bug
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas, and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person.

programme.title: Coffee Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is out shopping when it starts to rain.

programme.title: The Big Freeze
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wakes up on a freezing cold winter’s morning to discover that the boiler is broken.

programme.title: Scrapper Cleans Up
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesn’t. It’s too expensive.

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irma’s Mum, at all costs.

programme.title: Save That Tree
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down.

programme.title: For Sale
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale.

programme.title: Jumping Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try.

programme.title: Cat Chaos
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing.

programme.title: Stick It
programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wicket’s nephew and Bruiser Jnr swopping football stickers.

programme.title: Bean At The Museum
programme.desc: Mr. Bean thinks he’s just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden.

programme.title: A Car For Irma
programme.desc: Bean discovers Declan giving Irma a lift in his swanky new SUV.

programme.title: Trophy Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket’s Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Bound course.

programme.title: Home Movie
programme.desc: Mr. Bean attempts to make his own home movie – a horror thriller with Mrs. Wicket as the star!

programme.title: Fish Sitting
programme.desc: Mr. Bean has to look after Mrs. Wickets goldfish.

programme.title: The Cruise
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime.

programme.title: Coconut Shy
programme.desc: Mr. Bean has to buy a cup for Teddy, but he has no money.

programme.title: Green Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Beans electricity is cut off so he decides to build a wind turbine.

programme.title: Cash Machine
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to buy a cupcake, but his wallet is empty, so he has to visit a cash dispenser.

programme.title: Litterbugs
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town.

programme.title: Rat Trap
programme.desc: Mr. Bean has to deal with an unwanted house guest but the stubborn rat refuses to leave.

programme.title: Valentines Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean tries to be romantic, but his idea of what that means is different to Irmas.

programme.title: All You Can Eat
programme.desc: Irma is coming for dinner, but Mr. Bean has forgotten about it and so doesnt have anything to cook.

programme.title: Flat Pack
programme.desc: Mr. Beans bookcase collapses, so he buys a new one in the hardware store.

programme.title: Holiday For Teddy

This all seems to change when she falls for her “Prince Charming”, Dennis, who is both a caring gentleman and a great friend to her son. But her perfect world begins to crumble when she finds a black rose on her doorstep, hears noises in the attic and gets prank calls in the middle of the night. After breaking up with Dennis her life begins to turn upside down and strange things start happening. Questioning her own sanity and left alone by authorities, friends and family, she decides to take matters into her own hands- a dangerous decision that puts her life on the line…
