programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 The Fourth Wars - Heat C
programme.desc: A competitor faces issues before the battle even begins in this week’s eliminators and the house robots stand by, ready to strike the final blow. The clock proves to be the enemy in this week’s Pinball Warrior, and the competitors prepare to stand their ground in Sumo Bash.

programme.title: Lamant double
programme.desc: Chloella on ihana terapeuttimies Louis, mutta myos kipera ongelma. Miehen identtinen kaksoisveli Paul on kiinnostunut Chloesta seka eroottisesti etta psykoanalyysin kohteena. Miellyttava empaatikko Louis ja jaatava manipuloija Paul eivat ole koskaan samassa paikassa, mutta jo seksikohtausten lihallisuus vakuuttaa katsojalle, ettei dilemma ole vain Chloen paassa.

programme.title: Never Too Late
programme.desc: Nelja Vietnamin sodan vankileirilta selvinnytta veteraania paattaa suorittaa viimeisen pakonsa - vanhainkodista. Pakosuunnitelman tyostaminen seniilissa porukassa tuo kuitenkin omat haasteensa. Jokaisella on kuitenkin oma unelmansa, jonka vuoksi he ovat valmiita viimeiseen urotekoonsa - aina kun muistavat.

programme.title: Then Came You
programme.desc: Yksinainen leski suunnittelee maailmanymparimatkaa aviomiehensa tuhkien kanssa kaydakseen paikoissa, joihin he ihastuivat katsomissaan elokuvissa. Matkan ensimmainen etappi muuttaa hanen elamansa iaksi.

programme.title: No Stranger Than Love
programme.desc: Kaikki kylan miehen ovat rakastuneet Lucyyn. Han on kiltti, sympaattinen, hauska ja lojaali – taydellinen nainen, joka ei tee mitaan vaarin. Mutta nyt han on suostunut romanttiseen tapaamiseen koulun jalkapallojoukkueen naimisissa olevan valmentajan Clintin kanssa. Juuri kun he ovat aloittamassa suhdettaan Clint putoaa aukkoon, joka ilmestyy Lucyn olohuoneen lattiaan. Se ei olekaan mika hyvansa kuoppa, vaan loputon musta aukko, missa Clint kelluu kuin eri ulottuvuudessa.Lucyn taytyy yrittaa pelastaa Clint paljastamatta heidan salaista suhdettaan ja vahemman taydellista puoltaan koko kylalle.

programme.title: The Way You Look Tonight
programme.desc: Peter lahestyy kolmeakymmenta, mutta on edelleen eksyksissa ja janoaa rakkautta loputtomien ja tuloksettomien nettideittien avulla. Yhtena aamuna Peter heraa ja huomaa deittiseuransa jattaneen hanet sankyyn yksin. Peter yrittaa jattaa kaiken taakseen ja hakee taas uusia deitteja samalta sivustolta. Jokainen tapaaminen avaa aivan uuden kokemusmaailman. Se saa hanet kyseenalaistamaan kaiken, mika liittyy luonnonvoimiin, vetovoimaan ja aitoon rakkauteen. Suuri kysymys jaa vaille vastausta; voiko Peter rakastua oikeasti ja loytaa aidon rakkauden?

programme.title: Stay Cool
programme.desc: Menestyskirjailija Henry McCarthy palaa kotikaupunkiinsa aloittaakseen tyot opettajana. Samalla han joutuu kohtaamaan nuoruudenrakkautensa Scarletin ja hatistelemaan kimpustaan uuteen opettajaansa palavasti rakastunutta teinityttoa Shastaa.

programme.title: The Last Kiss
programme.desc: Vauva on tulossa! Lahestyva harmaa keski-ikaisyys ja isyyden herattamat monet tunteet hammentavat miesta, jonka pasmat sekoavat totaalisesti kun vastaan kavelee kaunis teinitytto Kim.

programme.title: Toivon lahteet
programme.desc: Oltuaan 30 vuotta naimisissa keski-ikainen pariskunta ryhtyy intensiiviseen viikon kestavaan pariterapiaan tyostaakseen parisuhdettaan.

programme.title: Love and Other Drugs
programme.desc: Vapaamielinen Maggie (Anne Hathaway) kohtaa Viagraa kauppaavan Jamien (Jake Gyllenhaal). Heidan kemiansa petihommissa toimii, joten he paattavat aloittaa suhteen – ilman sitoumuksia. Mutta Maggien ja Jamien ottaa valtaansa huumeista vaarallisin – rakkaus!

programme.title: Modern Persuasion
programme.desc: Moderni versio Jane Austenin ”Viisasteleva sydan” -romaanista. Wren Cosgrove on onnellinen sinkku, joka myontaa avoimesti olevansa tyonarkomaani. Uransa huipulla han huomaa paatyvansa joka ilta kotiin kissansa luokse. Kun Owen Jasper (”se mies, joka paasi karkuun”) palkkaa Wrenin firman, vanhat tunteet heraavat ja Wren saa uuden tilaisuuden tosirakkauteen.

programme.title: Never Too Late
programme.desc: Nelja Vietnamin sodan vankileirilta selvinnytta veteraania paattaa suorittaa viimeisen pakonsa - vanhainkodista. Pakosuunnitelman tyostaminen seniilissa porukassa tuo kuitenkin omat haasteensa. Jokaisella on kuitenkin oma unelmansa, jonka vuoksi he ovat valmiita viimeiseen urotekoonsa - aina kun muistavat.

programme.title: Kuukauden tyontekija (Employee of the Month)
programme.desc: Kaksi aarimmaisen kilpailunhaluista tukkukaupan tyontekijaa kilpailee ”Kuukauden tyontekija” -tittelista ja siita, kumpi voittaa kuuman uuden kassanhoitajan sydamen tassa hulvattomassa komediassa.

programme.title: The Dreamers
programme.desc: Kolme elokuvantuntijaa, amerikkalainen vaihto-opiskelija Matthew seka kaksoset Theo ja Isabelle ovat tulleet laheisiksi yhteisen kiinnostuksen kohteensa vuoksi. Theon ja Isabellen epatavallinen intiimi yhteys kiehtoo Matthew’ta. Kun kaksosten vanhemmat lahtevat kuukaudeksi matkoille, Matthew saa kutsun asumaan heidan luokseen, ja he eksyvat elokuvafantasian maailmaan. The Dreamers on Oscar-palkitun Bernardo Bertoluccin romanttinen draamaelokuva, jonka paaosissa ovat Michael Pitt, Louis Garrel ja Eva Green.

Kirjailija luuli kirjoittavansa tulevaisuudesta, mutta kirjoittikin menneisyydesta. Hanen romaanissaan juna ajaa silloin talloin vuoteen 2046. Jokaisella matkustajalla oli sama aikomus: elaa kadotetut muistonsa uudestaan. Sanottiin, etta vuonna 2046 mikaan ei ollut muuttunut. Kukaan ei tarkkaan tiennyt, oliko se totta, koska matkustajat eivat koskaan palanneet - paitsi yksi. Han oli siella mutta halusi lahtea pois.

programme.title: Kesaprinssi
programme.desc: PR-kriisinhallitsija Deidre ja hanen assistenttinsa Mandy lentavat apuun, kun kapinallinen kuninkaallinen, prinssi Colin, pidatetaan idaholaisessa pikkukaupungissa. Deidren selvitellessa omaa fiaskoaan Mandy huomaa odottamattomia ura- ja romanssimahdollisuuksia.

programme.title: Loves Last Resort
programme.desc: 10 vuoden seurustelun jalkeen Chloen poikaystava Eric ei ole viela kypsynyt Chloen haluamaksi mieheksi. Chloe toivoo voivansa nopeuttaa asioiden kulkua jattamalla hanet. Kuusi kuukautta myohemmin he tapaavat, ja Eric paljastaa menevansa naimisiin. Paastakseen pois kaikesta Chloe lahtee lomalle, ja samaan lomapaikkaan ilmestyy Eric tyttoystavansa kanssa.

programme.title: Long Story Short
programme.desc: Tama on kertomus Ellenista ja hanen ystavistaan seka heidan enemman tai vahemman itse aiheuttamistaan monimutkaisista rakkauselamistaan ja romanttisista unelmistaan. Kolmen vuoden ajan ystavapiirin parhaat ja huonoimmat rakkaustarinat tiivistyvat ja kerrotaan kahdeksan luvun kautta, joista jokainen sijoittuu eri juhlatilaisuuteen. Ryhma kamppailee taydellisen suhteen idean kanssa ja joutuu arvioimaan uudelleen, mita todellinen rakkaus oikein on.

programme.title: Bottled with Love
programme.desc: Abbey on onneton, turhautunut ja melkein toivosta luopunut uranainen, koska deittailu ei ota sujuakseen. Isoaiti ehdottaa, etta Abbey kirjoittaisi kaikki toiveensa rakkauskirjeeksi suoraan sydamestaan. Abbey noudattaa neuvoa vastahakoisesti, panee kirjeen pulloon ja heittaa sen mereen. Aika kuluu, ja kuukausia myohemmin Abbey aloittaa projektin pomonsa pojan Nickin kanssa. Nick on sattumalta loytanyt pullopostin tietamatta, etta se on Abbeyn. Mutta vahitellen han tajuaa yhdistaa kirjeen Abbeyyn. Tilanne ja salaisuus kayvat hyvin kiusalliseksi ja Nick paattaa kertoa kirjeesta. Koska Nick on salannut asiaa pitkaan, Abbey kaskee hanta painumaan hemmettiin. Mutta Nick ei vahasta saikahda.

programme.title: Youth In Revolt
programme.desc: C.D. Paynen kulttikirjasarjaan perustuva varikkaan raavi, mutta sympaattinen elokuva aalioaikuisten ymparoiman Nick Twispin elamasta. Nick rakastuu palavasti upeaan Sheeniin, mutta perhe, etaisyys ja exan vehkeilyt pitavat parin erossa. Ongelmat oikomaan Nick luo viekkaan, viiksekkaan ja itsevarman sivupersoonan Francoisen, jonka ohjaksissa asiat kuitenkin mutkistuvat entisestaan. Sekopaista tarinaa tahdittaa mm. Steve Buscemi, Ray Liotta ja Justin Long

programme.title: Albert Nobbs
programme.desc: Albert Nobbs kertoo koskettavan tarinan 1800-luvun lopun Irlannissa, missa koyhan naisen elama on mahdotonta ilman elattajaa. Vuosikaudet Albert Nobbs on selvinnyt pukeutumalla mieheksi voidakseen tyoskennella hovimestarina Dublinin ylaluokan hotellissa. Tavatessaan hotelliin saapuvan komean maalarin, Albert havaitsee etta elama voi tarjota mahdollisuuksia myos hanen kaltaiselleen.

programme.title: Love and Other Drugs
programme.desc: Vapaamielinen Maggie (Anne Hathaway) kohtaa Viagraa kauppaavan Jamien (Jake Gyllenhaal). Heidan kemiansa petihommissa toimii, joten he paattavat aloittaa suhteen – ilman sitoumuksia. Mutta Maggien ja Jamien ottaa valtaansa huumeista vaarallisin – rakkaus!

programme.title: Jack and Jill Vs. The World
programme.desc: Jack on rutiineihin kangistunut mainosalan ammattilainen ja omaa New Yorkin juppien arvot. Eraana paivana han kuitenkin tormaa Jilliin, naiiviin nuoreen naiseen, joka on ihastuttava naky suurkaupungin ymparistossa. Jack tekee vaikutuksen Jilliin tarjotessaan hanelle toita seka huonetta asunnostaan. Hanen ystavallisyytensa koskettaa Jillia ja he ajautuvatkin nopeasti romanttisen suhteeseen, joka perustuu listaan saannoista joita Jill vaatii noudatettavan. Jillin eloisuus kaantaa Jackin maailman ylosalaisin, mutta hanta vaivaa uuden rakkautensa taustoja koskevien aiheiden valttely. Kaikki ei ole sita milta nayttaa ja Jillilla on salaisuus, joka saattaa muuttaa kaiken...

programme.title: All For Her
programme.desc: Devina ja hanen miehensa Rick kaipaavat lasta. Monien keskenmenojen jalkeen Devina tulee lopulta raskaaksi. Mutta kun selviaa, etta han on vakavasti sairas, alkaa taistelu aikaa vastaan. Devinan on pysyttava hengissa lapsen syntymaan asti…

programme.title: I Love You Phillip Morris
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva komedia mallikansalaisesta Steven Russellista (JIM CARREY), jonka radikaalilla elamanmuutoksella on hintansa. Patologisen valehtelijan munaukset vievat miehen suoraan kaapista hakkiin, kun han jaa luksuselamansa rahoittamiseen kehitetyista superhuijauksista kiinni rysan paalta. Vankilassa Stevenin yllattaa kuitenkin takaapain rynniva rakkaus, jota huijarin taipumukset ja poliisien pamput kuitenkin vaikeuttavat. Stevenilla on kuitenkin sairaita suunnitelmia rakastuneen parin saattamiseksi jalleen yhteen...

programme.title: The Next Best Thing
programme.desc: Joogaopettaja Abbie ja puutarhuri Robert jakavat useimmat asiat elamassa. Ilot. Surut. Haaveet. Ja kiinnostustuksen miehiin. Se, etta Robert on homo, on ainoa asia, joka estaa heita olemasta pari. Tietenkin he myos juhlivat yhdessa, ja eraan villin yon jalkeen he heraavat toistensa sylista. He voivat vain todeta, etta se tapahtui. Ja etta he menivat liian pitkalle. Todella liian pitkalle. Todiste siita on positiivinen raskaustesti..

programme.title: Vain Frendeja
programme.desc: Tapaus: Chris Bander. High school -vuodet eivat sujuneet mallikkaasti: kaveri oli ujo, ylipainoinen ja toivottomasti rakastunut koulun suosituimpaan typyyn nimelta Jamie. Mutta kun Chris viimein saa kerattya tarpeeksi rohkeutta kertoakseen Jamielle tunteistaan, tytto sanoo haluavansa olla vain ystavia. Tanaan Chris on losangelesilainen musiikkimoguli, jolla riittaa misuja vaikka joka sormelle. Mutta kun Chris kohtalon oikusta sattuu kavaisemaan vanhoilla kotinurkillaan, sulavaliikkeiselle pelimiehelle avautuu uusi mahdollisuus yrittaa hurmata Jamie. Mutta frendivyohyke on paha, ja harvassa ovat sielta ulosmurtautuneet uskalikot.

programme.title: They Came Together
programme.desc: Joelin (Paul Rudd) ja Mollyn (Amy Poehler) tapaaminen on vihaa ensisilmayksella: Joelin iso Corporate Candy Company uhkaa tehdan lopun Amyn omalaatuisesta karkkikaupasta. Lisaksi Joel haikailee edelleen seksikkaan exansa (Cobie Smulders) peraan. Kumma kylla he rakastuvat vain erotakseen elokuvan loppupuolella. Molly alkaa tapailla kirjanpitajaansa (Ed Helms). Mutta aivan loppuhetkilla...noh, sinun taytyy nahda se itse. (Vinkki: Joel pitaa suuren puheen ja he palaavat yhteen.) Railakas ja epakunnoittava, kumouksellinen romanttinen komedia Wet Hot American Summerin, Wanderlustin ja Role Modelsin ohjaajalta.

programme.title: Stay Cool
programme.desc: Menestyskirjailija Henry McCarthy palaa kotikaupunkiinsa aloittaakseen tyot opettajana. Samalla han joutuu kohtaamaan nuoruudenrakkautensa Scarletin ja hatistelemaan kimpustaan uuteen opettajaansa palavasti rakastunutta teinityttoa Shastaa.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: The first in the season will see Catherine Bennett and her youngest daughter Sarah Jane keen to downsize from their huge 13-bedroomed house in Mullingar. Theyre planning to move down the road, where they also own a 3-bed bungalow thats been uninhabited for the last nine years.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot faces a unique challenge in Clane, Co. Kildare.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Architect Dermot Bannon helps Senator Katherine Zappone and Dr Ann Louise Gilligan renovate a dilapidated hunting lodge in Brittas, Dublin.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Desperate for more space, a couple with two young daughters, who have long since outgrown their tiny cottage in Killawalla outside Westport, engage Dermot to help.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot revamps a Rathfarnham four-bed to suit the changing needs of its occupants Peter, Lisa and their twins Grace and Louise (9) live in a four-bed house in Rathfarnham, Dublin 14.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: A young couple with three children seek Dermots help in revamping their small three bedroomed bungalow in Ballinteer Ailish and Patrick Bates are a young couple running out of space - fast!

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot knows exactly how to solve the problem but it means destroying a lot of the work the couple have already done.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Childhood sweethearts are up against the clock to revamp their 70s bungalow in Enniskerry before their first baby arrives.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot needs to create "a bungalow downstairs" incorporating a bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, living and dining room.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is normally confident about presenting a plan. But with a couple as design-literate as Greg and Siobhan, the stakes are that bit higher.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is in Rathcoole with Mary Moore, the design solution Dermot offers Mary is one of the most unusual and interesting he has ever conceived.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Architect Dermot Bannon sets out to transform peoples living spaces. Before moving in to their 1940s ex-council house in Co Kilkenny, the Kirwans added a basic extension.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot wants to turn the house completely on its head, putting the bedrooms to the front and extending the back to include a kitchen, living and dining that leads into the garden.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is in Templetuohy, Co. Tipperary with Joanne and Sean Cleere who believe they need a substantial extension but Dermot doesnt actually concur.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Room to Improve starts with Margaret and Jodie Burke who plan to renovate the family home in Foxrock.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Pádraig Whooley and Lorraine Dufficey spent 265 thousand euros on their remote cottage at Rossmore in West Cork, they knew that - while the hilltop location was ideal - the house was far from it.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is in Laytown, co.Meath, with a budget of 60,000 euros, Dermots worry "is even if you took away the shoddy workmanship youd spend the 60k, this is a really difficult one..."

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is in Dalkey, with a budget of 180,000 euros, he must come up with an innovative design to match their exacting requirements within the confines of an incredibly tight site.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is in Clontarf, with Denise and Ben who desperately want a second bathroom for their family home, but their budget is limited.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is in Tullow, with Tom and Lisa who want to renovate their 19th century farmhouse.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Yvonne and John live in a housing estate in Dundalk with their two children. Four years ago, they decided to buy their next-door neighbours house.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Jim and Siobhan Doyle live in a beautiful old house over looking Dublin Bay in Sutton. See Dermot Bannon transform the rambling old house into a beautiful new space.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: The series begins in Cork City with our youngest and most ambitious couple yet, Meadhbh and Niall, both 27-years-old.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: After 10 successful years living in Boston, Elaine Mitchell made the decision to come back to the old sod with her earnings.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: No close neighbours, beautiful views of the Wicklow Mountains, a large vegetable patch, 10 hens, four ducks, two geese, four beehives, two dogs and three cats.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Marcus and Margaret are about to extend a two-bed cottage in Dundrum and share it with Marcuss beloved Aunt May.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: The number one criteria when buying a house is location and our fifth programme of the series is set in one of the most sought after costal parts of the country, Dalkey.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: John Rochford from Dublin and Lee Benn, originally from Limerick, have bought a house in their dream location - South Dublins seaside suburbia, Blackrock.

programme.desc: Dermot Bannon helps a family to transform their 70s bungalow outside Tipperary into a modern family home.

programme.desc: Featuring a diverse set of blue nature scenes from places like Hawaii, Mexico, Canada and California paired with a custom ambient track by Travis Revell.

programme.title: Cape Reinga and Giant Sand Dunes: New Zealand
programme.desc: Experiencing a waterfall flowing down a forest wall, surrounded by overgrown vines.

programme.title: Cliffside Beach: Indonesia
programme.desc: The thrilling view of a cliff-top lookout of one of Indonesias most breathtaking spots.

programme.title: Chemin Pealey: Îles de la Madeleine
programme.desc: Admiring the tranquility of water.

programme.title: Boardwalk to the Beach: Guadeloupe
programme.desc: Strolling on the boardwalk to the turquoise waters in Le Gosier, Guadeloupe.

programme.title: Breezy Beach: Dominican Republic
programme.desc: Discovering the dazzling sapphire waters on the Dominican Republics Playa Las Galeras.

programme.title: Kapas Biru Waterfall: Indonesia
programme.desc: An escape to Indonesia.

programme.title: Tranquil Marshes: British-Columbia
programme.desc: Nestled in the shadow of the Rockies, the waterlilies-covered marshes of Hope, British-Columbia, are a sight to behold.

programme.title: Magical Mcway Cove
programme.desc: The sights and sounds of Big Sur.

programme.title: Islands of Paradise
programme.desc: The beautiful Yasawa islands of Fiji.

programme.title: Flying Over Italy
programme.desc: Discovering the colorful architecture and stunning landscapes of Italy in a birds-eye view voyage.

programme.title: Tropical beaches: Indonesia
programme.desc: A remote Indonesian island with breathtaking scenery of various beaches.

programme.title: Relaxing Nature Sceneries
programme.desc: The filmmaker provides a collection of peaceful nature scenes and tranquil vistas that will soothe body and soul.

programme.title: Inambakan Falls: Philippines
programme.desc: Scenes of cascading falls and a pool reminiscent of blue gems, then a glimpse of the surrounding jungle greens.

programme.title: Tropical Weightlessness
programme.desc: Gently sway in the tropical turquoise waters with a glimpse of blue sky and palm trees.

programme.title: Deep Blue Aquarium
programme.desc: This HD Nature Relaxation Static scene lasting 1 hour features the rhythmic, trance-inducing sights and sounds of an underwater California kelp forest. Cool blues and shades of light bounce off of the dancing kelp and schools of fish; underwater sounds paired with healing ambient music by Yellow Brick Cinema adds an extra level of relaxation, making for the perfect virtual screensaver video to have on as a background video while working.

programme.title: Lombok Beaches: Indonesia
programme.desc: Experiencing the beaches of an Indonesian island set to a peaceful soundtrack.

programme.title: Tiga Warna Beach: Indonesia
programme.desc: Exploring the many faces of a breathtaking beach in Indonesia.

programme.title: Flying Over Iceland
programme.desc: An aerial journey to the remote fjiords and valleys of eastern Iceland.

programme.title: Calming Mountain Waterfall
programme.desc: A fixed-angle one hour long nature scene of the beautiful Tangle Falls in Jasper National Park, paired with real stereo nature sounds shot on location; although its a static video, there are a lot of dynamic elements.

programme.title: Dolphin Voyage Relaxation
programme.desc: Underwater cinematography, a synergistic blend of audio including underwater nature sounds, and calming ambient music combine to induce relaxtion in the deep blue calming ocean with a pod of friendly dolphins.

programme.title: Pure Relaxation
programme.desc: Relaxing to the slow descent of the sun over calm waters.

programme.title: Sunrise Meditation
programme.desc: Easimg into the day with the sound of lapping waves and breathtaking beaches from around the world.

programme.title: Blue Lagoon Boat
programme.desc: Featuring a static nature scene filmed on a remote island on the northern tip of Mexicos Yucatan Peninsula; puffy clouds, lapsing lagoon waves and the sights and sounds of seagulls.

programme.title: Crashing Waves: Hawaii
programme.desc: The energizing sound of waves crashing on the shores of Hawaiis Red Sand Beach.

programme.title: Camping on the Mountain
programme.desc: The Canadian wilderness and its soaring views of unspoiled nature.

programme.title: Cimarron Strip
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Cimarron Strip - The Search
programme.desc: When Marshal Crown is wounded during a failed attempt to free a man arrested for murder, Dulcey, some Cimarron townsmen and the outlaws family launch a desperate search.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - The Big Trees
programme.desc: A greedy timber baron (Kirk Douglas) wants to log the giant sequoias in northern California. He plans to cheat the Quaker colony who lives on the land, but things begin to change when a new rival comes to town.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - Stubborn Pioneer
programme.desc: Mr. Carpenter goes into the wilderness to start a new settlement called Carpenterville. Hawkeye has his suspicions about the Mohawk guide who is leading them.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: Owen Daybright (Burt Lancaster) feuds with his black sheep brother Lee Strobie over the rights to their fathers empire. But the sibling rivalry comes to a head when Lee fathers an illegitimate child and tries to frame Owen.

programme.title: Cimarron Strip
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Cimarron Strip - Till The End Of Night
programme.desc: Wrongly accused of murder, MacGregor escapes jail with another fugitive. As a posse hunts them down, Marshal Crown races to save them before vigilante justice is carried out.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Gods Gun
programme.desc: Ben Haenni (Jack Palance) is the leader of the Clayton gang, he kills Father John so he can seed chaos in Juno City. An orphan boy (Leif Garrett) seeks out Father Johns twin brother (Lee Van Cleef), a retired bounty hunter, to come back with him and save the town.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - The Promised Valley
programme.desc: Conflict arises among the Tuscarawas when a brave tries to persuade the tribal council that Chief Tawenduma is a thief.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - The Outlaw
programme.desc: Howard Hughes fabled film about Billy the Kid (Jake Buetel) and Doc Holliday (Walter Huston), their competition for the attention of a woman named Rio (Jane Russell), and the pursuit of Billy by sheriff Pat Garrett.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - The Brute
programme.desc: A big but simple man goes on the run after he is framed for a series of robberies he didnt commit.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - High Lonesome
programme.desc: A young drifter (John Drew Barrymore) is held by a family of ranchers that suspect him of committing murder.

programme.title: Death Valley Days
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Death Valley Days - Sego Lillies
programme.desc: When a young Mormon couple newly arrived in Salt Lake City from Boston is chosen to help build a new settlement, they must learn to cope with the Utah wilderness.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - Hawkeyes Homecoming
programme.desc: Hawkeye returns home to find that his younger brother has joined the British Army and become a Red Coat.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Abilene Town
programme.desc: When an uneasy truce between cattlemen and homesteaders is broken in Abilene, Texas, Marshall Dan Mitchell (Randolph Scott) must resolve the conflict as he tries to manage the two women in his life.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E13 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 13, Ukraine
programme.desc: Welcome to Ukraine and the wonderful capital city of Kyiv. Were here for the second time for the iconic truck pull World Championships! The reigning World champion Kelvin de Ruiter from Holland will defend his title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E14 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 14, Romania
programme.desc: In this episode, a final chance for our athletes to get vital world series ranking points on board to give them the best possible chance of success and an initial advantage at the finals. Its the last show before the world finals and the top 10 places are up for grabs, but who will they be?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E15 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 15, World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkeys south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season. Here in the sunshine, well finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is - you could not ask for a better setting. Aivars Smaukstellis, the reigning world champion is defending his title, and two-time world champion Dainis Zageris is also here, but with a though competition, who will win?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E16 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: What a day ahead of us here in Alanya, just a handful of events to go before we find out who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League in 2021. These are the world finals, and all the big names are in the house. With just 3 events to go - who will take the crown of World Champion 2021 and be the STRONGEST?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E01 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 1, Finland Stage 1
programme.desc: We are back, after a short break it feels like we never even left. We’re here in Vaasa - Finland kicking off 2022 new world series. If you are watching at home, just like these people, you’re in the right place. Because this is a special edition world record breaker. The only question left today, is to see how many new world records will be set so stay tuned.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E02 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 2, Holland Part 1
programme.desc: We are here in Doetinchem – Holland, for Stage 2 and 3 in the hottest day of the year. 40-degree heat, these boys have to work harder than they ever have. The sun is going to be beating down, they’re going to be sweating, hydration is going to be key today. I also reckon they’re all going to be wearing their sunglasses. Let’s see which shady looking character wins.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E03 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 3, Holland Part 2
programme.desc: So there you have it. The next day, 3 more events in 40 Degrees heat. We’ve got Gavin coming into day 2 leading the pack. Kelvin De Ruiter our world champion struggling a little bit at the moment, but Yoke Race, Conan’s Wheel and then Stones to finish. There is a lot to be played for here, so stay tuned to see if Gavin can take the lead and beat Kelvin overall.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E04 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 4, Serbia Part 1
programme.desc: We’re in the Serbian city of Novi kozarci, for the next stage in the world series. And what a fantastic line up we have for you again. But it is going to be one of the hottest stages yet. A Strongman competition in 44-degree heat. It will be a real challenge for these athletes to finish this event. From all over the world the strongmen came here for the title! Welcome to the heat hell in Serbia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E05 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 5, Serbia Part 2
programme.desc: Welcome to day 2 in Serbia, and its another baking hot one. We are in Kikinda today! We’ve got three more gruelling events for our athletes. Sami Ahola is leading the pack, so can he be the first Finnish athlete to take an SCL title. Stay tuned to find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E06 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 6, Joensuu Part 1
programme.desc: In this competition, we have our athletes paired up. They’re going to have to take on each event together, having to factor in each other’s strengths and possibly weaknesses. Can the men who normally work alone, share their powers as a duo? Let’s find out!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E07 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 7, Joensuu Part 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland- Joensuu. Welcome to the final day of the world’s strongest team event. The race to be the best team in the world is coming to its crowing point. All is still wide open for any of these to take the title. Who is going to win? Will team Latvia keep their World Title or maybe Finland can attach them? Keep watching and we’ll find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E08 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 8, Esposende
programme.desc: Welcome back to Strongman Champions League for another stage of the 2022 world tour. We’re in Esposende - Portugal in this beautiful setting next to the beach in front of a packed crowd with some of the strongest men the world has to offer. With a real Porsche deadlift and many other crazy stuff. So, lets get this show started.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E09 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 9, Great Britain
programme.desc: Hello and welcome in Gloucester, UK. The world tour hasn’t been here for what feels like forever. And now for the first time in the Mekka of Strongman, the SCL World series will crown a great Champion with the SCL Title. It will be full with special wooden events, and a great winner! So ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, brace yourselves because I present to you strongman champions league UK.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E10 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 10, Poland Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland the home of Legends Mariusz Pudzianowkski and Krzystof Radzikowski. Who will grab the title here in holiday resort Sopot, on the great Balrtic Sea with 6 events and 12 athlets in the mix!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E11 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 11, Poland Part 2
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland, after 3 events the Polish Strongman Oskar Ziolkowski is Leading. Kelvin, Travis and Aivars are coming up and will try to beat him, but will Oskar take his first title ever?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E12 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 12, Bosnia
programme.desc: it’s been a long time since the world series held a championship here in Sarajevo. Let’s see what test of strength this destination holds for our athletes. And what fantastic athletes are here again in Stage 12 of the SCL World Series. The strongman champions league Bosnia is another iconic Strongman event with the return of Rongo Keen from Australia and Portugal winner 2022 George Sulaiman.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E13 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 13, Romania
programme.desc: Welcome to Sibiu in Romania. It’s an important day for some of these athletes, because four of them have a real chance of getting into our all-exclusive world finals. There’s only one more stage after this to get those all-important extra points. So, there’s going to be some fireworks, who will take the title here and who will qualify for the World Finals?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E14 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 14, Gibraltar
programme.desc: This is it the last show before the world final. These guys have really got to fight for the points now, this is going to be action packed, whilst these guys fight it out all day.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E15 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 15, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkey’s south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season of Strongman Champions League. Here in the sunshine, we’ll finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is. You could not ask for a better setting. After months of hard-work, if not years for some of these lads, we find out who will take the world title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E16 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 16, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: Welcome, to day two of the strongman champions league 2022 finals here in Alanya, Turkey. It’s all up for grabs now, everyone is fighting for the world title belt. This is an epic episode where we finally crown the World champion of 2022.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E01 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 1 - Finland
programme.desc: Welcome to the 2023 Strongman Champions League in Vaasa, Finland! This year’s event introduces a knockout format with 6 intense events over 90 minutes, ending in a unique deadlift face-off with boats.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E02 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 2 - Serbia
programme.desc: Stage 2 of the Strongman Champions League 2023 is set in Zrenjanin, Serbia. This exciting event features 5 challenging contests, including a superhuman Yoke race. As the SCL World Series Tour continues, athletes will battle it out to claim the yellow leader’s position for the season. Don’t miss this incredible stage of strength and endurance!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E03 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 3 - Finland Teams World
programme.desc: The World’s Strongest Team will be crowned in this edition of SCL, here in Kalajoki-Finland we’ve picked some of the best in the business, teamed them up, and they’ll be going all out against each other. It’s now no longer about being a lonely wolf, but more about the pack mentality. It is a competition over 7 events, including a Big 2-man Log lift and heavy deadlift. Let’s start the action.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E04 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 4 - Holland
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League in Holland at the Dru Factory in ULFT. A great location for a spectacular battle with 14 Athletes over 3 events! The first 3 events in this episode are Truckpull/ Superyoke and Farmerswalk, with 2 massive logs of 150 kg in their hands. So, join us for the show of strength, the place of power, it’s the circus of the extreme.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E05 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 5 - Holland 2023
programme.desc: Ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, strongman fans across the world, we are back for SCL Holland part two. Get ready because it’s about to get heavy. The Strongman Champions League in Holland, continues with the last 3 events, here at the Dru Factory in ULFT. The events in this episode are the Viking Press, Wheel Flip and the Atlas Stones, with 180 kg in the end.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E06 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 6 - Worlds Strongest Latino
programme.desc: For the first time ever, the World’s Strongest Latino competition has begun. This two-day event in Porto, Portugal, features 20 athletes from around the world competing in 8 events. After 4 grueling events, the top 12 will advance to the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E07 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 7 - Finland World Record Breakers
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League World Record Breakers 2023 starts with a 25-ton snow plow! Crazy machines are pulled and pushed, with many kilograms moved. A few new world records are set in this competition.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E08 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 8 - Portugal
programme.desc: We have returned to the powerhouse of Portugal for an edge-of-your-seat galactic battle. If all the planets collided at once, it wouldn’t compare to the bang of this show. Get ready for the battle of the beasts; it’s the heaviest show in the universe, the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E09 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 9 - England
programme.desc: SCL UK has landed in Gloucester it is workout war fitness for the ferocious, it’s going to be a a battle of the brutal, a rampage of the roofless. This is going to be a massacre of the muscles. You know it by now, but just in case you don’t, this is strongman champions league.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 10 - Worlds Strongest Viking
programme.desc: On the menu this week it’s medieval madness, we’ve come back to the middle ages to test our noble men through a muscle gaining of events. They are hoping and we are hoping that one will survive to take the title of the world’s strongest Viking. The official Worlds Strongest Viking is this time in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? Sit still, just look at me and try and feel the energy, because I can tell you, the atmosphere here is electric, it’s explosive, there is a pure elemental force going through these athletes veins. I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what Im going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: SCL Poland part 2 - Who will win the title in Poland and take 25 points for the world ranking. It is very exciting on the top, in part 1 between Poland and Latvia. Another great episode with super strongman events such as: Bag Toss Medley, Log Lift Reps and the Powerstairs. Also an interview with Mateusz Kieloszkowski, the all time favorite champion from Poland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: It’s time to show our strength and gain respect from the gods of Olympus. Our gladiators have many events set out by no other than Hercules himself. The coliseum is ready here on this mythological island of Cyprus, so we have landed in Limassol were again 12 Top Strongmen are battling for the title and ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E14 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 14 - South Africa
programme.desc: The only and official world championship Truckpulling for its 10th year, again at the Strongman Champions league. With the 3 times Worldchampion Kelvin de Ruiter – defending his title. This championship has trucks in all shapes and sizes which is a lot like our athletes, there all different pay loads, but does the biggest win or is it the strongest.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E15 Stage 15 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Years and years of determination has brought us here today, when all the walls felt like they were caving in perseverance. When their bodies were screaming, hurting, shouting stop, beneath. These are the things which make up a man, these are the things that bring you world finalists. This episode they fight for the greatest title of all, they fight to put their names in the history books forever.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E16 Stage 16 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Part 2 of the World Finals of the Strongman Champions League tour 2023 at the Sarajevo Centar Skenderija in Bosnia. 3 Events was done already and amazing results have been set. Who will be the new World champion? Find out here, who, after 16 stages, will be crowned World Champion 2023.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 15, Malaysia (World Finals Part 1)

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 16, Malaysia (World Finals Part 2)

programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Soaking in the beauty and elegance of the French Riviera, Marko and Alex are in Nice to enjoy the simplicity and splendor of this seaside city.

programme.title: Keep Austin Weird
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In the state capital of Texas, Marko and Alex see what Austin has to offer. An eclectic city known for its music and cuisine, the guys brave the Texas heat and check out what keeps Austin weird.

programme.title: Levels of Luxury in Laos
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Sandwiched between Thailand, Vietnam, and Cambodia, Laos is a destination often overlooked by tourists. Marko and Alex are uncovering the hidden gem of Vientiane, the capital city, to see what goes on in this sleepy town beside the Mekong River.

programme.title: The Gainful Grace of Geneva
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Marko and Alex find themselves in the prosperous and pristine city of Geneva, Switzerland. A city nestled alongside a beautiful glacier-fed lake, the guys will explore the riches Geneva has to offer.

programme.title: The Thriving Traditions of Taipei
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: ​Welcome to the buzzing capital of Taiwan. A rich blend of cultures, old meets new in this thriving metropolis of Taipei. Marko and Alex eat their way through the city, experiencing some unique traditions along the way.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Marko and Alex head to Lyon, France, a city known for its gastronomy and endless history.

programme.title: Oceanside in Okinawa
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Ocean breeze, turquoise waters and a whole lot of amazing cuisine. Marko and Alex are soaking up that island life in Okinawa, Japan and learning what makes it so unique.

programme.title: Genoa From Above and Below
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In Genoa, the brothers cruise the streets, while one of them gets a taste for the lavish lifestyle of Italys Northwestern port. They take in all the views: heads in the clouds on a high-flying funicular, and just above water at the local aquarium.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Green juice, avocado toast, and surfers galore. Marko and Alex are back home in Los Angeles to explore their town, staycation style. From downtown to the beach, the guys do everything fun under the sun in the city of angels.
